27a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa shin tu che gsung bas// sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor bzlas brjod dang // gtor ma la sogs ga cho ga yis// bdun nas stong gi bar du ni// mkhas pas ci nus rgyud brtags la// cho gas sdig pa byang bar gsungs// dper na/ lus kun la ni gnod pa
27b1(rgyud 'grel): yi/ cher ma'i phung pos lam rnams 'gags// me yi sbyor ba mkhas pa yis// bsregs pas thams cad med par byed// de nas lam ni bskyed nas ni// gang du phyin par 'gro bar byed// de bzhin sngags sogs mthun rnams kyis// sgrib pa la sogs bcom nas
27b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi lam bskyed nas// dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur// dngos grub khyad par ma thob na// phra mo l-i sogs thod par 'gyur// mtshan ma'i lung ston phra mo 'byung // gal te de ltar ma gyur par// tshe dbang ma thob rnal 'byor pas// sgrib pa rnams
27b3(rgyud 'grel): ni nga gyur nas// skye ba phyi mo la sogs// dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur// yang na sngags kyi mthu yis ni// sdig sgrib rtsad nas ma chod kyang // tshe long rags pa mgo bcom nas// gzhan dag mi skye mgo gnon cing // dam tshig ma nyams
27b4(rgyud 'grel): bshags la brtson// smon lam dge ba sngo legs pas// skye ba 'di rjes gzhan dag tu// dus dang gnas dang slob dpon dang // rigs dang phyag rgya man ngag sogs// skyes ma thag tu rnyed par 'gyur// de ru dam tshig ldan sogs pas// rim gyis skye
27b5(rgyud 'grel): bdun brgyud nas su// 'bad rtsol drag po ma byas par// sangs rgyas sa la 'gro bar gsungs// de sogs lung bstan sbyor ba rnams// mkha' 'gro ma yi lung ston du// rnal 'byor mkhas pas shes par bya'o// 'dir ni blo dman don ched du//
27b6(rgyud 'grel): cung zad bsdus te bstan pa yin// mkha' 'gro ma yis lung bstan yang // 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// 'jig rten 'das la gnyis yod de// sa gnas rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro dang // bde gshegs byin brlabs mkha' 'gro'o//
28a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro de dag gnyis ka yang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang mi mdzes pa'i// gzugs dang sna tshogs sprul nas ston// de la 'jigs dang mi 'jigs dang // re dang dogs pa'i sems spangs te// phyag rgya brda la
28a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yi// ston pa'i dus su lan rnams ni// ston par shes par ma nus na// dngos grub med de nyams par 'gyur// de bas nan tan cher bskyed de// man ngag thos pa che ba gces// thos pa che bar ma gyur kyang // gang bsgrub rgyud skor la
28a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs la// slob dpon la ni yang nas yang // the tshom chod par mnyan par bya// rgyud rnams thos par mi nus pas// bsgrub pa'i chas rkyen bcu bdun po// shes par de ni ma byas na// dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// slob dpo na bla ma la
28a4(rgyud 'grel): brten pas// ma tshang yang ni 'grub par gsung // 'jig rten pa la gnyis yod de// rgyal bas bka' la btags pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang // bdud ni nago po la sogs pa// dam la ma thogs bar chod mkhan// de ltar gnyis
28a5(rgyud 'grel): su ma shes na// dngos grub thob kyang slar la 'chor// de gnyis gzugs dang rtags sogs kyang // gong ma bzhin du ston pas na// de yi rim pa'ang gang bzhin bya// de yang brtag pa'i cho ga yang // zhag gsum zhag bdun rtsa gcig tu// re dog
28a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs thams cad kun// spangs nas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la// nan tan du ni brtson 'grus bya// tshogs 'khor lo sogs yang dang yang // byed pa'i dus su rdo rje glu/ byed cing phyag rgya sogs ston pas// ting 'dzin phyag rgya gsal ba dang /
28b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma la sogs gsal 'bar zhing // gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs// thams cad brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba// lha yi mtshan mar shes par bya// de las bzlog pa thams cad kun// bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/
28b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro'i lung du bstan pas na// 'dir ni bsgrub pa'i don du bsdus// bsgrub pa'i cha rkyen man ngag rnams// bsgrub pa nyams su len po la// bstan cing spel na bsod nams 'phel// nyamasu mi len ser sna can// rdzas dang lus srog lnga sogs pa//
28b3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la ni 'bul mi nus// de la man ngag bstan mi bya// de la min ngag postan pa na// dngos grub nyams te sdig pa 'phel// dam tshig nyams te mkha' 'gros gsod// cha rkyen la sogs bcu bdun po// ston pa phyag na rdo rje yis// sems
28b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' phyag na rdo rje la// rna ba rgyud pa'i man dAg de// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mA bstan// des ni ro langs ma la bstan// gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje dang // daslob dpon phyag nA rdo rje la// brgyud pa'i man ngag rim pa rnams// nan ton gyis ni btsa' bar bya/
28b5(rgyud 'grel): de la bca' ba ma shes na// dper na yid bzhin nor bu ni// klu rgyal gtsug nas rnyed nas ni// 'dam rdzab nang du stor ba bzhon// de bzhin man ngag rin tshon 'di// lus ngag yid gsum dka' ba yi// sgo nas slob dpon la btsal nas//
28b6(rgyud 'grel): dam med rmongs pa'i lag shor na// dngos grub mi thob nyams par 'gyur// de bas nan tan bskyed de btsa'// lung bstan pa'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyugs 'tshal lo// de nas
29a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can tshod rten gyi// dus spu rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// dam chog nyams pa mang 'byung bas// yo byad rdzas chung sgrub pa pos/ nyams pa 'phel du mo gzhug phyir// aN+Dal tshogs bskang ba ni// dang po rnal 'byor 'grong
29a2(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis// shin tu gus pas maN+Dal bca'// maN+Dal bca' ba'i thab so bstan pa// sa bzhi shin tu mnyen pa la// sbyin spangs yon tan ldan pa yis// maN+Dal lnga ni bca' bya ste// drang po maN+Dal dkar po bca'// gnyis pa sngon po dag to bya// gsuM
29a3(rgyud 'grel): ba mthing ka dag tu bya// bzhi pa ser po dag tu bya// lnga pa dmar po dag tu bya// dkar rtsi dang ni ba bla dang // yang nA rtswa sngon me tog gi/ gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa ni// mtshal la sogs pa'i rigs dang ni// gur kum la sogs dag pa dang // sbyar ba'i nag
29a4(rgyud 'grel): po rigs ngag gis// kha lo bsgyur bar bstan po yin// yang na thams cad dkar dang spro// de gnyis gcig gis bya ba yin// bsdus rgyas mkhas pas shes par bya// ba yi rnam pa lnga dang ni// bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dag ni// dngos grub cani gyi snod bzhag/
29a5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen bum pa la sogs kyi/ skyon spangs ston ldan pa yis// sdong du thun mongs khyad par rdzas/ tsan+dan meng du mi rung ngo // kha rgyan 'bras bu can gyi bya// dang por bodag nyid rnal 'byor pas// tha mal 'du shes spangs nas ni// lha'i nga rgyal ldan pa yis
29a6(rgyud 'grel): dang po bum po byin gyis brlag/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyi gangag// oM a mr-i ta kun Da li hUM ka nyi shu rtsa ga cig bdun du gang ba// gong gi bkra 'ogs snod kyi rdzas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pas btab nas kyang // dang po bum pa'i chus su bsang // bdud rtsi
29b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil pa'i sngags kyang bzlas// thugs ka'i a las zla ba yis// dkyil 'khor chen po nyid du bsam// oM a tsin+d+ra maN+Da la hUM// bdun dang lnga dang gsum du bzlas// tsan+dan las kyi bum pa bsam// yi ge du 'phros tsan+dan phog/ de las ma
29b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas man+tal gang // oM d+hU ba s+pha ra Na hUM/ zhes pa lan bdun bzlas so// me tog lnga dang gnyis gcig le// kha dog mtshan nyid shes byas la// yi ge pa las pad+ma ni// stong ldan brgyad ldan dag tu ni// gyur par bsams nas
29b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas dgram// oM paM pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ zhes gong ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o// de steng b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang // lnga dang gnyis dang gcig tu bya// de nas thams cad kun la yang // gsum du bya bar 'dod pa'ang yod// zla ba pad+ma gzhal
29b4(rgyud 'grel): yas khang // gsum dang gnyis dang gcig tu yang // rnal 'byor bsdus dang dang rgyu sa pa ni// nyams pa che chung go rims so// de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid dang // dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor kun// khrus byas gos ni bzang po gon// rgyan cha la so/
29b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par bya// shar ram nub tu kha bltas te// so so lha yi ting 'dzin bskyed// rdo rje dril bu byin gyis brlab// rdo rje dril bus bskul nas kyang // tshigs bcad ngag gis gsol ba btab// sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' la gdags// thugs ka'i zla
29b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor du// yi ge bzhi 'phros lha mor gyur// bla ma yi dam lha dang ni// lasang sngags bdag po dkyil 'khor lha// dkon mchog gsum sogs spyan drangs nas// bla ma sbyangs nas mi spyod 'gyur// mchod rten ma chod sogs rgyas par dbul//
30a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi sngon du phyag rnams bya// gzhan yang mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// mchod nas bstod pa rgyas par bya'o// de nas sngags bzlas 'od zer gyis// lha rnams la ni phog nas su// 'od zer bskul nas chur la 'dus//
30a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa'i lus la phog nas su// bo spu'i khung zhugs sdig pa bsdus// snying khAr yi ge ka~M dam ni// 'od nag tu ni gyur par bas mo// srog go 'dus kyi sna nas byung // lha dang bdag gi bar du ni// pad+ma nag po'i gdan bsams la// sdog pa'i gzu
30a3(rgyud 'grel): de ru bzhag/ de nas yi dam lha yi sngags// bzlas pa'i 'od zer 'khrul 'khor gyis// sdig pa rnams ni sbyang bar bya// yang na/ sdig pa de nyid sbyang nas kyang // lus kyi lhag ma sbyang ba'am// de nas yi ge brgya pa yis// man ngag bzhin du bsgoms
30a4(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // snga ma bzhin du sbyang bar bya'o// yang na/ yi ge brgya pa gcig pus bya// yi ge brgya pa 'bum dang ni// rang gi snying po 'bum gyis ni// rno ba nyams pa chen po skongs// sum cha phris pas gnyis pa skongs// phyeng phri bas ni gsum pa bskongs//
30a5(rgyud 'grel): sum gnyis phri bas bzhi po skongs// sum cha'i sum cha bri bas nI// lnga pa skongs te drug pA ni// sum gnyis phri bas skongs pa'o// de yi phyed phyed phri bAs ni// tha mA gsum gyi gau rim sbyor// yan lag brgyang dang porgyu phyed dang // nyi shu rtsa gcig
30a6(rgyud 'grel): dag gis so// che chung rim pa dag gis ni// tha ma me bam chu yis ni// sbyin sreg dag gis sbyin par bya// gsang sngags bdag gamo bdud rtsi 'khyil// rta mgrin bum pa gong bzhin bcas// byin brlabs la sogs byas nas ni// tha ma
30b1(rgyud 'grel): dag par bkru ba'o// sbyin sreg khrus dang ldan pa'am// yang na maN+Dal bzlas pa yis// cho ga gcig pus byar yang rung // dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba yis// sbyor ka 'di la brtson par bya'o// dam tshig nyams pa sa bskang ba'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu
30b2(rgyud 'grel): dgu pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang gi rim pa bstan pa ni/ bum pa gsang ba ye shes dang // bzhi par bston pa de rnams la// gnas ni yid 'ong la sogs su// dus la sogs pa 'jom pa
30b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / slob dpon slob ma mtshan nyid ldan// sngon gyi gleng gzhi rjes mthun par// dkyil 'khor byas nas slob ma gzhug/ dbang bskur rim pa ma nor bar// rnam grangs rnams ni shes par bya// bskur thabs man ngag shes byas la// bskur ba'i gan
30b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang ma nor brtag/ de ltar byas pas sgrib pa 'byung // sa yang rim pa gyis non par 'gyur// de phyir man ngag bstan par bya// rtags la sogs pa'ang shes par bya// brda' mi shes na sngags pa mi na// las dang po is rdzas la brten// dgos pa
30b5(rgyud 'grel): shes na the tshom med// nus pa mthu dang ldan pas ni// 'bras bu khyad par thob par 'gyur// de dag spyi dang khyad par ni// cho ga man ngag rgyas pa rnams// rgyud 'gre lo kun na gsal bas na// 'di ru bdag gis mdo tsam bsdus// bum pa'i dbang ni rnam
30b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ste// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // mthar thug pa ru shes par bya// phyi ni phyi rgyud dag dang mthun// nang ni nang brgyud dag dang mthun// yang na gnyis ka phyi ru bsti na// nang gi slob dpon lus la bzhag/ gsang ba yul ni nyid la sbyar// mthar thug slob
31a1(rgyud 'grel): ma mgo bo ru// dga' ba bskyed pa'am rnga rje'i rtsa// de rnams man ngag rgyas bshad pa// las kyi phreng bar shes par bya// gsang ba dbang la bzhi ru bstan// phyi ni dung rtsi byin rlabs sbyin// yang na mtshan ldan phab nas nI// srin mtheb
31a2(rgyud 'grel): dag gis sbyin par bya// nang gi gsang ba pho brang nas// lag pa'i phyag rgya gzung nas sbyin// gsang ba yum gyi mkha' nas blang // mthar thug gsang ba'i pho brang du// mchog dga' skyes par shes par bya// shes rab ye shes la yang bzhi// phyi ni las
31a3(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag rgya ma// mdo ni 'od kyi rig ma yin// gsang ba bya gdong mo la bya// mthar thug dreg 'dzin gtum mo yin// mthar thug la ni gnyis su bstan// rten bcas dang ni rten mod do// rten med la yang gnyis su bstan// spros bcas dang ni spros me//
31a4(rgyud 'grel): pabong gi man ngag rgyas bshad pa// slob dpon zhal gyi man ngag dang // las kyi phreng bar shes par bya// brda' yi cho ga mdo tsam bstan// ka la sha a b+hi She ka zhes pa ni// bum pa'i ngag brdar lus kyi brda'// lag pa'i sor mo bskongs nas ni// rtse mo
31a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'i bum pa'i tshul// gu h+ya a b+hi She ka zhes pa// gsang ba'i ngag brda lus kyi brda'// sdom pos khro mo gnon pa nI// lag pa 'dri na shes par bya// pra dz+nyA dz+nyA nA gu h+ya a b+hi She ka zhes pa ni// shes rab ye shes ngag gi brda'// lus kyi brda' ni
31a6(rgyud 'grel): lho sbyin brda'// yang na khyad par dga' ba mtshon// pra dzA dz+nyA na gu d+ya a b+hi She ka zhes pa ni// bzhi pa'i ngag brda lus kyi brda'// lhan cig dga' bo skyes sa ru// mthe bo bcug nas mtshon par bya'o// de ltar ba rnams ma shes na// mkha' 'gro
31b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub ster ba na// brda rnams dris nas ster bar byed// brda rnams mi shes slar la 'chor// yang na brda rnams gzhan po yang // ma shes na ni mkha' 'gros gsod// brda la sogs pa ma shes na// gsang sngags spyod pa'i dus dang ni// 'byung po
31b2(rgyud 'grel): nyams song gsal ba dang // mu stegs shan 'dres 'byung ba dang // phyag dang phyag gi lan dus su// brda mi shes na sngags pa min// dbang bskur ba yi rim pa yang // chags lam grol lam gnyis shes bya'o// dbang bskur med na 'bras bu med// /
31b3(rgyud 'grel): de bas dbang bskur nan tan bya// dbang gi sbyor ka ste sum cu pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// dam tshig rnams ni cung zhig bstan// dang po spyod pa'i dam tshig ni// chags lam spyod lam grol lam
31b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod// de ltar gnyis ka spyod pa la// dang po dmachog dang rab mchog go// de la yang ni phyi nang ngo // dang po phyi yi spyod dus su// yul dang dus kyi gnas skabs kyis// zhi bas 'dul dang drag pos 'dul// mthun 'jug spyod pa mkhas shing zag/ zas
31b5(rgyud 'grel): dang gos sogs thams cad kyang // rang dang gzhan ni gnyis ka la// phan sems spyod pas 'jug bya'o// phan sems med pa nyon mongs can// bdag gzhan lha dang snying rje spangs// 'gro don mchod pa spangs pas na// dam tshig nyams te ngan
31b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gror ltung // ngan spyod dus ni bstan pa ni// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa la// chags pa'i lam pas 'jug par bya// grol ba'i lam pas byin gyis brlabs// de ltar byin brlabs bdud rtsi blta// thams cad lha bsgoms mchod byas na//
32a1(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur// khyi phag sbyong pa bzhin byas na// dam tshig nyams te yi dgas sa// chang ni bdud rtsi chen po ste// btung bar bya ba kho na yin// zhes rgyud las gsungs pa ste// mtshan dang ldan pa'i
32a2(rgyud 'grel): snod mchog tu// rul sogs skon rnams spangs pa yis// bdud rtsi ro ldan snod bkang ste// bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor ba// a las ka pA la ni bskyed// zla ba dang ni de yi bskyed// has ni gzugs sogs rnam rtog sbyangs// hriHsa ni ro sogs rnam rtog sbyangs
32a3(rgyud 'grel): hoHsa ni bdud rtsi chen por bzhug/ mthe bong hUM las gzhi'i tshul// srin mtheb sum las ri rab tshul// bar no ma~M 'phros bdud rtsa bkug/ bdag gzhan lha ni mchod byas pas// bsod nams chen po thob pa 'gyur// de ltar ma byas glang chen bzhin
32a4(rgyud 'grel): chags shing brkams sogs myos 'thung na// skye ba lnga brgyar smyon par skye// byin gyis brlabs po'i rim pa yang // yang rigs lnga yi sbyor sogs bya// yang na mA ma kI yis sbyang // yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil sogs bya// mtshan ldan snod du chos 'byung
32a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / zla ba la sogs bsam byas la// mchod par bya ba'am yang na bdun// spyi gtsug bla ma bzhag byas la// sku gsung thugs ni gnas gsum bzhag/ de nas 'thor zhing mchod pa yis// phyag rgya sngogs kyis dbul bar bya// so so'i rtsa ba'i
32a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags la a mri ta kuN Da liM zhes pa'am/ a mr-i to khA hi zhes pa gang yang rung // gsum gsum kun la dbul bar bya// de nas rang snying lha gsal la// ci ran gnod pa med tsam btung // nang la gnod par gyur kyang ni// thigs pa gsum ni dam
32b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig go/ grol bas kyang ni mchod pa yis// dus su btud+hU bA phyir ni// yul dus gnas skabs sbyar te btung // btung ba la sogs gzhan po yang // bdud rtsi ma byas 'thung byed pa// yi dgas gnas su skye bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i spyod pa'i
32b2(rgyud 'grel): dus su ni// phyag rgya ma ni bsten pa yang // rnal 'byor cha gos po'i lam pas ni// rtags ldan mtshan nyid la sogs ldan// de ltar bsten pa'i gnas skabs ni// dbang bskor rnam gnyis dus dang ni// mchod pa'i dus dang ting 'dzin ni// ye
32b3(rgyud 'grel): shes skye ba'ogs dbyung phyir// dam tshig tu ni bstan pa yin// yang na bskyed rim bstan pa dang // rlung rnams las su rung gyur na// phyag rgya'i dngos grub myur 'dod phyir// phyag rgya la ni brten par bya// rnal 'byor grol ba'i lam pas ni// yid kyi lha
32b4(rgyud 'grel): mo gzugs mdzes ma// mchod pa'i dus su dam tshig go// de nas mkha' 'gro lung ston dus// dngos grub myur du thob 'dod na// mkha' 'gro'i man ngag la brten no// de lhor go rims ma shes na// dmau tshig nyam so tAM srin bur skye// sangs rgyas bstan pa
32b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa la// 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba shes bzhin du// mi rtsom pa ni dam tshig nyams// mo shes gnod pa mi byed la// byed na yang ni dam tshig nyams// de sogs sbyor ba gzhan po yang // ma nA ngag gis ni ni shes par bya// mchog gi spyod pa'i
32b6(rgyud 'grel): dus su ni// brtul zhugs sbyin pa lkugs pa dang // gcer bu la sogs dus skabs sbyar// de ltar ma shes dam tshi go nyams// rab mchog yis ni dus dag tu// don dam rang bzhin med pa'am// sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin la brten nas// rdzogs pa'i tingo 'dzin
33a1(rgyud 'grel): dus su ni// spyod pa la sogs byed pa ni// dam tshig nyams te bogs chung ngo // mthun 'jug spyod pa 'gal ba med// lta ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni// chos rnams sems kyi 'khrul pa ste// sems las ma gtogs chos
33a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams med// chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i sems// sems nyid do yang skye med phyir// yod med mtha' las 'das pa'o// bsam du med cing brjod du med// dper na na mkha' ji bzhin no// lha spyod kyi dam tshig gi sbyor ka ste sum cu gcig pa'o// /
33a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// rab gnas cho ga bstan par bya// sku gzugs la sogs kun la ni// rab tu gnas pa ma byas na// mu stegs lha rten bcas dang 'dra'o// rigs dang na tshong med pa'i mi// thams cad kun gyis bkur mi byed//
33a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin 'dir yang skra sogs lo// phyag la sogs pa byas gyur kyang // bsod nams chen po thob mi 'gyur// bsod nams chen po thob 'dod na// rab gnas byas pas thob par 'gyur// de bas rab gnas bya ba gces// slob dpon mtshan nyid
33a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yi// sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni// so so rang rang bsnyen pa bya// de ltar mi 'grub rnal 'byor pas// shAka thub bsnyen pa kun gyi ma// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bsnyen pa yis// gsang sngags thun mong bstan pa yis// bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs byas
33a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nas sa cho ga la sogs po// gzhan dang mthun par rgyas par bya// maN+Dal byi dor logs byas la// rgyan dang rol mo la sogs dgram// lha yi sta gon rdzogs byas la// de nas bum pa'i sta gon pa// maN+Dal me tog btsal bkram la//
33b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid lha ru bsgoms nas su// yungs kar nim pa lag gnyis kyis// blangs nas gsum gsum mer bstab bya// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+rA ya/ sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra swA hA// chu snyim pa bkang ba lan gsum blugs// bla mas zan chu bsre snod thogs//
33b2(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum byabs te mer bcas rnams// phyi rol dag tu bskyal bar bya// nam mkha' lha bkang spos thogs nas// dkyil 'khor lha la gsol ba gdab// rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes tshigs bcad la sogs bsgrags par bya'o//
33b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas maN+Dal steng du ni// sku gdung la sogs bzhag byas la// slob dpon nub tu gnas nas ni// oM hUM baM a zhes brjod pas// ba yi rnam lnga gang yin pa// de ni mar chu sbyor ba dang // dri zhim tsan+dan chu nyid dang // 'dag tshal shing shun tsho gsum
33b4(rgyud 'grel): niHbyin brlabs dur bas rim bzhin bsku// u du mau ba ra b+ha ra tra dang // tsa ba le ke na dang ni// a shwad bya chub shing gang rnyed// zhi ba btags chur sbyar snod g.yas bzhag/ de nas khrus rnams rim pa bya// de la sogs pa pa'i cho ga isaM//
33b5(rgyud 'grel): sku gzugs sta gon gnas par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// de rjes rab gnas brtsam por baM// sku rnams so so'i sa bon las// cho ga gsum sogs gang 'dod bskyed// ye shes lha oMng so sor bstim// sku gdung bstan
33b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bskyed cing bstim// glegaso bam so so'i snying po 'am// yang na A li kA li 'am// so so'i dkyil 'khor dag kyang rung // lha khang la sogs kun la yang // so so'i dkyil 'khor gang 'dod bya// yang na/ yi ge d+hU ni rten yin la/
34a1(rgyud 'grel): de la brten pa gang 'dod pa'o// rdo rje dril bu dag la ni// hUM dang a yis sa bon las// d+harma a badz+ra hUM zhes// sngags kyis bskyed pa byas nas ni// phyag mtshan lha ni gang 'dod bstim// phyag mtshan la sogs
34a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la yang // phyag mtshan snying po lha gsum dang // sgrub pa po yis las dang sbyar// phreng ba la yang de bzhin no// mtshan ldan yi ge a yin no// rgyan dang rgyan cha la sogs pa// byin gyis brlabs pa tsam ni bya// de dag thams cad
34a3(rgyud 'grel): kun la yang // bskyod dang bstim pa byas nas ni// de nas byin brlabs dbang bskur bya// de nas mchod lnga dbul bar bya// de 'og lA s+ya la sogs brgyad// mchod pa nyi shu po yang bya// gos dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa// rin chen bkra
34a4(rgyud 'grel): shis sgra dang ni// rol mo la sogs tsho ga rnams// rgyas por phul nas bstod pa blo// de nas bzlas brjod ci ran bya// spyan 'byeng sngags la sogs pa ni// klog phreng rgyud du shes por bya// yang na phyag mtshan la sogs kyi// cho ga bsdus par
34a5(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// shin tu bsdus pa'i cho ga sogs// byin gyi brlabs la sogs pa tsotsam// de ltar rab gnas zin nas ni// bla mo mkhas pa de la ni// ci bdog yon rnams dbul bar bya// des ni bsod nams chen po thob// ji ltar phongs par
34a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur yang ni// mchod pa'i yo byad rnams ni dbul// ser sna can ni dngul mi nus// des ni sdig 'phel bsod nams med// rab gnas bzang po zin nas ni// rang gnas bzang por gshegs su gsol// rab tu gnas pa'i sbyor ka ste sum cu
34b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// 'chi ba blu ba'i man ngag ni// 'chi rtags rnam par brtan pa dang // 'chi bru cho ga rgya sgra rnams// 'chi bru chen por shes par bya// 'dir ni bsgrub pa don du ni// gos sngon 'chi ba blu ba
34b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ man ngagra cung zhig dkol nas bstan// spyir ni 'chi bo dru ba la// dpe ba'i phyogs ni mtha' yas mchog/ gang dus kyang ni zlogs par 'gyur// gos sngon 'chi blu'i rim pa yang // nod pa sems ni de ga pra yis// gos sngon rna rgyud man ngag
34b3(rgyud 'grel): tsam mkhas pa de ni spyan drangs la// gnas khang dgon par maN+Dal bya// maN+Dal byas pa'i 'og tu ni// rgyan rnams ma lus dgram par bya// nang pa la ni chos bshad la// dang po sems ni dag par bya// sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyis ni// mo ra rnams
34b4(rgyud 'grel): ma lus thams cad dong // rang lus srog dang bcas pa dbul// de ltar dbul po de la ni// dang po dbang bskur rdzogs pa la// de nas man ngag gzhan sogs bya// de ltar byas 'og sos 'gyur lo// rang 'tshe rdzas tsam slar la sbyin// nor rdzas
34b5(rgyud 'grel): srog rnams dbul mi nus// ser sna can ni bzlog par dka'// de ltar ser sna can de la// dadang bskur mi bya gzhan po bya// cho ga'i rim pa bstan pa ni// rgyaso par byed na bskyed rim rdzogs par bya// yang na bsdus dang shin tu bsngos// de ltar
34b6(rgyud 'grel): byas 'og nad pas ni// khrus kyi rim pa rdzogs byas la// gos bzang byin brlabs bskon nas ni// shor gyi phyogs su kha bltas nas// mdun du maN+Dal lnga byas te// dang po phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul// de nas sdig bshags la so Da ba//
35a1(rgyud 'grel): nang pa de ni mi nus na// mchod g.yog ngag gi byed du gzhug/ de nas skyabs gsol tshigs bcad brjod// bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can// sku mchog stobs ldan khyod phyag 'tshal// gsung mchog sgra
35a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs mchog ye shes ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// sku mchog stobs chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de nas lus 'bul zhes ni sbyar// bdag la gnod pa'i nad rnams kaun// khyod kyi mthu yaM sbyang du gsol//
35a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po'i gnod po bzlog du gsol// zor dang dug rnams thams cad kyang // mthu stobs bdag pos bzlog pa gsol// bcom ldan khro chen rnam par rgyal// sku gsung thugs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan mgon po nag po che// lus
35a4(rgyud 'grel): ngan rgyal po mthu bo che// khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po// ro langs ma ni mthu mo che// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma// 'jigs byed ma ni mthu mo tsho// rdo rje lha mo 'od bskyed ma// rdo rje lha mo yid 'phrog ma// dza
35a5(rgyud 'grel): rje lha mo kun bzang ma// rdo rje lha mo klu sgra can// khro mo chen mo skyog gcod ma// khro mo chen mo dbugs rngub ma// khro mo chen mo khrag 'thung ma// khro mo chen mo sha za ma// sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o// de nas snom
35a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dzin du gzhug/ de bzlas pas ni bzlog par bya'o// dang po sku'i bzlas pa'i 'od zer gyis// lus kyi nad rnams sbyar bar bya'o// de nas thugs dang gsung gi sbyang // tha'i che na rak+Sha byang chub sems// sbyang sogaso byin brlobs byas nas mau//
35b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum dag tu mtshan cig byug/ de nas khrus kyi bum pa yis// bkra shis tshigs bcang bton nas ni// nang rnams sdig sgrib bkru bar bya// de nas sku gsung thugs kyi sngags// bzlas pas bder gshegs 'od zer bstim// de nus nang
35b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i steng phyogs su// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bzhugs bsams la// 'od zer 'phro 'dul sbyor ba yis// ye shes bdud rtsi snying khar gzung // de rnams byas pas 'chi ba bzlog/ 'chi zlog chen po bya ba ni// sbyin sred tshigs 'khor
35b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bya// gtor chen la sogs gzhan yang bya'o// de ltar byas pas 'chi bzlog/ rang dang gzhan ni gnyis ka la// man ngag stobs kyis bzlog pa ni// rlung dang thig le yi ge dang // gtum mo 'khor lo la sogs ni// 'chi glu cho ga dag dang ni//
35b4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i mon drag brgyad pas bya'o// 'chi thu ba'i sbyor ka ste sum cu cu gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin paM la phyag 'tshalo// stang stabs rim pa nung zhig bstan// shar phyogs g.yas brkyang la gnas nas// rkang pa dang
35b5(rgyud 'grel): ni lag pa yis// rdo rje rtse gsum stang stabs bya// gar bsgyur de ni thabs re bya// rkang lag mthun par bsgyur ba bzlog/ lho ru g.yon brkyang la gnas nas// ral gri 'am dbyug to 'dzin bris su// nong pa lag pa gnyi sogs su// sa dang bar snang
35b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka la// rin chen 'bar ma bre bar bya// nub phyogs g.yos brkyang la gnas nas// 'khor lo 'am ral gri de bzhin dre// byang phyogs g.yon brkyang la gnas nas// rdo rje rgya gram tshul du bre// yang na zlum po la sogs rim// bsrung ba'i tshul du bya ba
36a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / phyogs bzhir 'byung po bkug nas ni// mnan cing bsnun pa'i tshul du bya// gzhan yang stang stabs rgyas pa ni// snyoms 'jug la sogs rgyud na gsal// mkhas pas de ru shes par bya// 'dir ni bsgrub pa'i don du bsdus//
36a2(rgyud 'grel): stang stabs sbyor ba 'di dag ni// bgegs bskrang don du nan tan bya'o// stang stabs kyi sbyor ka ste sum cu bzhi pa'o// / ston pa phyag na rdo rje nas// mkha' 'gro ma ni yan chad du// brgyud pa'i rim pa'i min ngag 'di// snying po la
36a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs sgrub pa'o// gsang ba'i slob ma rin chen bkra/ dwe rtsa hUM rnal 'byor dang // dartul chen po ni rnal 'byor la// lo gsum bar du snod brtags nas// bde ldan rin chen yang gter du// bka' rtsa dam bzhag byas nas gtad// rin chen rdzas dang srog
36a4(rgyud 'grel): lus kyis// bla ma mnyes pas man ngag thob// de bzhin phyi rabs rnal 'byor gyis// de bzhin du shes par bya'o// phyi rabs blo do min la sogs shing // ser sna la sogs g.yo sgyu can// sgom bsgrub la sogs mi nus la// man drag bstan na dam tshig
36a5(rgyud 'grel): nyams// de bas phyi rabs rnal 'byor pas// snod ldan brtags la sbyin pa ro bya// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// rin chen phreng ba sbyor ka 'di// bdag gi snod ldan don brtsoms pas// 'di brtsams pa yis dge ba yis// bdag dang
36a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyang // blo med byang chub thob par 'ashog/ sbyor ka chen po'i man ngag/ slob dpon po chen po b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur to//
37a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gtor na'i cho ga bzhugs so//
37b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra pA Ni nI ya~M bA ra d+ha ra ba la~M ta bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor rnams la phan gdags
37b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ bdag gis gtor ma bshad par bya// phan gdags pa dang tshar bcad pa// phan po mchog dang thun mong ngo // gsang ba bla med mchog tu 'dod// de nang thun meng shes par bya// rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus// tshar bcad pa'ang
37b3(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// dgug dang bskrang dang bsang po dang // mnan dang bsreg par shes par bya// rgyun nam dus chen bzhi gsum gnyis// chung ngu rgyun nam chen po ni// bcu gnyis bzhi 'am tha ma gcig/ rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga// 'bru dang shing thog
37b4(rgyud 'grel): sman rnams dang // chan thug khur la sogs pa yi// rdzas rnams thams cad 'tshogs par bsags// de stengs dkar gsum klu la shes// khrag sna snying sna shaM sna gsum// de sogs thun rdzas tshar bcang ngo // bskyed rim tshul du bya ba dang //
37b5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma nas bzung bsrung byas la// cho ga gsum du bskyed pa 'am// chung ngu skad cig lhar bskyed la// mtshan dang ldan pa'i pad+ma ru// rjes rnams kun gyis bkang nas ni// steng du rdo rje sngon po bsam// khong seng can la hU~M gos mtshan// mtho gang
37b6(rgyud 'grel): la ma ra bong can// de la bcu drug bdun pas mtshan// rdo rje mtshan ldan bar du ni// dud sbyongs 'phro ba'i mthing dmar dkar// pang 'og ye shes lde ldan gsum// bru gsum 'og na zla gem can// thugs kyi mthing gnag 'phros pa las// rdo rje lte bsku
38a1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' gnyis bskyod// dmar po 'bar bas mtshan ldan dros// thugs kyis bsdus shing gsung gis sbyangs// sku la 'phros pas ri bong bskul// shes rab can la 'od byer 'bros// de yis yub yum
38a2(rgyud 'grel): bskul nas ni// kha dog dkar po'i bdud rtsi bab// dang po bskul byed 'ong du zhu// khong seng can nas pad+mar babs// babs pa'i rting la de nyid lhung // lan gsum bskor nas 'o ma bzhin// lnga pa'i dang po lnga pas mtshan// de yis
38a3(rgyud 'grel): gangad na bskyed 'khor bcas bskyed// dzaM hUM rdo rje khong seng can// bdud rtsi gsol bas mnyes par bsam// yang na lha mo dkar mo yi sa// mtshan ldan gyis ni bkang nas mchod// bstod nas bshags shing las bcolo//
38a4(rgyud 'grel): de yang rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus// de ltar byas nas gshegasu gsol// yang na skad cig lhar bskyed la// thugs kha'i hUM gis bdud rtsi sbyangs// slar yang ye shes bdud rtsi dbab// yud tsam sprul pas lha i gsol//
38a5(rgyud 'grel): yung tsam mos pas gsum ka gsal// shin tu bsngos pas zas de bzhin// phan gdags pa'i sbyor ka ste dang po'o// / dgug pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni// thun mong gtor ma dag dang mthun// khyad par
38a6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma bstan pa ni// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas da'i tu// shin tu dmar ba'i gos gyon la// nub kyi phyogasu kha bltas te// cho ga gsum gyis lhar bskyed pa'am// cho ga rnam lngas lhar bskyed pa// gang yang rung bas byas la byin
38b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs// gtor ma'i rdzas ni thun mong rdzas steng du// khyad par rdzas ni ra ta sna tshogs dang // gshog pa can gyis shA sna tshogs shis// byin gyis brlabs la bde gshegs mchod// gnyis pa mkha'agro ma la mchod// gsum pa chos
38b2(rgyud 'grel): skyong rnams la mchod// bzhi pa 'byung po thams cang tshim par bya// yang nA 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten lus 'das pa gnyis su mchod par bya'o// sngags ni rtsa ba'i sngags la ba liM kha khA hi khA hi zhes lan gsum mam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
38b3(rgyud 'grel): mkhar 'gro ma'i sngags nI b+hU ta DA ki ni/ badz+ra DA ki niHrat+na DA ki NoHpad+ma DA kI niHbi shwa DA ki niHsa ya DA ki nIHsarba DA ki ni[:]i maM nga l-i ta khA kha/ khA hi khA hi/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal mgon po nag po ni mkha' 'gro ma'i
38b4(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo yin pas// rtsa ba'i sngags la btags te dbul// 'jig rten pa'i mgon po nag po ni phyogs skyong gi gtso bo yin pas sngags kyang gong bzhin shes par bya// phyogs gi sngags ni/ in+d+ra zhes bya ba las kyi tshogs dang mthun//
38b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags ni oM A ka ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pas byo'o// de nas bstod pa bya zhing 'phrin las bcol// 'od zer 'phros pasau thal mo brdab// nges su thams cad bskul nas ni// gang la bya ma
38b6(rgyud 'grel): dgug par bsam// de 'dra lan grangs brgya nas stong // khri nas 'bum gyis khugs par 'gyur// dgug pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o// / bskrad pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni// thun mong tshig
39a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni// thun mong gtor ma dag dang mthun// khyad par gtor ma phal cher yang // bskrad pa'i tshogs kyi sbyor kar blta// man ngag khyad par bstan pa ni// shing lo 'am gro ga dag la ni// rlung dang bsgrub bya'i gzugs
39a2(rgyud 'grel): bris la// 'od zer rlung gis bskyod pa dang // khro bo dag gis bskyod pa dang // rlung lho dag la bskyod nas ni// na mkha' mtha' gtugs bsgral bar bya// bskrang pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ste gsum pa'o// / bsod pa khro bos
39a3(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa dang // mtshon cha'i char sogs dbab pas bsad// sngags dang phyag rgyu rdzas sogs gzhan// mkhas pas man ngag sbyar bar bya'o// bsong ba'i sbyor ka ste bzhi pa'o// / mnan pa'ang gong ma bzhin te mthun// khyud
39a4(rgyud 'grel): bar ri rab 'bum dang ni// rdo rje dang ni khro bo yang // 'bum du byas te 'od zer sogs// sbyor ba gzhan yang man ngag bzhin// mnan pa'i sbyor ka ste lnga pa'o// / bsreg pa sku gsung thugs kyis bsreg/ yang na mi la
39a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yi// sbyor ba gzhan du shes par bya'o// sreg pa'i sbyor ka ste drug pa'o// / bcings pa yis ni sbyor ba yang // sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// lu gu rgyud dang zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog la sogs sbyor
39a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// mkhas pa yis ni bcings par bya// bcings pa'i sbyor ka ste bdun pa'o// / klu dang rgyal po gnyis las ni// khyad par gtor ma bstan pa ni// dngul dang 'khar ba shing phor dang // sa gar snod du
39b1(rgyud 'grel): bya bar shis// sman lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu la shis// rin chen snang ni mdzes pa ru// ran chen lnga dang 'dra ba lnga// dar rlab shing rtog la sogs pa// rgyal po nyid la shes par gsungs// de gnyis byin gyis brlab pa/
39b2(rgyud 'grel): yong/ rdzas kyi steng du hrIH'am hUM/ de'i 'od kyis rdzas rnams bsgeg/ skyon dag nas ni bdud rtsir bsam// de nas lag pa g.yas pa ni// mchog sbyin byas pa'i lag mthil du// brim las dpag bsam shing bsam ste// de yi yal ba'i
39b3(rgyud 'grel): gseb tu ni// si las bdud rtsi bum pa bsam// de yis bdud rtsi yi ni rgyun// lag mthil du ni babs nas kyang // gtor ma'i nang du 'dres par bsam// de nas oM AHhUM lan gsum bzlas// de nas rang gi mdun du pad+ma bzhi bsam//
39b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas rang gi snying ga'i hUM gi 'od kyis// klu thams cad ni pad+mar bkug/ 'od zer 'phros pas sbyangs sogs bya// thams cad 'od du zhu ba lnga// bde gshegs klu'i sprul pa'am// gsung gi rigs kyi lha ru gyur// de nas/ spyan drangs
39b5(rgyud 'grel): bstim zhing dbang bskur bya// de nas rdo rje rtsi lnga spu gu can du bsams la// de nas spyan drangs la gsol bar bsam// bstab pa'i sdigs ni/ oM pA su gi ba liM tA khA hi zhes klu rnams kyi so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags la btags la dbul
39b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni badz+ra muHzhes btags la gshogasu gsol// rgyal po yang spral+la dang las kyi rigasu bsam// phyi ma mthun te man ngag tu shes par bya'o// klu dang rgyal po'i sbyor ka ste brgyad
40a1(rgyud 'grel): pal// de dag thams cad pa yin na// nang gi snying gA'i lha rnams la// gtar ma zas rnams yin pas nA// bdung rtsir byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rgyal ting nge 'dzin gyis dbul// nga na rnal
40a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor lam pa yin// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i man ngag bzhin// mang gi gtor ma'i sbyor ka ste dgu pa'o// / gsang ba'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni// lte ba pad+ma gtor ma'i snod// de ste zla ba'i steng du ni// byang chub sems kyi
40a3(rgyud 'grel): kun de la// bdud rtsi la sogs yon tan sogs// gtor ma'i rdzas su bstan pa yin// de 'og tsan+da li yi me// de 'og rlung sngon bskyod pa las// me 'bar bdud rtsi zhu ste phab// 'khor lo mkha' 'gro rnams la mchod// rtog pa zhi ba las
40a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'grub// gsang ba'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ste bcu pa'o// bla na med pa'i gtor ma ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba le// thams cad rdzogs pa'i man ngag 'chang // bla na med pa'i gtor ma'i sbyar ka ste bcu gcig pa'o// /
40a5(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i man ngag sbyor ka rnams// man ngag rim por bkod pa yis// bdag dang mtha' yas semos can rnams// bla med byang chub thob par shog/ slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/
40a6(rgyud 'grel): gaN tsakra bi d+hi/ bad skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// tshogs chen khyad par bsogs pa dang // dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba dang // sgrib sbyang mchog ni thob bya'i phyir// rnal 'byor thugs
40b1(rgyud 'grel): mthun bdag gis bshad// tshogs ni gnyis su shes par bya'o// phan gdags pa dang tshar bcad pa'i// de yang 'khor lo bskor dang mchod pa brtsam// phan pa mchog dang thun mong ngo // dgug dang bskang dang mnan pa dang // bsrad
40b2(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs tshar bcad pa'o// de sgrub rnal 'byor bstan pa ni// sngags pa gcig tu rtog byed dang // dus rnams kun tu rtse gcig ldan// rgyud rnams kyi ni snying po shes// de nyid bcu ni mchog tu rig/ zab cing rgya che chos la mos// yid
40b3(rgyud 'grel): nimini shin tu 'jam pa dang // bsnyen bskur ljon zhing 'jigs pa med// nga rgyal med cing bshags la brtson// brda dang phyag rgya mchod pa yis// lan dang sbyor ba sogs la mkhas// gsang thub tshong rig lus ngag bzo// de la
40b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i cho ga mkhas// gu ru wa sogs lha dang bstan// de stengs las kyi rnal 'byor gnyis// byin po byin mo gsol ka gsum// gi mtshams nang mtshams rol mo ba// de ni rnal 'byor rgyas pa'i tshang // lha stengs las
40b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi kar ma dang / mtshams pa nyid ni bsdus pa'o// lnga pa yan chad shin tu bsdus// 'khor lo bsdus rgyas mkhas pas bya// mchod pa bzhi gsum gnyis kyis bya// de yi rim pa'ang gong bzhin du// bsod nams rim pa'ang
40b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin thob// 'khor lo gral ni dkyil 'khor tshul// yang na mchog 'dod pa dang thun tha mong ni// grogs ma grags kyi rim pa yis// mchod pa'i tshul gyis ri mo pas bya// byin gyis brlabs sam rigs mthun par// nyams
41a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' 'am yid 'jug lanas ngag tu// 'khor khang sum rim dang po yi// sgo bzhi gnyis pa lho la gsum pa shar// de yi thun mong khyang bar ni// dang pos 'og phyi ma ste// rim gsum gyen du
41a2(rgyud 'grel): brtsigs pa ni// lus 'dod pa'am phyi ma'i lugs// phan 'dogs don du bstan pa'o// dur khrod mtsho gling 'jigs pa'i gnas// 'di 'dra'i rigs mthun la sogs su// tshor bcang don du gong bzhin blo// dus ni rgyun nam la 'am zla//
41a3(rgyud 'grel): khyang par bzhi gsum gnyis dang gtsog/ bcu gnyis bzhi ru dam tshig go/ de ltar ma byas mkha' 'gros gsod // byas na dngos grub chen po thob// yon tan sbyor ba'i rim pa dang // sgrub po 'dod pa'i rim pa yis// gong gi khyad par
41a4(rgyud 'grel): ri zhes par bya// phyi ltar ba yi rnam lngas byus/ nang ni bdud rtsi rnam lngas byug/ phyi ni mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams bris// nod ni dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// dkyil 'khor gsang cho ga nub mor bri// ngag gi brda' skad thabs gsum gyis
41a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rnams ni bsdu bar bya// dbyug ston gyis ni lus ngag brda'// bum po nas bzung phyi nang gsang // dris nas dbye gsal rim pas bya// slob dpon mdun du 'khon gtsug sbyangs// las kyi sems dpa' gral la dgod// rgyan cha
41a6(rgyud 'grel): bon la go gar gnas// slob dpon gyis ni byin brlabs shing // las kyi sems mas rtags gsum gdab// rang gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal po// karma sa maN+Dal mchod pa rnams// rim par byas nas gsol ba gdab// bskyed pa'i rim pa
41b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin bsgom// so so'i lha'i nga rgyal ba// de ltar mi shes lhag pa'i lha// de ltar byas nas gtso bos brdas// karma la ni bskul bar bya// karma 'khor ma dang bcas la// tshogs kyi bye brag brgya rtsa brgyad// 'gying bag tshul gyis drang bar bya//
41b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi dbye ba bstan pa ni// rtsa ba lnga los rtsa lngar gyur// thun mong du ni brgyad pa lo// rnal 'byor zab mo'i spyod yul yin// sha'i bye brag nyi shu lnga// btung ba'i bye brag de bzhin no// sman gyi bye brag nyi shu dang // bshos dang dkar gyi bye/
41b3(rgyud 'grel): brag kyang // byed mar byas pa'i sum cu yin// spos kyi bye brag brgyad du bstan// de nas bsdus pa phyed du bya// shin tu bsdus pa de'i phyed// de ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i rim pa ni// bcu dang lnga dang
41b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum du bya// de yi rab 'bring sgrub pa'o// bsod nams che chung rim pa de'o// tshogs de slob dpon byin gyis brlangs// rlung gis me spor mtshan ldan dros// de nyid gsum gyi las byas la// bdud rtsi dbab cing rdo rjes dkrugs// bdud
41b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsi rang bzhin 'od tu zhu// btung ba'i byin rlabs la sogs kyang // man ngag bzhin du byin rlabs lo// bdud rtsi mchod pa phyogs bkram la// dang po las kyi rnal 'byor gyis// mdun du lha bskyed spyan drangs bstim// dang po phyag
41b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal mchod lnga 'bul// de nas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dbul// de 'og lcags kyu lnga po bdang // glu dang kar gyi mchod pa dbul// hUM gis glu blangs mchod po ni// nyi shu yang ni bya bar gsungs// bstod cing rol mo'i mtshang
42a1(rgyud 'grel): dbul// de nas rnal 'byor rnams la mchod // lhag ma mkha 'gro rnams la mchod// maN+Dal sngon po byas nas ni// bdud rtsi lnga'i chags chags gdab// me tog sngon po'i chom bu dgram// sa la gnas pa'i mkha 'gro
42a2(rgyud 'grel): maHbskyed cing spyan drangs bstim byas la// byin gyis brlabs la mchod pa bya// lhag ma kha chus btab nus ni// sbyang dang spro ba bsngo byas la// 'khor khang phyi logs maN+Dal bya// khrag gis byugs shing me tog dgram// bshug glu brda' yis
42a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs la// rnal 'byor skra ba shig thal ba byug/ rgyan chas gon la rtogs rnams gadrab// lha yi ting 'dzino gsal byas nas// rdo rje'i glu blangs rol mo brdung // mchod cing bstod nas mthol bshags pa// 'phrin las bcol la gsher
42a4(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshogs kyi sbyor ka'i 'phrin las kyis// rnal 'byor pa'i las rnams 'grub// slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzog so// / zab pa don gyi cho ga rnams// rin chen lta bu'i
42a5(rgyud 'grel): gang zag la// zab phyir man bag bkol nas bstan// mchog gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni// thun mong tshogs 'khor dang mthun no// khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni// rin chen phug pa dgu rim mam// bdun rim lnga rim
42a6(rgyud 'grel): sum rim ni// mu stegs nyan thos skyes pa yis// skrag 'gyur log spyod spyad byed gsum// de dag spang phyir gong bzhin bstan// rgyal rigs rje rigs bram ze'i rigs// bu mo mtshan dang ldan pa ni// mtshan rnams bcu po rdzogs pa dang //
42b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab che dang snying rje che// dad pa la sogs che ba dang // rnal 'byor ldan zhing phyag rgya mkhas// sbyor thabs kun la rab tu mkhas// de lta'i rnal 'byor nyung yang lnga// mang bar gyur na rnal 'byor kyang // bskyed de ltar rig par spyad// lnga gnyis zung du gnas pa
42b2(rgyud 'grel): las// bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyin pas// nang gi mchod pa brtsam par bya// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brtsam// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis// dga' ba'i ye shes bcu drug ni// 'khor lo'i tshul las lhan cig bskyed// ye shes
42b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo zhos su glags// ya na sprul pa'i 'khor lo lnga// thig le phra mo bsam pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yin rtsa rnams mo// rlung ni las kyi sems pa yis// de la sogs pa'i man ngag rnams// slob dpon zhal las shes par bya// 'khor lo
42b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum la'ang de bzhin no// tshogs zhes bya ba mang ba yin// 'khor lo zhes bya bskor du btub// mchog ces bya ba lhan cig gda'// de ltar mchog gi 'khor lo ni// yang yang spung zhing bsgom par bya// mchog gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka
42b5(rgyud 'grel): ste gnyis pa'o// / dgug pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni// thun mong tshogs 'khor dang mthun no// khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// shin tu dmar ba'o
42b6(rgyud 'grel): gos gyon nas// nub phyogs su ni kha bltas te// cho ga gsum gyis lhar bskyed nas// 'khor bskyed pa'am mi bskyed pa'o// bskyed pa hUM gis bskyed pa dang // mi bskyed skad cig sprul pa'o// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs sogs// byas
43a1(rgyud 'grel): nas bskrad rim mthar phyin nus// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa la// chog la sogs rdzogs byas nas// dur khrod ras ma dag la ni// mdun du gzugs sam 'khor lo bri// dgug par ma go'i 'od zer gyis// bsgrub bya
43a2(rgyud 'grel): dkug nas bstim par bya// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten po'i// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag la// mtshung bstod l-i sogs byas nas ni// 'phrin las bcol zhing zad pa dang // sngags bzlas brgya rtsa brgyad du ni// rab kyis bya ba 'dring gi na//
43a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga brgya tha ma stong gis so// bzhi po rab tu re re yang // de bzhin cig gis 'grub pa dang // yang na thun par bzhi dag tu// rtsa gcig lnga bcu brgya rtsa brgyad// de lta'i 'khor lo rtsa gcig dang // lnga bcu brgya rtsa brgyad du ni// sgrub po khyad par rab 'bring
43a4(rgyud 'grel): gis// bsgrub pa gang yin khugs par bsam// nyi shu rtsa drug mtha' las na// bsgrub bya'i ming ni bcug nas su// 'gugs byed bsre bar gzhug par bya// dgug pa tshogs kyi sbyor ka la// nyin dang mtshan du brtson par bya// dgug pa tshogs kyi
43a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste gsum pa'o// / bskrad pa tshigs kyi 'khor lo ni// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni// phan gdogs pa ni nyid dang mthun// khyad par 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// lho phyogasu ni kha bltos te// sngon po la sogs
43a6(rgyud 'grel): gos gon la// bskyed rim tshul du bya ba dang // cho ga gsum gyis bya ba yin// de nas ye shes spyan drangs nas// cho ga la sogs rdzogs par bya// mdun du dur khrod ras ma la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// de sbreng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// bsgrub
43b1(rgyud 'grel): phyi'i gzugs brnyan bris nas ni// rnal 'byor ci 'dod mdun du bsam// yang na gtso bo lta'am drug po gnyis// las la med du myi rung // gtso bo drug po las ni bsdus// slob dpon gnyis pa shin tu bsdus// dkyil la khor gsum po sprul
43b2(rgyud 'grel): ba las// cho ga la sogs rdzogs par bya// tshogs kyi rdzas rnams ma lus bsag/ khyang bar tsit+ta sna tshogs dang // sha sna khrag sna la sogs pa'i// tshul khrims bsrung ldan nas bzung nas// so mangs can ni yin chod kyi// rang gi sbyor ba ma byas
43b3(rgyud 'grel): bar// gzhan la nyos dang blangs pa yis// rdzas rnams rdo rje can gyis ni// rgyud los bsngags par bcom ldan gsungs// byin pos bco bsreg byas nas ni// yon bdag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// bskor ba bdun nam gsum byas la//
43b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gying bag 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni// slob dpon+da la ni rdo rje'i glus// phyag rgya bsgyur nas drang bar bya// hUM bla ma rdo rje slob dpon ni// gnyis med ye shes mthu ldan pas// dbyings las ma g.yos rtogs med kyang // sems can gdul ba'o don slad
43b5(rgyud 'grel): du/ rdo rje can gyi sku sprul nas// rje gcig ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// tsho gas kyi 'khor lo rgya chen 'dadi// bdag gzhan lha rnams mchod pa yis// byin gyis brlabs pa mdzod du gsol// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// yi ge gsum gyi bdud
43b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi yis// bsrego sbyangs bdud rtsi zhu nas kyang // bde gshegs mchod bstod rdzogs byas nas// 'phrin las bcol bas khro bo yi// sngags bzlas pas ni bsgrub bya ste// 'khor lo rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// sgrub bya de ru bzhag nas su// khro bo
44a1(rgyud 'grel): dngag med spros pa yis// zhal nas rlung nag tshub ma ni// btang bas sgrub bya bteg nas kyang // nub byang mtshams kyis rlung lhas ni// khyad par de nyid bskyod nas kyang // na mkha' mthas gtugs sa ru bskyal// de ltar lan
44a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum lha gsum gyis// cho ga byas te bskyal bar bya// bskrang pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste bzhi pa'o// / mnan pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni// phan gdags pa ni nyid dang mthun// khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni//
44a3(rgyud 'grel): ri bo dben pa'i gnas dag tu// slob dpon lho phyogs kho bltas te// ser nag la sogs rgyan cha gon// cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas la// rnal 'byor rnams kyi mdun du ni// dur khrod ras ma dag la ni// ba bla 'am ldong ros khu bas su// gser gyi ri rab
44a4(rgyud 'grel): bris nas kyang // de 'og mthing shing dag gos ni// rgya mtsho chen po'i gzugs bris la// de gnyis dag gi bar du ni// bosgrub pa'i ming rnams byis nas kyang // shugs ldan pa dang mgo bachos dang // kun tu rgyug pa yan tshod kyi// sku gsum po
44a5(rgyud 'grel): ni thams cad kun// chos mthun spyod pas btsal nas kyang // byan po de rdzogs rdzas rnams la// yid 'ong dpag med bsham sro nas kyang // bskor nas slob dpon la phul bas// cho ga la sogs rdzogs nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga
44a6(rgyud 'grel): yis// sngags bzlas brgya rtsa brgyad pa gnyis// ting 'dzin ldan pas bsgrub bya ste// mig gi yi ge bskyed nas kyang // yi ge gnyis po ri rab dang // rgya mtsho bskyed nas mnan par bya// dkyil 'khor mtha' ma'i cho ga yis// khang pa'i phyi rol
44b1(rgyud 'grel): dag tu ni// drag po'i b+hU 'ang byas nas byung // nag pos khA ni bcang nas kyang // de steng las kyi rgya gram bri// de sogs cho ga'i sbyor bas su// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis mnan par bya'o// mnan pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor ba'i sbyor ka ste lnga pa'o//
44b2(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo nau// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni// phran gdags pa dang mthun par bsam// khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// slob dpon lce phyogs kha bltas te// mnan cing drag po rgyan cha
44b3(rgyud 'grel): gon// rnal 'byor rnams kyi mdun du ni// dur khrod ras la gzugs bris la// phur bu gri gug mtshon cha rnams// khro bo'i sngags kyis byin brlabs nas// phur bu gdab cing dri yis gtub// thun mong rdzas rnams steng du ni// gdong ba can ni
44b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyi// gsum dang ldan pa yid du 'ong // slob dpon la ni phul nas kyang // dang po bsgrub bya de nyid la// bkug nas khro bo'i mtshe nau cha yis// bsad pa'i cho ga byas nas su// rtsa gcig la sogs sngags kyis ni// de bzhin byin rlabs
44b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas su// dang po 'khor lo mchod nas kyang // cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas lnga// slar yang bsgrub bya bkug nas ni// mdun bsam bsad pa'i sbyor ba yis// cho ga rdzogs nas tha ma ni// mkha' 'gro ma yis bsad ba yis// sbyor bas cho ga rdzogs
44b6(rgyud 'grel): bor bya'o// bsang pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste drug pa'o// / bsreg pa'i tshogs kyi 'o/ re lo'i sbyor ka ni// cho ga thams cad gzhan dang mthun// dkyil 'khor gsum du sbyin sreg gsum rnal 'byor pa ni thams cad kyis/
45a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags la sogs pa'i 'khor lo yis// bskor ba'i tshul du tha ma ni// las mkhan gyis ni bsreg par bya'o// de yi cho ga thams cad ni// sbyin sreg cho gar shes par bya'o// bsreg pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor la'i sbyor ka ste/
45a2(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa'o// / bsgrub pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// cho ga thams cad gzhan dang mthun// khyang par cho ga bstan pa ni// rnam por bsam pa ma yin pa'i// mtshan ldan pom chen blangs nas ni// ming gau yi ge bskyed nas kyang // de nyid dkyil 'khor ma
45a3(rgyud 'grel): po la// bstab ste yang na rdzas la ni// bsams te byin brlabs byas nas kyang // kar ma dbyug sngon rta mgrin gyis// lan gsum lan bdun nyi shu gcig/ bstab pa'i tshogs ni mkhas pas so// de nas phyi rol dag tu ba// de ltar gnyis bstab gsum du bstag/
45a4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon man ngag shes par bya'o// bstab pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste brgyad pa'o// / thun gsum thun bzhi dag tu ni// nyin dang mtshan ni lan gsum du// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka la// rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya'o//
45a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub rnam gnyis 'dod pa dang // bar chad rnam gnyis gsal po'i phyir// tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di byas dge bas su// thams cad byang chub thob par shog/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa
45a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// lats+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
46a1(rgyud 'grel): lag na rdo rje sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs/
46b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ho traM bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// sdig pa bzhi la dang bsod nams 'phel// dgug dang dbang byed bsad pa'i sa// sgrub po rnams la phan btags
46b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// bdag gi sbyin sreg bshad par bya// dang po bkra shis gnas dag tu// brtag sogs bsdus rgyas rnam gsum bya// 'bring ni rang nyid gos sngon gyi// ting 'dzin ldan pas bka' sgo zhing // shar du kha bltas 'byung po las// yid dang
46b3(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i gtor ma sbyin// yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'am// hUM gis yang ni sbyang bar bya// rdo rje phyag rgya de bzhin shes// snying ga'i yi ges skon sbyangs shing // sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ba'o// de ni rgyas pa'i rtags sogs 'dod//
46b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bring ni sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang // me tog chom bu grangs mnyam pa// gzhung bzhin bris po rdzogs par 'dod // mtha' la mdzes pa'i snod dag la// yig 'bru gsum gyis byin brlabs nas// ting 'dzin sbyang ba kho nar 'dod// sa
46b5(rgyud 'grel): skyon sbyang ba gsum zhes bya// thabo brtsig rgyur ni khru gang la// zabasu khru byed zlum pos bskor// sor bzhi gsum ni dor byas la// rdo rje dbus su brgyas pa'i ched// thob khung dkar po rgyab tu me ri'o// steng du rdo rje phyi rol 'od zer dkar// bud
46b6(rgyud 'grel): shing dkar po khru gang tshang // tsan+dan dkar po'o mas spangs te bzhag/ mchod sbyin shing ni mdzub gang tshang // 'dab ma dang bcas rtse mo'i ngos// sngar bzhin sbyangs pas yam shing bya// dkar gsum mdar gsum mar gyi 'og/ 'bras chan 'bru ni sna tsheDa
47a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / ku sha yon chab g.yas su bzhag/ me tog la sogs bsang gtor dang // zhal bsil rnams ni g.yon du bzhag/ ga gang gzar dang ni blugs gzar gnyis// mtshan nyid rgyas par gzhan du bstan// yang na g.yas
47a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sor mo bskum pa las// yi ge hUM gi 'od zer de yi ni// rdo rje can gyi 'od zer bkug pa yis// rdul shig ye shes gong bu las// rdo rje khro bo'i dgang gzar gyur// g.yon gyi mthe bos mthe chung mnan// gong bzhin sbyangs nas blugs gzur gyur//
47a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rdo rje dril ni mdun// de nas dkar po'i rgyan cha bgo/ yid dang mthun pa ku shi'i steng // sems pa'i skyil krung shar du bltas// thab sogs tsan+dan chus gtor te// bud shing ma nor bzlum por brtsig/ de nas rtswa ni ku sha laM// oM a mr-i tA kuH
47a4(rgyud 'grel): li sarba big+h+na nA sha yaM hUM phaT/ las kyi sngags kyis gsang gtor bya// bum sbyangs bskyed dgug bzlas pa yis// rtsa gcig bdun gyis 'od zer dgang // thabs kyi kho ra khor yug la// kuM sha'i rtse mo phyi ru bstan// de nas lha yi rnal 'byor ni//
47a5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga lnga 'am cho ga gsum// skad cig bsdus rgyas shes par bya// thabs la sogs pa'i man ngag kyang // las kyi chog su shes par bya// de yang slob dpon man ngag gtso// bram ze'i khyim mam gtsub shing mes// rlung g.yab kyis sbar las kyis
47a6(rgyud 'grel): bsang // sbyang zhing bskyed nas raM dkar pos// la me lha dkar po drang srong zhi ba'i tshul// tshangs pa'i skud pa dkar por ldan// phyag nas dbyug pa bgrang phreng dang // guN+De skyabs sbyin bsnams pa'o// 'od 'phros sngor bzhin spyan drangs te// oM ba pa ka ag na ye/
47b1(rgyud 'grel): A g+hats+tsha ya/ A gats+tsha ya/ ma ma shAn+ti ng+ga ru swA hA// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings te spyan drang ngo // bgegs bskrad bstim ste mchod pa dbul// rtsa sngags nyid la mchod sngags btags te dbul// oM ba pa ka ag+na ye/ che ge mo shA na ting ku ru swA hA/
47b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes sreg rdzas dbul bar bya'o// de yi me ne ngag 'od zer ni// sum skor du ni bya ba dang // nyis skor du ni bya ba dang // bdag nyid rab tu shes par bya// bzhi skor dag dang slob ma'o// 'od zer rab tu 'phros pa las// thugs dang snying ga rgyud pa dang // gsung
47b3(rgyud 'grel): nas ngag la brgyud pa dang // dbu nas mgo la brgyud pa yi// lus dag yid kyi sgrib pa sbyang // rtsa ba gsum 'dus bskang bar bya// spyi bo gtsug nas brtsams nas ni// sdig dang srin bu zad pa'i phyir// dmar pos sreg cing dkar pos bkru
47b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrosgo dgu dag nas bsdu ba dang // thams cad kun nas bsdu ba dang // snying gar bsdus nas dbyung ba dang // til gyis gzugs brnyan byas nas nas ni// sdig pa'i gzugs la de gzhug bya// rjes rnams bdud rtsis mchod pas ni// de nas
47b5(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa de sreg bya// yang na rdzas la bstim ste bsreg/ nad rnams zhi bar byed pa ni// nad kyi ming nas smos nas ni// gong ma de bzhin bsregs pa'am// nad kyi ming dang gzugs bris la// 'od zer dmar pos bsregs nas ni// dkar pos
47b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyang zhing zhi bsams la// 'byung ba'i sgra rnams de bzhin bsam// 'byung po kun dang dgra kun yang // 'od zer bkye bas zhi bar bsam// gzugs dang ming bris zhi bar byas ma// sreg rdzas bdud rtsi 'od kyis mchod// mchod pas mnyes pas gong
48a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bskor// de lha min na 'og bzhin no// man drag de la nan tan bya// mar dang dkar gsum mngar gsum dang // yam shing mar 'og chan dang nas// de la sogs pa'i thun rdzas rnams// rim pa bzhin du dbul bar
48a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ til ni med du mi rung ngo // tha ma dgang blugs mthol bshags pa// bstod cing phrin las bcol bar bya// thugs ka nyid du pho brang bca'// skad cig de gsal ye shes dgug/ bstim la mchod pa rnam lnga ba// rtsa sngags mchod sngags bta
48a3(rgyud 'grel): te dbul// sreg rdzas kun kyang de bzhin bya// man ngag rim pa 'dir shes bya// slob dpon zhal las shes par bya// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad ni bsdus rgyas pa'o// rtsa lnga lnga bcu brgya yis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa zhi bar
48a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// sdig pa che bar gyur nas ni// nyi sa 'gyur gsum ni brgyad brgya'o// shin tu che gyur stong gi bar// de yi sdig dang bsod nams ni// che chung rab 'bring shes par bya'o// de ltar byas na nges par zhi// tha ma dgang blugs mthol bshags bya//
48a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod cing las bcol gshegasu gsol// ting 'dzin bsdus sde lhag mas// mchod nas sreg rjes gong bzhin dbul// dgang blugs la sogs rdzogs byas la// ting 'dzin bsdus te spyod lam bya// thun gsum sbyor ka sbyin sgeg la// rnal 'byor
48a6(rgyud 'grel): can gyis brtson par bya// sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka slong dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya ba ni// moN+Da la kha dog ser po laM// khru do khru phyeng khru gang du// bskor to gru bzhi 'am zur brgyad du//
48b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas sor gnyis sor bzhi can// dbus su rin chen 'bar bas mtshan// bar du mo ri'i kha khyer steng // rin chen rdo rjes bskor bar bri// ser po'i rgyan chas bgos nas ni// byang phyogs ngos su kha bltas la// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul bsgoms
48b2(rgyud 'grel): nasaHlas kyi bum pa spyang sogs bya'o// 'bras bu 'o ma can gyi shing // kha dog ser po dbus kyi cha// thag rung dbus su bcer bar bya// khru gang khru byed mdzub grang du// dri nim spongs pa yam shing bAM// las kyi bum pas gsangs nas ni/
48b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod rdzas ser po la sogs rnams// g.yon du mar sar zho la sogs// me sar brtag shing thab khung sbyang // thab bskyed me lha bskyod pa ni// sde mtshon drug pa'i gsum pa dang // gnyis pa lnga yi dngo pa ni// bskyed pa la ni bsngags par gsungs//
48b4(rgyud 'grel): me lha se rI zhal gcig ni// phyag bzhi phyag gnyis dbang chen kun// spyan drangs bstim te dbang bskur ro// mchod pa lo sogs byas nas ni// de nas sreg rjes rnams ni dbul// rtsa sngags nyid la mtha' bzhi ru// gzar bu rin chen rdo rjes bya'o/
48b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par bstan pa zhingang mthun// man dog gnyis skor la sogs kyang // ni dang mthun te khyang par ni/ 'od zer rtswa bugazhugs nas nAM// snying ga drug tu sbyin nas ni// lus kun rtsa yi rlung rnams dang // byang chub sems ni gsal rlung rgyas/ a
48b6(rgyud 'grel): na'od zer lus kun la// khyab pas tshe dang bsod nams dang // stobs rnams gang 'dod rgyas par 'gyur// tha ma dgang thugs bstod pa bya// de ni 'bar bor rnam pa'am// thugs ka nyid du gos sngon can// bskyed nas spyan drangs bstim byas la//
49a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur mchod pa la sogs bya// dgang blugs bstod nas bshags pa bya// ye shes gshegs nas ting 'dzin bsdu// yi ge bcu bdun mtha' bsgyur la// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te bya// me lha rdzas rnams
49a2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas ni// cho ga la sogs gong bzhin bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig nas bzung nas// stong gis bar du tshun chad du// sbyor ba gnyis po gang byas kyang // ji ltar 'dod pa rgyas par 'gyur// thun gsum sbyin sreg sbyor ka las// rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par
49a3(rgyud 'grel): du'o// rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o// / slob dpon d+ha bas mdzod pa rdzogs so// dbang gi sbyin sreg sbyor ka ni// sa gzhi dmar ba'i thang khung du// d+ha ga lta bu 'am zla gam bya// tshad ni rgyas pa'i chung 'bring ngo // kha khyer
49a4(rgyud 'grel): mu ran gnyis dang bzhi// gri gug gam gzhu ni dbus su mtshan// pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad la'o// dud shing dmar po cher mo'i shing // yam shing sor ni bcu gnyis sam// sor brgyad tshad la dri mar bsgo// mchod rdzas dmar po g.yas su bzhag/
49a5(rgyud 'grel): r la sogs pa'i bsreg rdzas ni// dmar po'i ro dang dris bsgyur nas// g.yon du bzhag nas stan dmar po// rol pa'i 'dug stangs nub phyogs blta// dmar po la sogs rgyan chas bgo// bud shing bcer te bcang bar bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa tshu la bsgoms
49a6(rgyud 'grel): nas me sbar la sogs cho ga bya// rlung gi yi ge bsngags pa yi ni// kha dog dmar po rlung la gnas// spyan drangs bstims te dbang bskur ro// mchod pa la sogs dbul ba ni// me lha'i bsngags la mtha' bsgyur la// cho go la sogs rdzogs nas ni// me lha'i
49b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar lha bskyed nas// spyan drangs la sogs cho ga bya// 'od zer dmar po 'phros nas ni// lha mnyes pas ni dgug par bsam// yang na man dgra sbyor ba gsum// tha ma me yi cho ga ni// me lha'i sngags kyis gsum mam bdun// lha'i ni nyi shu rtsa
49b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bsngags// bdun nam brgya yi bar du bya// de ltar sbyin sreg sbyor ka la// nyin mtshan du ni brtson par bya'o// slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa dbang gi sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka ste gsum pa rdzogs so// / bsad pa'i sbyin sreg sbyor ka/
49b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ thab khung gru gsum kha dog gnag/ rdo rje gri gug nad dang steng // bar du me ri rtse mo 'phags// bdud rtsi la sogs tshen rtsi byug/ bud shing nag po tshar ma can// yaM shing de mthun bcu gnyis tshad// mchod rdzas la sogs nag po shis// tshil
49b4(rgyud 'grel): chechen mar nag la sogs pa'i// khyad par gdod pa can gyi sha/ rgyud las byung ba'i sreg rdzas shis// nam phyeng nyin phreng dus dag tu// sa gzhi mtho ba'i stan dag la// brkyang bskum lo rdzogs rgyun cha sogs// bskyed rim tshul du byas nas ni// me sbar
49b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs cho ga bya// me lha gang 'dod bskyed nas ni// ye shes sprin drangs mchod sogs dbul// rnal 'byor sbyor ka'i man ngag ni// 'di ni shin tu zab ces pas// gzu lums rtog ge dgag pa'i phyir// slob dpon zhal las shes par bya'o// lha yi cho ga
49b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs nas na// me lha gsang ste ting 'dzin bsdu// rdzas rnams thams cad bsdus nas ni// cho ga la sogs rdzogs bya'o// drag po las kyi sbyor ka ste bzhi pa rdzog so// / bsdus pa las kyi sbyor ka ni// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni//
50a1(rgyud 'grel): gong ma bzhin du shes byas la// brko zhing bru ba ma nus pas// maN+Dal bdud rtsis byugs nas su// tshon rnams kyis ni bri bar bya// de nas cho ga rdzogs bya'o// shin tu bsdus pa'i sbyor ka ni// maN+Dal byas la me tog dgram// skad cig
50a2(rgyud 'grel): lhar bskyed byin brlabs la// bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni// cho ga la sogs rdzogs bya'o// khyad par zhi ba dag la ni// dngul dang 'khar ba dag ni shiso pa ste// rgyas pa gser dang ra gan dang // dbang ni zongs la drag po lcogs// khyi yi thod pa'ang bya bar
50a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// dbyibs rnams so sor byas pa'am// yang na bsams te byas pa'o// de rnams rnyed par ma gyur na// sa ni rin chen dang 'dra bas// kham por snod rnams kun la ni// so so'i dbyibs ni byas pa dang // bsams te byin gyis brlabs byas la// cho ga la
50a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs rdzogs bya'o// sbyin sreg las kyi sbyor ka rnams// rna bar brgyud pa'i rim pa yis// rgyud la gang ba'i don rnams kun// bdag gis sgrub pa po la bstan// 'di bstan pa yi dge bas ni// thams cad byang chub thob por shog/ sbyin srog las kyi cho ga
50a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon b+ha bso mdzad po rdzog so// / rgya gaR+Sha skad du/ badz+ra pA NI nI lAM ba ra d+hA ra ho tI br-i d+hi/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ dpa lnga gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo// mno ngag rim pa dran tsam
50a6(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i don du bshang bar bya// sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis// sgrub pa yi ni dus dag tu// sbyin sreg dag gis bsho bsad par bya// sa brtag blang zhing sbyang ba dang // byin gyis brlab cing bsrung ba dang // snying pa dag tu bya mi dgos//
50b1(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal gru gsum lho phyogs bstan// khru pang tshad la phyed brkos na// gsum dor gsum ni kha khyer ro// bdud rtsi la sogs tshon rtsis nag por bya// de dbus rdo rje steng yang de// bar du me ri rtse mo 'phags// bud shing gnag cing gdug pa'i shing // thab kyi tshad las
50b2(rgyud 'grel): sor mtho tsam// yam shing de mthun bcu gnyis tshad// mchod rdzas nag po la sogs shis// sreg rdzas mar nag rus khrag sha/ ske che shongs tshe yungs kar dang // de la sogs pa'i mthun rdzas bya// rdzas de rnams kyis gzugs brnyan bya// mchod rdzas
50b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas la sreg rdzas g.yon// byin gyis brlab cing bzhag par bya// dgang gzar blugs gzar gzhan dang mthun// yang na lag pa dag gis bya// de gnyis rdo rje dril bu yang // mdun nyid du yang bzhag par bya// las kyi bum pas thams cad gsang // dus
50b4(rgyud 'grel): ni nam phyed nyi phyed bya// rgyan cha gon la lho phyogs blta// g.yonau brkyang 'dug ste drag tu bzlas// mche ba gtsigs shing khro gnyer bsdu// dang po bskyed pa sngon song nas// me spar brtag cing bgegs bzlog bya// bzang na de ni bya mi dgos// tha mas
50b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyang zhing bskyed pa dang // cho ga gsum dang skad cig mas// me lha nag po khros pa bskyed// ye shes me lha spyan drangs bstim// gnyis su med par rgyas btab la// me lha'i sngags la mchod sngags btags te dbul// de nas sreg rjes dbul bar bya//
50b6(rgyud 'grel): de dbul ba oM man ngag kyang // khro bo dag gi cho 'phrul gyis// gzugs brnyan dgug bstim btubs te dbul// yang na rdzas mchod mnyes pa las// 'od zer khro bos dgug cing bsreg/ man ngag de la nan tan bya// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ag+ne/ che ge mo mA ra ya
51a1(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ stong rtsa brgyad nas brgya rtsa brgyad// nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du'o// yang na bsod nams ngag gi rim pa yis// brgya dang stong dang khri ru bya// de ltar byas pas nges gsod cing // khyad par du ni 'byung po gsod//
51a2(rgyud 'grel): tha ma dgang blugs bstod pa'o// de yi thugs kar gos sngon bskyed// ye shes sems dpa' spyan dang bstim// rgyus bstab mchod pa gong bzhin dbul// de nas sreg rdzas rim bzhon dbul// rtse sngags nyid kyis dbul bar bya// gong gi man ngag shes
51a3(rgyud 'grel): papar bya// dgang blugs phu lo la bstod par bya// phrin las bcol zhing gshegasu gsol// ting 'dzin bsdus te me lha bsang // rdzas rnams thams cad bsdus nas ni// me yi lha la dbul zhing bskyod pa bya// 'phrin las bocol zhing gshegs su
51a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol// ting 'dzin bsdus te spyod lam bya// slob ma rnams kyi don ched du// bdag gis man ngag 'di bkod pas// slob dang sems can thams cad kyang // gos sngon dngos grub thob par shog/ slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
51a5(rgyud 'grel): dus bzhi rtsong pa rgyas rjes su// sgrub po po yang mang 'byung zhing // dman la mos pa'ang mang du 'byung // zlu ma gus pa'ang dpag tu med// de 'dra'i sems can dpag med kyang // bsdus nas gsum du 'dus 'gyur te// sbrul dang kha dog rjes
51a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'o// rjes 'jug gnyis su shes par bya'o// sbrul la mthun 'jug sbyang ba med// sbrul rjes 'jug gi gang zag la// dam tshig nyams pa mang 'byung yang // nyams pa rnam pa gsum du 'dus// lus ngag yid du shes par bya// lus kyi
51b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig nyams pa ni// swa r+b+bas sbyongs te tshogs sbyor ltos// ngag gi nyams pa bzlas pas bdag/ yid kyi sku yi sbyor kar ltos// thun mong sbyin sreg tshogs gtor rnams// phan 'dogs sbyor kar blta bar gyis// nus pas chung ba'i rnal 'byor pas// me bshags
51b2(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal gyis sbyang bya// maN+Dal bstu na rnam gnyis te// yid kyis bsams dang dngos byed pa'o// dngos byed skyon spangs gnyen gzhi la// brgya 'am lnga bcu nyi shu lnga// lnga 'am bsdus pa gcig kyang bya// dbyibs legs mdzes pa bshom par bya// kha dog
51b3(rgyud 'grel): kun nas sgo yang rung // dkar po ma thing kha ser dmar bya// yang na yid dang mthun pa'ang rung // tshad ni khru gang yan chad bya// tshon ni dkar rtsi yung ba dang // sngon rtsi gur gum ma tshal gyis bya// pa yi rnam lnga bdud rtsi lnga// dum bu gcig por bzhag nas
51b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang // d+hi ma pa yi stan gyis bad+mo// bdud rtsi spu dang thun mong rdzas// gser sogs khwa brgyan lnga ldan du// bcug lo byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya// rang nyid cho ga gsum gyis bskyed// bdud rtsi la khyim pa'i sngags 'dis gdag/ oM mr-i tA kun Da mi d+hU
51b5(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ byin rlabs bkri shis rdzas dang sreg/ dri yis thams cad bsang bar bya// oM a mri ta kuN+Da li hrI na ha na hUM phaT// yud kar la gdab 'byung po bsreg/ rang gi snying gi'i yig 'bru las// 'od 'phros yi g+he A ru gyur// de 'phros taM yi gau las/
51b6(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi rin chen bzhi ru gyur// sngags 'di btab pas bzlas par 'gyur// oM A tsan+d+ra ma~MN+Da la hUM/ grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas// oM rat+na te maN+Da la hUM/ ban+dan ga bur kle ci sogs// mdzes pa'i snod du bzhag pa la// 'od 'phros pas ni du
52a1(rgyud 'grel): yig thim// bdug pa'i mchog tu gyur par bsam// rnal 'byor 'byor pa chung gyur yang // tsan+dan med du mi rung ngo // rgyan gyi me tog lnga gsum sogs// gcig sogs yang na lnga grangs bstan// de steng paM las
52a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar bya// sngags 'dis bdag po'i rkyen pa'o// oM pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ stong ldan 'bum ldan du gyur bsam// de'i steng du b+h+rUM yig las// gzhal yas khang ni mdzes pa bsam// badz+ra re khe'i sngags ni kun la gdab// snying ga'i 'od kyis byin gyis brlab//
52a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod rjes pad+ma mdun du bskyed// rgyu ni gong gi yi ge las// de dag thams cad rdzogs pa ni// nyams pa dgos pa gzhan mos 'jug/ de 'og dam tshig nyams pa kun// lus bkru gos bzang rgyan cha bgo/ lhar bsam rdor dril sngags byin brlab// sa bon yi
52a4(rgyud 'grel): ge 'od zer gyis// lha mo bzhi bskyed lha spyan drang // gsol ba gdab la rtsa sngags gdags// bla ma mi bskyod gyur sogs la// phyag 'tshal mchod pa thams cad bya// rgyud las byung ba'i bstod pa bya// mnyes pas 'od zer rang 'dus pas// rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma la//
52a5(rgyud 'grel): kaM dang na la sdig pa bsdu// sdom nag gzugs su gyur bsams te// phyir 'gro rlung gis mdun du dbyung // sdig pa'i gzugs dbyung sngags kyis bsreg/ lus ngag so so'i sdig sbyong ba// so so'i gnas su ni bsams te// so so'i sdig pa 'dus nas byung //
52a6(rgyud 'grel): gsod pa khro bo 'am gong sbyor bzhin// yong na lus kyi sogs chagaso gzugs// ngag gi yig 'bru sems kyi 'od// gzugasu dbyung te rgyud las 'byung // yang na lha yi 'od zer gyis// baspu'i bu gakun khyab ste// rgyud kyi sdig pa bsregs par ba'o//
52b1(rgyud 'grel): de 'og 'od zer dkar po'i rgyun// bdud rtsi lta bus lus khyab nas// gsos nas mchog tu gyur par bsam// yang na brgya rtsa rtsa ba'i sngags// bzlas pas gong bzhin sdig pa sbyong // yi ge brgya pa'i dbang por bsgyur// brgya nA sngags 'bum bzlas pa dang //
52b2(rgyud 'grel): sum cha phyed phri rab nyams sbyong // sumanyis sum cha sum cha dang // sum gnyis phri bas 'bring gsum sbyong // de las phyed phyed phri bas ni// tha ma'i nyams pa rnam gsum sbyong // sum brgya nyis brgya lnga bcu dang // nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ni// yan lag
52b3(rgyud 'grel): nga nyams pa sbyong // de 'og zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ba// nus pa yod na tshogs 'khor bya// de 'og bum pa rnams bsams te// gcig tu lha mo rnams bskyed de// cig tu rdor 'dzin mi bskyod pa// bskyed nas byin brlab tshul bzhin ba// dang po lha mos khras
52b4(rgyud 'grel): byas te// rdo rje 'dzin pas gnyis med bsam// mi bskyod bum pas dbang bskur bas// yang na gnyis kas dbang bskur bya// de 'og mchod nas 'od khrus bya// de 'og bkra shis tshig bcad brjod// gong gi sbyor ba rdzogs po kun// dam tshig nyams
52b5(rgyud 'grel): pi'i maN+Dal yin// de las gzhan du gcig kyang rung // rdzogs la brtan pa me thob par// maN+Dal 'jog nA mkha' 'gros gsong // rnal 'byor spyod lam ma zhugs par// gong ma'i maN+Dal de dag kun// yid kyis mdun du bsam byas nas/
52b6(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis dbul ba yid kyis yin// bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i dri zhim rdzas// bsku ba nang gi yin por 'dod// phyi ru phyi yi me tog yin// bla mo la brgyud maN+Dal sbyor ka 'di// blo gzhan don du bdag gis cung zad bsdus// 'khrul por gyur na
53a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod// 'di byas gsod kyis gos sngon shog/ rnal 'byor dbang gis nyes par snang // thun po legs par bshad pa dman// mthong rgya chungs na yangs pa'ang dog/ rgyud dang man ngag la brten
53a2(rgyud 'grel): mamang rnyed 'dod rnams kyis 'dod 'dod spyad du med// ma mthong 'dogs na skal rnams med par thal// slob dpon b+hA bas mdzad pa'i maN+Dal gyi sbyoraro ga rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ka ma kA ma nA ma mu mu ti// A ba li/
53a3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ las kyi ram pa mu tig phreng po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal dbyangs dang rdo rje bsnams// spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs kyi mthu ldan pas// nyon mongs gdung bzhi byung pa// zhabs kyi pad+mo la btang nas// dang ngas
53a4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu gros phyag 'tshal// sems can rnams la phan gdag so phyir// las kyi rdo rje phreng ba 'di// rgyud rnams mo lus sna tshogs nas// man ngag dgos datud te bshad// rgyal bas sngon gyi dus ngag tu// zhal nas gsungs pa tsam gyis ni//
53a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can don grub glegs bam med// de ltar rtson pa'i dus su ni// po ti dag las brten gyur pas// bla mas gnang ba'i po ti la// dga' ba chen po bskyed par bya// de nas ma ga gang zag la// ston pa thugs rje che ldan pas// sdud pa rdo rje
53a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang bdag la// rgyud pa rim gyis 'ongs pa 'di// dka' dang mi 'gal mthun pa ru// bka' yi don nyid dbyis phyin par// man ngag rim pas bstan pa lo// dga' ba chen po bskyed par gyis// man ngag 'di ltar stor pa ni// slob dber ma dzang
53b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan// dus gsum bde gshegs dang mtshungs pa// shin tu drin che gus pas bstod// sems can mun khang 'khyams pa la// mar me bsten pas lam rnyed bzhin// 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i sems can la// man ngag rin chen 'di bstan pas//
53b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya mchog gi lam rnyed 'gyur// de bas shin tu drin che bas// yul zhing sne phran bcas pa dang // rin chen la sogs nor rdzas dang // bu dang chung ma bran 'khor bcas// srog lus mno chod phul gyur kyang // bla ma'i sku drin 'khor mi 'gyur// de bas
53b3(rgyud 'grel): bad pa thams cad kyis// bla ma mnyes par mi byed na// man ngag thob kyang ltung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rgyud ni sna tshogs las// bstan pa bsrung ba'i don slad du// mthu yi sbyor ba'i man ngag rnams// dgos pa bsdus te bstan par bya// de lta'i bla ma
53b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen la// gong ma bzhin du shes par bya// mon ngag bstan pa'i slob ma ma la// rnam pa bzhi ru shes byas la// phyi ltar nang ltar gsang ba ltar// de kho na nyid bzhi ru bstan// phyi ltar bstan pa'i slob ma yang // dang por dkyil 'khor bcug nas ni//
53b5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i dbang bskur rdzogs byas la// mi zod dbyings kyi chos rnams bshad// des su rtogs pa'i rim pa ni// thun mongs dam tshig nyams blangs la// nyams ni bshags la brtson par bya// nyams pa chen po byung ba na// bshags nas rim pa
53b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur bar bya// de ni slob dpon nyid nyid la bla // gzhan gyi skabs dang sbyor shes bya// khrus la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// nyams su blangs te spyad par bya// de yi rnal 'byor mos pa ni// ma tha thun tshong chung ngu gcig/ nyin zhag 'das na
54a1(rgyud 'grel): nyams par 'gyur// dang por bskyed rim bsgom pa ni// rim gyis sam ni cig char du// bskyed pa bstan par gyur pa'i tshang // thun chod chen po bstan pa dang // kha dog spos par shes pa dang // lus ngag yid gsum
54a2(rgyud 'grel): skyon rnams ni// rim gyis bri bar gyur pa dang // khyang par lus kyi skyon bri'o// lus kyi mdog bzang lus snyoms dang // yun ring btang yang mi tsher na// bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i chad// de nas gsang dbang bskur nas ni// nang ltar bstan nas rim gyi
54a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// de ltar phyi yi gang zag ni// de nas mar la 'gro ba dkon// skye ba 'di rjes phyi ma ru// rten dang dbang po khyad par 'gyur// de ni rim gyis 'bras bu thob// nang ltar bshad pa'i slob ma ni// phyi ltar thun mong sngon du 'gro/ nang ltar man ngag khal
54a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bstan// de nas rlung dang gtum mo dang // yig 'bru thig le rnams la bsla'o// de yang gsang dbang bskur nas ni// rlung dang yig 'bru bsgom par bya// de las bstan par gyur nas ni// stong pa gsum la rim gyis brlab// de nas tshe no ma
54a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phros nas// gong ma rnams la rim gyis brlab// gsang ba ltar ni bstan pa yis// slob ma de la gong ma gnyis// thun mong du ni sngon du 'gro/ shes rab ye shes dbang bskur nas// gnyis pa la ni zhugs nas su// man ngag stobs zhugs ting
54a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis// bde ba ye shes rim bskyed nas// snang ba mched par gyur pas su// kun rdzob rgyu ma ji bzhin pa// thugasu chung pa'i stobs kyis ni// lhan cig dga' ba la bzhugs pas// spros med 'od gsal de bzhin thob// de nas rim gyis
54b1(rgyud 'grel): mthar thugs// thob par de ni ma gyur kyang // tshe dbang bsgrub pas thob pa'am// yang na rdzas dang man ngag dang // thabs kyi sbyor ba la sogs kyis// phung po bcu brtul byas nas su// ga/ ser 'gyur rtsi bzhin gyur nas kyang // de nas rim gyis 'gro ba
54b2(rgyud 'grel): 'am// yang na mchi bar gyur pa na ni// byang chub sems kyi man ngag blang // de ltar mi 'dod man ngag blang // skye ba phyi ma dag tu ni// mthar thug pa ni thob par 'gyur// de yang / tshe dbang bsgrub pa'i man ngag ni// tshe dbang bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ni//
54b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ldan zhing yon tan ldan// skyon spangs dbang thob man ngag thob// rgyud kyi don mkhas rgya chu rkyen tshang // dom can mkha' 'gro brten pa yis// lung bstan phra mo thob nas kyang // tshe srog nyams pa 'tsho byed// de yang / tshe yi rang bzhin
54b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang ni// ming zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs ni// de yi tshe yi rang bzhin ni// 'od zer kha dog lnga dkyil na// thig le byang chub sems zhes bya// dkar la 'tsher zhing snum la 'grel// de yang che chung rab 'bring gsum// sran ma yungs 'bru
54b5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu phra// mu stegs dog gi de la 'khrul// rtag pa mi 'gyur gcig pur 'dzin// de ni dam pa'i don du 'dong // 'jig rten pa yi skad du ni// bla dang che zhes kyang ni zer// bdag cag rnal 'byor pa yi gzhung // de ni kun rdzob sgyu mar 'i dang
54b6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i don du rang bzhin med// gnas ni tsit+ta'i dkyil na gnas// de yang rtsa brgyad dkyil na gnas// shin tu rtogs dka' d+hU tI nang // de nyid dbye na rnam gsum ste// de la rten pa'ang rnam pa gsum// gcig ni 'chi ba'i dus tshe 'byung //
55a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig ni lus kun khyab par gnas// de la gzhan dag gnyis su 'dod // khyad par gnas dang las kun byed// kha cig khyang byed de kun la// lud cing zag pa zur du 'bab// gzhan ni kun tu khyab cing rgyu// de la'ang
55a2(rgyud 'grel): las kyi 'phen shugs kyis// mang po leni rgyu ru 'dod// srog dang dbang po che zhes pa// ming gi rnam grangs nyid du 'dod// de yang rlung dngo nA dang ni// byang chu bo sems su byas pas na// tha dad nyid du 'dod pa'ang yod// shes po bsdus dang ma bsdus
55a3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ gnas skabs don gyis 'jug pa yin// tshe bsgrub pa yi cho ga ni// rang gi snying gar 'od kyi gzhal yas khang // de yi dkyil na a dkar gnyis// phra 'dus zla ba kha sbyor gyur// de na hUM gnyis 'phro 'du las// rdo rjer gyur pas steng 'og man ni//
55a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe rnams 'phrog pa'i 'byung po de// drag po sbyor ba la sogs kyis// sngags brjod phyag rgya bcas nas su// bcom zhing brlag nas med par byas// lha mo'i sprul pas tshe rnams bkug/ sngags brjod phyag rgyas bkug nas kyang // bsrung zhing ye shes che
55a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dbab// dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni// rdo rje sor mo nang bsnol te// mthe bong gnyis kyi nang du dbab// oM badz+ra A yu She hUM/ oM be sho ya a a/ lus la til mar bzhon du bstim// khyod par snying gi dkyil du bstan// baM yig dmar po
55a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pa las// man ngag la sogs sbyor bas bcing // bsdu zhing gzung ba'i man ngag ni// shes rab la sogs thabs kyis bstan// tshe yi yon tan la sogs ni// rgyud la sogs pa shes par bya// tshe dang dum bu rnam smin gsum// de gsum
55b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs sogs mthun pa yang // gcig la gcig bsten mdung khyim 'dra// yi ge gsum gyi man ngag kyang // gnas gsum dag tu bcing ba yin// sbyor ba la sogs bcing bar bya// de ni tshe sgrub man ngag go// byang sems blang ba'i man ngag kyang // de yang
