84a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba po rnams thams cad ni// bde gshegs sprul pa nyid du bltos/ 'gro ba mo rnams thams cad ni// bde gshegs yul gyi lha mor blta// snod kyi 'jig rten 'di dag kun// lha yi gzhal yas nyid du blta// thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
84a5(rgyud 'grel): du/ thabs dang shes rab rol pas spyod// nyon mongs drag po langs tsam na// glang dang gang 'dul gnyen por bsten// 'gro ba sems can dron bya snyim// 'dug na byang chub snying por 'jug/ nub mo nyal ba'i tshe na ni// chos nyid stong pa'i ngang
84a6(rgyud 'grel): las nyal// dge ba'i bsam pas nyal bar bya'o// bsdus pa'i spyod lam bya ba ni// dang po nang par langs chen// nyin mo thun mtshams pa ni rnams dang // nub mo nyal po'i dus dag tu// rnal 'byor pa nyid gong bzhin bya// shin tu bsdus
84b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i spyod lam ni// dang por nang par langs dus dang // nub mo nyal ba'i dus dag tu// spyod lam gong bzhin dran par bya// rnal 'byor de rnams kun la yang // sngon du byang chub sems bskyed cing // tha ma dge ba byang chub bsngo// de ltar
84b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan tu byas pa yis// dge ba'i mthu yi byin rlabs kyis// phyag rgya mchog gi grogs 'gyur zhing // thun mong dngos grob thob par 'gyur// dngos grub rnams gnyis ma thob kyang // lha dngo mi'i rigs skye zhing // bsod nams lhun grub
84b3(rgyud 'grel): thob paro 'gyur// bsgom dang bzlas pa'i bsdus rgyas ni// brgyud dang sgrub thabs la sogs su// bla ma'i zhal gyis man ngag gis// shes par byas te nyam su blang // sgom pa bstan pa'i rim pa yang // bla ma 'chad pa'i brgyud shes
84b4(rgyud 'grel): pas// slob ma nyid kyis shes par bya// rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la// rdzogs pa'i man ngag rim pa bstan// de las gzhan pa'i slob ma la// bskyod pa'i rim pa'i man dgra bstan// de la bstan nas phyi dus su// rdzogs pa'i rim pa
84b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan du rung // de las gzhan po kha cig la// zab mo don rnams mi bstan par// mi zad dbyings kyi chos rnams bstan// de rnams gsumi gyo 'bras bu ni// skye ba 'di las 'byung ba dang // skye bo bdun las 'byung ba'o// 'jig
84b6(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum gyi las kyis ni// thun mong dngos grub kho na 'grub// dper na ston gyi me tog bzhin// 'bras bu dag la spro bskyed la// brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha gyon// le li spangs shing nyin mtshan du// rnal 'byor dag ni chag
85a1(rgyud 'grel): mi byA// snyoms las le los chug gyur nas// bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa na// rtsa ba'i rab 'bring tha ma la// thams nyams pa'i char 'gyur bas// nyams pa sbyang zhing slar gsol ba/ blam
85a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i dus su ni// yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga yis// sbyangs pas slar ni sor chung 'gyur// 'di dang mi ldan sngags pa ni// glang chen myos 'dra ji bzhi no// 'di dang ldan pa'i sngags pa ni// seng phrug seng ge'i gdung 'tshe ba 'dra// de
85a3(rgyud 'grel): la nan tan cher bskyed cing // phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag/ rnal 'byor gyi spyod lam brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
85a4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyis rgyud dang mi 'gal bar mdzad pa'o// dzo ya A ka ra dang / mar pa lots+tsha bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab po//
86a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs bzhug so//
86b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gos sngon can la phyag 'tshalo// phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang por khrus byas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ yan lag bdun dang
86b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// rang gi snying khar nyi ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyis gos sngon po can dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa spyan drangs te/ sa bon las byung ba'i mchod pas mchod do// /
86b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'di skad du/ dpol phrag na rdo rje dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs so 'tshal lo// bdag lus ngag yid gsum kyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// mchod pa bla na
86b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi char dag pa'i sems kyis sprul zhing mchis na// thugs rje'i dbang gis bzhes su gsol// thog ma med pa'i dus na/ dug gsum gyi dbang gis sdig pa ci bgyis rnams so sor bshags shing slan chad
86b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang sdom par bgyid do// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag bskul ba'i sA la bzhugs pa rnams la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskul bar bgyi'o// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams la 'khor ba ji srid par
86b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba 'debs so// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / dngos po thams cad dang bral ba stong pa nyid kyi
87a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin du thugs bskyed pa bzhin// bdag gis kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// gawAn yang bdag gis 'phags bu rnams la lus phul te/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'dar bar bgyi'o// de nas rgyu ba dang /
87a2(rgyud 'grel): mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du bsam par bya'o// de'i ngang las yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla ba dang nyi ma'o// de'i steng du hUM sngon po las byung ba'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i gos sngon can gyi gzugasu gyur
87a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// de nas yungs kar phyogs su gtor bar bya zhing / oM AH big+h+nAM ta kring hUM phaT tsis brjod cing bskrad par bya'o// ljags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te/ sa bon las 'od zer spros te spyan drang bar bya'o// gzungs kyi mjug la/ oM na ma
87a4(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya muN+Dal ma de/ A gots+tsha ya A gan+d+ha ya/ pra be sha ya bri be sha ra ya/ a ba lo ka ya a ba lo ka ya hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba bo tags te spyan drang bar bya'o// de nas de la mchad pa dbul bar bya'o// hri ti ha zhes arga yi'o// badz+ra
87a5(rgyud 'grel): buSh+pe pU dzA mo g+ha sa mAgra s+pha ra NA sa ma s+ye swA hU~M/ zhes byas me tog dbu la dbul lo// oM badz+ra d+hU pa pU dzA mo g+ni saM mu drA sto r+yA Na swa mA ye swA hU~M/ zhes pos bdug pa mdun du'o// oM badz+ra dI bau pU dza me b+hi sa mu drastA ra Na s+ya mra ye
87a6(rgyud 'grel): sAt+ma/ zhes pas mar me spyan la'o// oM badz+ra g+hin d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes pas dri thugs kar ro// oM badz+ra nai bi te pU dze me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya~M swA hA/ zhes pas zhi ba zos a la~M du'o// oM badz+ra g+hi ti g+han+d+ha g+han+d+ha
87b1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA// zhes pas sil snyan spyan la'o// de nAs bstod do// oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes pas gnyis su med par bya'o// de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas rlung gi snying khA raM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i steng du/ rang gi sa bon la bzlas par
87b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i yi ges bskor ba bya'o// blos dmigs par bya ste/ sngags bzlas par bya'o// sngags ni 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho pAna? nAM gA a d+hi pa ta ye/ i d+hun nI lAM b+ha ra d+ha ra sha ri rAM/ badz+ra bA ni hr-i da yan/ yA sa ma ti kra ma ti/
87b3(rgyud 'grel): ut+sa da nan/ b+ha bi shud+d+he/ tr-id+ya thA/ bud d+ya bud byA/ bi b+hu ta/ ma ti pra ba tA/ ho ra ha ra/ ne ga nan/ pra ha ra pra hA ra/ nA ga nan/ ts+tshan da ts+tshin da/ nA ga hri da ya ni/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ nA ga d+ha ma ni/ bi si ma ta/ nA ga sha ri Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya/
87b4(rgyud 'grel): nA ga na ya na ni/ tad+ya thAM/ nA ga sI d+ha ra Na ya hU~M phaT/ nA ga kro satwa na ya hUM phaT/ nI lAM ba sa ta na ya hUM phaT/ oM pra ti ha te ba la ba ra pra ma ye hUM phaT/ kring tan ta ya phaT/ krid tan tA ru pa ya phaT/ ro Sha ni ya phaT/ tra sa nA ya phaT/
87b5(rgyud 'grel): kuSh+man dod sa da na ya phaT/ pa ta bi sha tsa bi na shaM ka ra ya phaT/ ha sa he sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ b+hak+Sha ya b+huk+Sha ya/ sarba big+ha nan bi na sha ka ra ya phaT/ sar+b+ba sha truM saM ga bi na shra ka ra ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha re badz+ra pa Ni
87b6(rgyud 'grel): rAdz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA// zhes bzlas par bya'o// gal te gtong bar 'dod na/ bzod par gsol ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo zhing / smon lam gdab bo// de nas oM AHhUM muHzhes pas ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol// de nas
88a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mi dmigs pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags brjod par bya'o// tha ma la gus pa dang / shes rab dang / snying rje dang ldan zhing / khyad par du gang la dad pa cher yod pa de la/
88a2(rgyud 'grel): myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po nags po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogaso// / pagan rdo rje gtum po rtse lnga pa'i dkyi bo tshig bcug go//
88a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsan+da badz+ra kro d+ha de ba pany+tsa nA ma maN+Dal la bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ khro bo gtum po lha lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// gtum po khros pas zhes sdang 'joms
88a4(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// rdo rje 'chang la rab btud nas// de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad// dur khrod la sogs gnas chen du// bza' skar dus tshes bzang ba la// bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i slob dpon gyis// sa brtag pa dang
88a5(rgyud 'grel): spang ba dang / me tog sngon po lnga dor zhing // byin dung ma byin lhas kyang brtag/ phan tshun mang du Sh+Tang ut+pal kha// oM badz+ra pA Ni puSh+pa pU dzA hUM/ sngags der sgyur zhing med dang mtshungs// gtso ma gser mdog rin chen la// rngan
88a6(rgyud 'grel): ba byin la bsgo bar bya// sa sbyang ba dang bsrung bya ste// dri yi thig le me tog khar// dam tshi ga lha mo bskyed byas la// ye shes lha mo ri gug gzhug bstim// sa yi cho ga rdzogs byas la//
88b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha yi sta gon ni// maN+Dal yid 'od dri med kha ra// dri yi thig le me tog lnga// oM hUM traM khaM dag las dam tshig dag las 'khor lho bskyed byas te// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la// mchod gtor bstod pas mnyes byas
88b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ bdug pa lag thogs pus btsugs te// dril bu'i sgra sgrogs lnga ldan hUM// de nas gsol pa gdab bya ba// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin po'i mchog/ rig sngags rgyal po dge ba'i mgon// gzungs sngags gsang s+phoDa
88b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gtso// gsang ba'i bdag po phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor bdag nyid 'dri bar 'tshal// slob ma rnams la rtse ba dang // khyed rnams mnyes par mchod phyir du// bcom ldan bdag
88b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid gus pa la// de yi gnang ba ro mdzad pa'i rigs// sangs rgyas 'gro don byas dron la gsol// byang chub sems dang gsang sngags lnga// 'jig rten skyong dang mthu chen dang // yang dag rdo rje'i spyan mnga' ba'o// sems can
88b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa dga' rnams la// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis// rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor ni// yo byad ci 'byor pas 'dri na// deng bdage slob mar bcos pa la// thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nos su// tshogs pa thams cad
88b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas// ra ba dra bso mtshams bcang ngo // hUMHnyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga ni bcom ldan gtum po yin// nga yi
89a1(rgyud 'grel): bka' las ma 'bar cig/ nga yi bka' las 'da' byed na// rdo rje khro bos mgo 'gem so// ma 'dug song zhig log 'dren tshogs// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na yA ho/
89a2(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga wAn badz+ra pA Ni hUM/ Ar+ya te tsa ra ti na hUM phaT// / de nas bum pa'i sta gon ni// gser la sogs pa 'bum pa ni// lto bo che la mgrin pa ring // skyon lo si gus pa dang brel bas// las kyi bum bA me gtogs pa//
89a3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan ldan pas lho grangs bstun// nas dang gro dang so ba 'bras// til dang lan tshwa bu ram dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi rnam pa lnga// gser dngul zangs lcags mu tig dang // bya kri seng kri hA si ha sa de ba dang // kri ka ra ni tra sman lnga dang /
89a4(rgyud 'grel): dri chen dri chung mar zil mdangs// mi rta khyi bya glang po sha/ dmar ser 'o ma gzhon nu'i chus// phyed mtho tsam du dgang bar bya// kha tshar ma nyams ras kyis bcings// 'bras bu can gyi kha brgyan te// dris bdug maN+Dal khar
89a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag lA// mi dmigs bruM baM bdud rtsi yauso// rgya mtsho'i dbus su ri rab che// sprin sgra bsnol bas sna tshogs sgra// lte bor bruM las gzhal yas drag/ paM las chu skyes dam tshig bskyed// oM shes 'khor l-i spyan drangs la/
89a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim// sku gsung thugasu byin gyis brlab// spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur ro// mchod dang gtor mas bstod byas la// gzungs thags ldan pas bsnyen pa 'bum// de nas slob ma'i sta goni//
89b1(rgyud 'grel): rdorje slob ma khrus byas la// slob ma sgo yi drung gnas nas// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de ni
89b2(rgyud 'grel): stsal du gsol// byang chub sems ni stsol du gsol// sangs rgyas chos drang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum ni sbrul du gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de lta
89b3(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum gsol bau tA pa nas// slob dpon gtso bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs// tshigs bcad 'dris ni gsang sngags sbyin// bu tshur theg pa chen po yis// gsang sngags tshul spyod cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bstan pararu bya//
89b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // rdo rje gsong stag rab bsgoms pas// dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med bskyod//
89b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam me de// shAkya sing gre skyob pa yis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// 'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogs nas// 'khor lo bskor nos mya ngan 'das// de bas
89b6(rgyud 'grel): kun mkhyen tho bo bya'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de nas skyobs 'gro sdig bshags bya// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyi// mnyam nyid thugs la phyag 'tshalo// sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshalo// dus gsum sangs rgyas
90a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngor gnas pas// gsang ba'i bdag po phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la// bdag yid dang
90a2(rgyud 'grel): bas phyag 'tshalo// badrag gi thog mtha' med pa nas// sdig pa bgyis pa ma lus kun// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// spyan snga ro da lta mthol zhing bshags// tha mo dkon mchog gsum po dang // gsang sngags kun bdag rdo rje
90a3(rgyud 'grel): tsan/ di rigs 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor kun// dge ba mdzad la rjes yid rang // bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// gsang sngags bdag por dbang bskur la// gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor
90a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bskul// skyon bral mthu ldan khyed rnams la// skye rgyan 'chi mi mnga' yang // 'gro ba'o don du sku sprul la// mthun 'jug mya ngan mi 'da' gsol// bdag gis dge ba ci bsags kun// gcig tu bsdus te sdoms na su//
90a5(rgyud 'grel): bla med byang chubo thob bya'i phyir// sems can kun gyi don du bsngo// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon+da dang // bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje nyid// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ kun
90a6(rgyud 'grel): nas dang pos dgongasu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// dus 'di nas su bzung nas su// byang chub snying por gnas kyi bar// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bla na mong pa'i byang chub sems// dam pa bdag
90b1(rgyud 'grel): gis bskyed par bgyi// 'gro ba sems can thams cad la// pha ma spun dang ming snying sems// bu pho bu mo'i sems bskyed de// ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi// dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung
90b2(rgyud 'grel): bgyi// srid pa chags par zhi la bsgrol// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa btang // tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa bsrung // bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa bsgom// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa spyang // bsam gtan pha rol phyin par gnas// shes
90b3(rgyud 'grel): rang pha rol phyin pas byin// pha rol phyin pa 'di drug go// mthar gyis brlab dang mthar gyis spyad// mthor gyis bsgrub la nan ton bya// de nas sdom pa dbog bya ba// srog chags rnams ni bsad mi bya// ma byin par yang slang mi bya//
90b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa dag ni spyad mi bya// rdzun pa dag kyang yong mi smra// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yis// chang ni myos par btung ma yin// sems can gdul bya ma gtogs pa// bya bau ma yin thams cad spang // dam pa nye bar gnyer byas shing // rnal 'byor
90b5(rgyud 'grel): can la bsnyen bkur bya// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // de ga gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// ci nus pa yis rjesu bsrung // sems can don la rgyab phyogs min// theg pa dman pa dor mi bya// 'khor
90b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dag kyang yod ma spang // rtag tu mya ngan 'da' mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// de la brnyas brli bya zhing // phyag rgya bzhin pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma bsgom par mi bya'o// bla ma la gus bka' mi 'da'// stong nyid snying
91a1(rgyud 'grel): rje rab bsgom zhing // 'dor na rtsa ba yan lag gis// dam tshig nyin mtshan grangs kyis bsrung // de nas bla mas gsungs pa yis// sdom pA legs par bsrung bar bya// tshul khrims zhes bya sogs pa nas/
91a2(rgyud 'grel): dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni// ji srid snying po byang chub par// bdag ni rab tu sdom par bgyid// de nas slob ma'i gnas gsum du// rdo rje khu tshur dri yi chus// thig le nyi zla pad+ma stengs su// yi ge gsum gyis sbyor po las// sku
91a3(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlab// las kyi chu yis gtor zhing bsrung // oM badz+ra u ta ka hUM phaT// mchod pa lha yis legs mchod de// spyi bor me toge spos byin la// mAr me dr-i ni snying gar ro// dril bu dkrol zhing pra sh+los gcing
91a4(rgyud 'grel): mdun// de nas tshigs bcang sngags 'dis sbyin// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su// 'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par// mchod pa kun dang ldan pa yis// dus kun tu ni bde legs shog/ oM pany+tsa ling ke a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// de nas
91a5(rgyud 'grel): so shing sbyin par bya// 'o ma can gyi shing dag la// sor brgyad dang ni bcu gnyis pa// me tog can ni dor bar bya// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams// u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin// rgya lamA na ni 'byung 'gyur rama?// zhes
91a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs chos bshad bya// oM tra kisti ba tri shud d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA wa badz+ra ata ma ko haM// de nas bsrung skud sngon po yis// mdud pa lnga ldon byin brlabs can// dpung pa g.yas g.yon dag tu cing // ku sha stan gding mtshan
91b1(rgyud 'grel): ma gdab// dun na phur bu'i sbyin sreg bya// bzang na mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma gtad// de nas thig ni gdab bya ba// ma dang taM gi ting 'dzin gyis// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor mkha' wa bteg/ gzhon nus srad bu bkal ba la// kha dog dkar po'i thig
91b2(rgyud 'grel): gdab ste// mdzes pa'i snod du bcug nas kyang // las kyis bsang zhing lhar bskyed la// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs mchod// nyis 'gyur ched la srad bu bstim// rang nyid rdor 'dzin lhar sprul nas// byin gyis brlab dang bsrung ba
91b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir// bde gshegs mchod phyir na mkha' gdab// sgo dbye gsal phyir sau thig gdab// tshangs thig god pa ste bgegs bskrad do// oM badz+ra rak+Sha hUM phaT/ slob dpon shar bltas slob ma nug/ dza gsum brjod la lag tu gtad//
91b4(rgyud 'grel): dong po nub ste de nas ni// lho bya'o gdab ste de nas shar// nub byod lho naso mtshams bzhir thig/ rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya// cha bzhi cha brgyad rim bzhin no// dbye ba la sogs shes par bya// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas//
91b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khyams 'khod pa dang mi 'dod pa// de dag thams cad shes por bgyi// sngags 'dis thig ni gdab par bya// oM badz+rI sa ma/ domar seru smin mya sma rA khro// kham nago gyen rjes dbu yi sku// zla chos mche dkar ljags glog 'khyug/ lto
91b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gros brgyan cing stag sham can// yum dang gnyis med thugs las 'khyud// sprul pa gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms// bgegs chen bsnol ba'i gdan la gzhugs// drag po ma dpung dbus na 'phro// bcom ldan thugs kyi
92a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu lag/ legs pa'i gnam pa 'ang byed do// rdo rje gnas 'on// bdUng las rgyab byud dri'i gdan// gas n+thi g+ha phyug sas ma g+sa gyur// sman gsus gas pas pad+ma g+sa
92a2(rgyud 'grel): brjes lto 'gro stag gis brgyan// g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul// g.yon pa sdig mdzub rab tu gdengs// me dpung 'bar po'i rnam pa can// thugs la rdo rje'i khyung sprul lo// lho ru rin chen gtum pi ni// gzi brjid 'bar ba gshin rje'i
92a3(rgyud 'grel): gdan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// spyan gsum zhabs bgrang mche ba can// sgra brjes lto 'gro stegs gis brgyan// g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul// g.yon pa sdig mdzub rab tu gdeng // me ri 'bar ba'i rnam pa can//
92a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs las rin chen khyung sbrul lo// nub tu pad+ma gtum po ni// rngam pa'i sgra sgrogs klu dbang grang na// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// spyan gsum mtsho gtsigs zhabs bgrad pa// skra mdzes pa lto 'gro stag gis brgyan//
92a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun po'i tshul// g.yon pa sdig mdzub rab tu gdeng // me dpung 'bar ba'i rnam pa can// thugasau las pad+ma'i khyung sprul lo// byang du las kyi gtum po ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gnod sbyin gdan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis
92a6(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sngo// spyan gsum zhabs bskrad mche ba can// sgra mdzes lto 'gro stag gis brgyan// g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul// g.yon pa sdig mdzub rab tu gdeng // mi ri 'bar ba'i rnam pa can// thugs las las kyi khyod sbrul lo//
92b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas lnga/ dzaHhUM baM ho// phyag rgyu bzhi/ ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags// rjesu yid rang bskul zhing gsol// dge ba ci bsags thams cad kun// byang chub thob phyir
92b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bsngo// phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim// 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur ro// de nas slob ma khrus byas la// yol bas par gcas gdong g.yogs bcings// sngags
92b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis ni phyag byed gzhug/ oM badz+ra na ma mi hUM/ oM badz+ra nA mo te hUM/ oM badz+ra na ma na mo hUM/ bde ba 'dod pa su zhig yin// bla mas don ni dri bar bya// bskal ldan bde chen bdag cag lags// slob mas lan ni gdab par bya//
92b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas bla mas bde ba'i glu/ dgyes pas blang bar bya baM 'di// oM bud d+ha re/ pU dza me g+ha/ ut+pa gA te/ s+pha ra na hi maM/ ga ga na khaM swA hA/ de nas slob mas gsol gdab pa// ston pa khyod la bdag dga' bo// bla ma dam pas dgongasu
92b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol// byang chub chen por tshul bstan pa'i// byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol// de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos drang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsumo ni bdag la stsol// lus dang longs spyod 'di
92b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhes la// dbang bskur dam pa mdzad du gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de yi lan ni sbyin bya ba// bu tshur theg pa chen po'i snod// gsang sngags spyong ba'i tshul 'di ni//
93a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// tshul chen khyod kyis shes par bgyis// dkyil 'khor dam par dbang bskur gyis// bu yi blo gros brtan par byos// de yis nang ni sdig pa bshags// rjes su yi rang
93a2(rgyud 'grel): bskul zhing gsol// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba gdab// byang chub sems bskyed lus la phul// sdom pa phrog te gzung du gzhug/ bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba chos sdud tshul khrims dang // sems can don
93a3(rgyud 'grel): byed tshul khrims gsum// deng nas gzung ste bzung b.ro bya// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen
93a4(rgyud 'grel): po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin nam dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po lus byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// yang dag nyid du
93a5(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po yis// sdom pa thams cad ldan pa rA ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// de nas rdo rje'o lam khrid la// tshigs bcad sngags 'dis dam chu blud//
93a6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor bcom ldan bskyed byas la// bdud rtsi'i chu ni blung bar bya// 'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// dam las 'das na dmyal bar bsreg/ dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'byung // rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu yis bkru/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ las
93b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi chu yis dgegs bskrad de// phreng bas mgul nas bcing bar bya// oM badz+ro d+hAka hUM/ rdo rje thugs kar bzung byas nas// dam tshig khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis// tshigs bcang sngags 'dri brjod par bya// de ring phan chad khyod kyis ni// phyag na rdo rje nga
93b2(rgyud 'grel): yin pas// da yi bka' nyan gsung sdod pas// khyod kyis byas ni dngos grab 'byung // ma byas rdo rje dmyal ba r-i ltung // de phyir bka' nyan gsung snod cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas rdo rje spyi bor bzhag/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po
93b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dis// de nyid ma mthong mi rnams mduni// dus kun tu ni mo smra cig/ mi smras dngos grubo myur ba yon// smras na khro bos mgo 'gemaso// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ de nas sngags 'dis yol ba bsal// oM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha ho// lan gsum
93b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod la mthong ngam dri// dbang thob phyir nu yon kyang dbul// sngags 'di me tog dkyil 'khor dor// oM sarba ta thA ga te puSh+pa dza hUM/ sngags 'dis slob ma'i mgo la gdags// oM rAt+na ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis/
93b5(rgyud 'grel): lha 'khor lo bskul byas la// slob ma'i snying gar gzhug par bya// oM maN+Dal de bA ba tiSh+Tha ldan// tshigs bcad sngags 'di sde gdong g.yogs bkrol// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// ma rig ling tog bsal ba ltar// de
93b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin de ring bu khyod kyi// ma rig ldongs pa'i mun pa bsal// oM badz+ra pA sha hU~M/ ye shes khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas bkrol bar bya'o// de rnams las kyi bla mas bya// lha ngo bstan la dbang bskur ro// ji ltar
94a1(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum sangs rgyas la// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ltar// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du// bde gshegs bum pa'i dbang mchog stsol// de skad gsol ba gdab par bya// yab yum snyoms
94a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs 'od zer las// bde gshegs 'od bskul bumA par thim// cha 'dres 'i de zhu bdud rtsi des// spyi bor chu yi dbang bskuro// mi bskyod pa yis spro bsdu yis// tshigs bcad sngags 'dis bum pa sbyin// hUM sku gsung dam tshig
94a3(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i// ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// mi bskyod pa yi dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra AM daR+sha shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ rin chen 'byung ldan spro bsdu yis// tshogs btsu sngags 'dis cod
94a4(rgyud 'grel): ban+da sbyin// traM sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid do// dbu rgyan rin chen bla na med// dbu rgyan rin chen mchog 'gro ba// rdzogs sangs rgyus su dbang bskuro// oM badz+ra sa ma tA dz+nyA na rat+na mu hUM ta ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mI/ 'od dpag med
94a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgo spu yis// tshigs bcad sngags 'dis rdo rje sbyin// hri sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang // mi phyed rdo rje gsal ba las// chos rnams kun gyi sgor gyur pa// rdo rje chos kyi dbring bskur ro// oM pra t+yA be kA Na dz+nyA na
94a6(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ don rnams grub pa'i spro bsdu yis// tshig bcad sngogs 'dis dril bu sbyin// hi thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'gro don mnyam med byed pa dang // mchod pa'i las rnams rdzogs byed pa// dril bu
94b1(rgyud 'grel): lngas kyi dbang bskur ro// oM krI t+yA nuSh+TA na dz+nyA na pa ne badz+ra A b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ rnam snang mdzad kyi spro bsdu yis// tshogs bcad sngags 'dis ming sbyin no// oM rdo rje'i ming du dbang bskur bas// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// cis kyang
94b2(rgyud 'grel): mi tshugs mi shigs bya ra// rdo rje'i mau nga du rab grags shig/ oM pI sho d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na a b+hi Shony+tsa mi// chos rnams skye ma lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la dri ma med// me long gi ni gzugs brnyan bzhin// rang gi lha ni
94b3(rgyud 'grel): shes par gyis// oM AHhUM/ me long dag gi dbang yin no// rdo rje brtul zhugs dbang bskur ba// phreng ba chen po skye la skyon// 'od zer 'phro 'dus byin brlabs la// tshigs bcad sngags 'dis sbyin par bya// ma skyes
94b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsang ba'i thugs// 'gag pa'i shes rab dril bu'i gsung // gnyis ming ye shes kyi chos sku// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'chang // khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu 'o chang // phyag no rje
94b5(rgyud 'grel): rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// oM a A/ i i/ ur u ru/ u a U A al Al/ be she na yan/ gre b+ha be/ shud+d+ha ni swA hA/ badz+ra pa Ni hUM phaT/ de nas lung bstan dbong bskur ni// yon gyis bla ma mnyes byas
94b6(rgyud 'grel): la// phyag 'tshal nas ni gsol ba gdab// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod cing gsol mdzad pa// bdag la gdung ba'i don gyi phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje bdag la gsol// bu de seng ge'i khrir bzhag la// rdo rje
95a1(rgyud 'grel): dril bu lag byin te// 'od zer spro bsdu ting 'dzin bya// de nas tshigs bcad sngags 'dis sbyin// bu tshur rdo rje'i slob dpon gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo bskor// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las// 'gro
95a2(rgyud 'grel): baba'i don du khyod kyis bskor// oM haM kA d+horma tsakra pra pa tu ka swA hA/ sarba ta thA gau ta d+harmA tsakra a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ de nas gsong ba'i dbang bskur ni// stegs bu bdud rtsi lnga yis byug/ pi pa ra ta 'am zhing ba'i khar// mtshan ldan rig ma'i b+ha
95a3(rgyud 'grel): ga la// dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du rol// tsan+d+ra li ni rab sbar bas// e waM de ba haM las 'dzag/ spro bsdu byang chub sems de sbyin// bu yis mgon la 'di skad gsol// rgyal ba thams cad rol pa yis// sangs rgyas chu bo rgyu
95a4(rgyud 'grel): phrab ste// nyon mongs sdig pa sbyangs pa bzhin// bdag la byang chub sems dbang stsol// bye ba phrag brgyas grong+ga klung // ji snyed mgon po thams cad kyi// gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdud rtsi rgyan// mgon po bdag gi gsung la gsol//
95a5(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bcad sngags 'di snga bu la sbyin// yab yum snyoms zhugs bde ba'i rgyun// gnyis med sems kyis de gang ba// thabs dang shes rab bdud rtsi'i mchog/ bu yi ngag la sbyin par bya// oM a mr-i ta gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa
95a6(rgyud 'grel): mi/ mgrin par gsung la sbyin par bya// des kyang a ho su kas btud// de nas shes rab ye shes dbang // maN+Dal dris byugs dri med khar// bdud rtsi dkar dmar thig le gdab// steng du stag gi sham thabs khar// mtshan
95b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan rigs ma khrus byas bzhag/ gnas lnga ru ni lha lnga dgod// spyan drangs bstim zhing mchod bstod bya// de nas slob mas gsol ba gdab// phyogs dus bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'grub// bdag kyang
95b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bsgral slad du// gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol// mgon pos kyang ni lan sbyin pa// bu tshur shog cig rigs kyi bu// gang lo dga' ba'i dngos grub ni// shes rab ma la brten pras 'gru bo// rtag tu shes rab don
95b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas// thabs la skrag par mi bya zhing // pad+ma'i steng du lce yis reg/ dri chen dri chu bza' bar bya// khu ba dkar dmar bdud rtsi mchog/ lce yi dbus su brtan par bzung // dka' thub med cing brtul zhugs che// 'di dang ldan
95b4(rgyud 'grel): na 'grub par 'gyur// de nas slob mi'i mig phye ste// yum gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor blta// rtag tu gcer bu'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje dril bu kha phye nas// mthong ba'i blos ni gsol ba gdab// rmang byung btsun mo'i b+ha ga mchog
95b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thams cad bskyed pa'i gnas// mo smon ma grol ba yi sa ra// ye shes dam pa bskyed du gsol// shes rab yum gyi b+ha ga la// slob mo dpa' bo'i tshul du rol// snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba yis// A li kA li
95b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med las// brkyong mas ro ma mnan pa bstan// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le ni// gsum mos ri bong can haM 'dzag/ dkyil drang bzlog dang dgram zhing bstim// dga' bzhi gnyug pa mnyam su myong // shes rab gsal
96a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dang la gnas// tshigs bcad sngags 'das byin gyis brlag// hUM thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// ye shes chen po mchog gi lam// srid dang ni las rab grol ba'i// bde ba chen/
96a2(rgyud 'grel): po bde ba'i mchog/ yum la brtan pa'i bde ba 'dis// bu la byin brlabs dbang bskuro// oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na A b+hi Shin+tu mi/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// brang ba chen po zab mo'i chos// dngos grub dam pa bdag gi
96a3(rgyud 'grel): bladra // oM dz+nyA na sid+d+hi hUM/ de yi dngos grub dam pa blung // bzhi pa tsha ste nyid mngon rtogs dbang / lhan cig skyes pa bdud rtsi'i ro// mtshan du yod pa ma yin te// srid dang mya ngan 'das pa grol// de nas bkra
96a4(rgyud 'grel): shis smon lam gau da ba// sngags 'dis bzod pa gsol bar bya// oM badz+ra tsaN+DA sa ma ya// ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra tsiN+Da tre no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wA/ su po Sh+yo mi b+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+hi
96a5(rgyud 'grel): me pra yats+tsha/ sarba d+harmA su tsa me tsit+taM kle yaM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ho ha ho/ b+ha ga wAne/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ badz+ra mA me muny+dzi/ badz+ri b+ha we/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa aHbum pa'i lha dang dkyil 'khor lha// spyan drangs
96a6(rgyud 'grel): namakhar gshegs su gsol// dam tshig 'khor lo rang la bsdu// de nas spyong la ma rnam bzhi ni// 'gro ba'i don du dge ba spyad// gnyis po mi 'bral nga rgyal ldan// 'di brtsams pa yi dge ba gang // zla ba
96b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyus pa dri med bzhin// 'gro ba dug can thams cad ni// zhing mchog gtsang mar skye bar sh+log/ phyag na rdo rje gtum po lha lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'phags pa klu grub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs
96b2(rgyud 'grel): so// / 'di bris dge ba'i rtsa ba yis// gos sngon go 'phang myur thob shog// phyag na rdo rje'i lam yan lag brgyad po 'phags pa klu grub kyis mdzad pa zhugs//
96b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra pA N+yaM ga mArmASh+Ta ya/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje'i lam yan log brgyad pa/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// rigs kha lnga khro bo rigs gcig pas// gnyis po dbyer med rnam
96b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'dres// bcom ldan de btud sgrib pa'i thabs// gtum po khros pa'i gzhung bzhin ba// de la dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnasu gdong la sogs pa dag par byas te dri chu'i chag chag btab la// rnal 'byor
96b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dbang thob pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste// rang gi snying gar hUM sngon po bsam de'i 'od zer gyi bla ma dang lha dang rgyal ba smras dang bcas pa rnams thugs bskul te bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa ni// sangs
96b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang // bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje la// bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshalo// 'dod yon lnga dang rin chen bdun// bkra shis rdzas brgyad khor
97a1(rgyud 'grel): yug bcas// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams// bla na yod med mchod par bzhes// bdag gis thog mtha' med pa nas// sdig pa bgyis pa ma lus kun// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// spyan
97a2(rgyud 'grel): sngar da lta mthol zhing bsha/ bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang // gsang sngags kun bdag rdo rje can// de rigs 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor kun// dge ba mdzad la rjeswa yi rang // bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// dus gsum bde
97a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs thams cad kyi// byin gyis brlabs kyis dbang bskur la// gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// skyon bral mthu ldan khyed rnams la// skye rga na 'chi mi mnga' yang // 'gro ba'i don du sku sprul pa// mthun 'jug
97a4(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan mi 'da' gsol// bdag gis dge ba ci bsags kun// gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms nas su// bla med byang chub thob bya'i phyir// sems can kun gyi don du bsngo// de nas byams pa dang snying rje rje de nga / dga' ba dang
97a5(rgyud 'grel): botang snyoms bsgom mo// de nas ye shes kyi tshogs bsags te// oM sarba d+harmA swa b+hA wa At+ma ma kau haM/ zhes brjod pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom mo// de nas rang gi snying gar a las byung ba'i zla dkyil du hUM pra sem mo//
97a6(rgyud 'grel): dede'i 'od kyis don byas par chad bsal// mchod pa phul/ byin brlabs bsdus sa bon la thim pa khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga par bltas te/ de'i lte ba can gyi yang de ltar byas// de yongs su gyur pa las// zhal gcig pa/
97b1(rgyud 'grel): drug gnyis pa/ sku mdag mthong ga/ g.yas rdo rje bsnun pa'i chug/ g.yan sdig mdzub thugs kar bkan pa/ lto 'gros brgyan cing sdug shAm gsol pa/ spyan gsum pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ s+thAr+N+Nas shing sgra r+ya ser pa
97b2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs gyad kyi dor thibasu dgrang pa// thugs las rigs bzhi yum dang khyung // seng ge stag dang ce spyang phag/ sprul pa'i khro chung bas ma mi khyab// me dpungang 'bar ba'i bdag nyid bsam// de rjes hU~M las 'od 'phros
97b3(rgyud 'grel): pas// ye shes spyan drangs mchod sogs bya// phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas bai tab la// sku gsung thugasu byin gyis brlab// spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur la// spro bsdu mi skyo bar du bsgom// de nas ting 'dzin gsum
97b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ma bral bar bzlas pa bya ste/ oM badz+ro tsan Do ma ha ro Sha na hUM/ gzung swa sa ma rigs lnga'i snying po gang yang 'dra'o// de nas gtor ma btang / bstod pa bya/ yi ge brgya pa bklag/ ye shes pa gshegs/ dam tshig
97b5(rgyud 'grel): pab bsdu/ spyod lam bzhi dge ba'i cho su spyad par bya'o// de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni// sa bon raM du 'bar ba yis// kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// bde ba chen po gso mdzad pa/
97b6(rgyud 'grel): thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs kyis// bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms par mdzad// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// gtor ma las rab kun gyi mchog/ las rnams kun gyi sngon du 'gro/ yaM raM kaM ma dag sa bon
98a1(rgyud 'grel): las/ rlung dang me dang thod pa'i sgyid// A las thong pa'i gzhal yas su// sha dang bi mu ma ra las// na dang go dang ku da ha// mi mchi lha dang rab gsal lnga// steng du sa bon dgod bya ba// oM dang hUM dang
98a2(rgyud 'grel): tAM laM khaM/ laM maM paM taM baM dag las/ yab yum snyoms 'jug bdud N+DI'i chur// dpa' bo gsum gyis byin brlabaso la// brjod pasA dkar dmar dngul chu'i mdog/ ye shes bdud rtsi ra bI nr-i brlabs la// rdo rje khong sadA ye
98a3(rgyud 'grel): shes lcags// hUM mdzad sngags 'dis gsol bar bsam// oM tsaN+Da badz+ra pA na ye ma hA ba li i danau/ gri h+Na gI hA/ kha hi khA hi/ muny+dza ho sa ma s+ye swA hA// de nas sman gyi mchod po ni// a mr-i ta pU dza'o// rag ta'i
98a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa ni// rAk+Sha bi pa tA yo// tshogs kyi mchod pa ni/ g+ha na pA dz+ra'o// de nis lhag ma bsngo ba bya ba sngags 'di brjod pas thim par bsam/ oM a~M kA ro mu khang sarba d+har+m+ma NaM/ Ad+ya mud pAn+d+ha na twA ta/ oM ar+d+hahUM
98a5(rgyud 'grel): swAt+ma/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma bting ngo // / de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang ba'i lha// mche ba gtsigs shing me mngag spyan// me lce'i dbugs la 'jigs
98a6(rgyud 'grel): pi'i ngar// phyag zhabs nor rgyas bu yis brgyan// nag po gdol pa'i ser la kha// dga' bo nye dgas snyan cha mdzad// sbrul gdug 'bar bas phyag zhabs brgyan// sku yi bzhin dang gzi brjid rgyus// khro gnyer smin
98b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dpral bar bsdus// ya sos ma mchu drag tu mnan// gshin rje'i chu byad 'jigs byed sku// klog ltar 'khyug pa'i ljags 'dral zhing // gsus pa che zhing sbrul zla bru// lag pa brdabs pa'i sgra yis ni// khams
98b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum rnams ni 'jigs par byed// sma sa ra ser po gyen du 'khyil// khro gnyer smin ma mi lcer 'khyag/ kham nag ral pa gyen du mdzes// phyag g.yas gser gyi rdo bsnams// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub log 'dren
98b3(rgyud 'grel): gzir// sku la me 'bar srid gsum 'dul// 'dab bzangs rgyal pos ske rags mdzad// dpag tshad brgyad khri rgya mtsho'i zabs// zhabs kyi pus mor phyin mdzad nas// dbang po nyi ma phrag la khur// a lI gang rgyungs
98b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni// kun tu dgod cing 'khrug par byed// hUM dang phaT kyi gang rgyangs kyis// ha ha bzhad cing drag shul tsho// klu rnams 'dul bar byed lnga bstod// de nas sngags kyi bye brag ni// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ShA Na hUM phaT/ oM nI
98b5(rgyud 'grel): lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA ni hU~M badz+ra ro Sha NA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA NaNaM sa man+ta/ ka ra ma rak+Sha tsit+ta badz+ra nA ga sa man+te hUM phaT/ rigs lnga gtum pa'i drag sdigs te// rim pa
98b6(rgyud 'grel): yis ni shes par bya// tad+ya thA na sa d+hA ga ban/ radz+nyA pa ya'i bar du ni/ gtum po khros pa'i rgyud bzhin no// de dag gdags pa'i drag sngags ni// sbyor bas yang dag bstan par bya// oM ha yak+ShA song rdo rje Na ri b+hUrbad/ dza bu raM
99a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / ga sa rig smra ra ya shigasas gatshig nam dang / smras rbaT+Ta nA ga s+phA ra ya yA/ ra rangal rda la/ shig/ nAr smAd+hA thun dngas/ s+yA n+nar+N+Na s+yA du/ slad na
99a2(rgyud 'grel): eng+kur+ya thams dam+bAr a dang / nAg tsi d+hA ma ra ya dzad/ swAt+mA kr-it+tam+bAr ya n+tad+ha/ n+yak+She sauHm-i y-i de/ rA d+hA sid+ha m+bAr ya dang / rA tsid+d+ha n+d+har ya d+he/ ra tsit+ta mA~MrA s+yai dang / d+hI mA
99a3(rgyud 'grel): sat+ya tsit+ta mA ra ye zed/ mus mun tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ rAk+Shi tsid+d+ha mAM rI nang / nyi mas thA nA NA/ glad ba na Na/ tsaM dze gu lo na Na/ ku na shig/ tsai tra mu tra bzlog byer/ nAM gI shig/ na ga ga nA g+hA la naH/ che
99a4(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ gdug bla rnam gsum bstad bya ba// thog mor she dang co lA sbyar// dreg b+ha ban+d+ha ni 'dul byed pa// gong ltar mthun dang bar ba bzung // bsrung zhing bzlog par byed pa ni// 'dris kyis tha mar shes
99a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// gzhin yang sngags kyi sbyor ba nI// 'di ltar rab tu bstan par bya// i ga ru Di/ saMs yi/ lo tsA lA swA hA/ ser ba bcad pa'o// thal chen dang yungs kar gyis sbyor// oM e shod b+h+r-i to/ d+hu wA na mra/
99a6(rgyud 'grel): rje mo dzA \u0f7f/ d+hu lu hu lu/ yang tri'i badz+ri to/ dU hU lu/ tad tri ba pra tig maH/ tsu lu tsu mu swA hA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'thab pa dang / rnam par rtsod pa thams cad la bzlos pas zhi bar byed do// ma
99b1(rgyud 'grel): mo tsa yA/ mok+Sha ni mo k+Sha yA/ dz+nyIrba ma ba ra de swA hA/ chu la btab te gtor na bcings pa las rnam par grol lo// oM ta ri ni ta ra yA/ ma tsa ni/ mo tsa yA/ mo kA ni mok+Sha yA/ badz+ra baM ba ra de swA hA/ til ma ra la mngon par
99b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngags te/ skye ba'i sgro la bskus na sbrum ma bde bar bca' bar 'gyur ro// oM tA re tut+tA re/ mo kA ya badz+ri paM swA hA/ gur kum gyis gro ga la yang gang gi ming smos pa'i sngags mngoni pA rA bris la/ spra tshil gyis btuna? sa
99b3(rgyud 'grel): te dri zhim pos bkang ba'i chu'i bum par blugs te/ me tog dri zhim pa la dus gsum du mchod pa byas na/ 'thab rtsed thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro// oM a ma ra Ni dzI wan+ti ye swA hA/ sngags 'di leDa
99b4(rgyud 'grel): par bzlas na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ khyad par du 'brum bu la sogs pa la chu la btab nas 'thungs na 'brum bu thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig
99b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad bsreg par byed do// 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon la yungs kar la bsngags te gtor bas 'byor ro// byis pa gsar du btsa' ba la skam pa la rdo rgyus kyis brisa? te sgo gong du btags
99b6(rgyud 'grel): na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyu ro// oM dzaM b+ha lo dzA len+d+rA ye swA hA/ oM ma ni b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM puN+Da b+ha drA swA hA/ oM dA na dat+ta ya swA hA/ oM bau shra ma NA ya swA hA/ oM ki li ma li ni swA hA/ oM pi tsi kuN+Da li ne swAhA/ oM
100a1(rgyud 'grel): mu khen+d+rA ya swA hA/ oM tsa len+d+rA ya swAhA/ dze b+ha la la gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor ba'i nor bsgrub pa'o// / de nas rab gnas bshad par bya// gzar skur dus chos
100a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po la// bkra shis bum pa mtshon ldan du// 'dag che la la sogs chu brgyad la// stong rtsa brgyad du gzungs brjod do// khrus khang gser dang mu tig can// rin chen sil ma dpungasau par bkru/ ji ltar bltams
100a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshigs bcad brjod// lugs ma bkru zhing me long la// pa ti lha khang bkru bya'o// khrus byed na bkra shis kyi tshigs bcang dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dgrol lo// sran phye dang / 'bras yos dang til ma ra la sogs pa
100a4(rgyud 'grel): laku shi'i pir gyi khrus bya zhing sngags 'di brjod// nA mo sarba ta thA gA tA dur+N+Na du pa~M pak+Sha s+t+waM swAhU~M/ zhes brjod do// de nas ras kha tshar mA nyamase bas dril phyis bya zhing sngags dI brjod do// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po spyan
100a5(rgyud 'grel): drangs la bdag gis dkyil-i 'khor sgrub ste/ bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mo tshong pa rdzogs pa'i rjes la rab gnas kyi lha rnams shim tu gsal byar byas te/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo bar snang du bsdus te spyan drangs
100a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par bstim la/ dbang bskur rgyas btab la mchod pa shin tu rgyas par bya'o// de yang gser gyi thur mas spyan dbye ri'i sngags ni 'oda'o// oM naik+Shu dz+nyA na nak+Sha pra be sha ya swA hA/ snyan dbye ba ni oM
100b1(rgyud 'grel): kur+N+Na ye swA hA/ oM nA ga gan d+he swA hA/ zhal dbye ba ni/ oM mu kha ye swA hA/ na bza' gsol ba ni oM ba tsa na tsa li ka ye swA hA/ dung gi so mangs dang gser gyi spu gris rab tu byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byi ba'o// po ti
100b2(rgyud 'grel): glegs bam rnams ni rdo rje chos dang yum chen mor byin gyis brlab bo// mchod rten ni rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlab bo// rdo rje dang dril bu la sogs pa ni rang rang gi phyag mtshan du byin gyis bo rlob pa'o//
100b3(rgyud 'grel): gtsug lag khang la sogs pa de dag thams cad la ye shes sems dpa' bcug la rgyus btab cing byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur la mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod la bkra shos chen por mnga' gsol lo// de nas
100b4(rgyud 'grel): bdun tshigs byed par 'dod na/ bsnyen pa sngon du song bas gson po'i bsrung ba byas te/ rus bu 'amo mtshan byang la sogs pa'i dri ma sbyangs te// 'dod pa'i gathugs rjes gshin po ngan song gsum nas drang zhing /
100b5(rgyud 'grel): gshin po'i shes pa a thung gnas pa de mtshan byang la bstim ste/ drag po'i skyon sreg gis bshed phral la/ dug sbyang zhing 'gro drug nas drangs te/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// 'od gsum 'jig rten dug
100b6(rgyud 'grel): yin te// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje nyid// dkon mchog bden pas dug bcom mo// dug ka shan+ti ku ru ye swA hA// zhes brjod cing 'gro drug nas drangs la dkyil 'khor chen po
101a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur te me mar gyi lam stan la badre bA can gyi zhing kham su gnas sbar ro// de nas sbyin sreg bshad par bya// zhi ba dkar zhing zlum pa la// ku sha 'o ma can gyis bsreg/ 'bras chan dkar
101a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum mngar gsum dbul// rta la n+ya gro d+ha yis bsreg/ gru bzhi rin chen mdzes pas spras// bsnan dang rin tshon sna lnga dbul// dbong la dmar zhing zla gaM la~M// tsan+dan dmar dang seng ldeng shing // khru gang chang la
101a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i dbyibs// durba shing tog la sogs dbul// drag po'i mthing nag gru gsum la// chu shing tshe ra ma can gyis bsreg/ rdo rje lcags kyus smras pa lha// dug dang khrag deng drag pos dbul// me lha'i cho gra rdzogs byas
101a4(rgyud 'grel): laHde yi gzhal yas drag po ru// bcom ldan cho ga legs pa yis// sbyin sreg bsngags ni 'di ltar ro// oM ag+na ya dz+wa la raM/ sarba~M sha tru/ shan+tiM ku ru yai swA hA/ zhi ba'o// buSh+TiM ku ru ye swAhA/ rgyal ba'i 'i// kho
101a5(rgyud 'grel): ku ru ye swA hA/ dbang gi'o// mA ra ya ku ru ye hUM phaT drag po'i 'o// na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA na ye/ ma hA ya kA se na pa ta ye/ sarba shra trAM zhes pa phrin las bzhi'i sngags gdags pa ni phyag na rdo rje'o//
101a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas gdon bshad par bya// dbyibs legs mdzes pa'i maN+Dal gsum// dadag dang nang pa'i bar du bya// dang po gzugs kyi bum pa la// gnyis pa smug shed lkugs mas bya// gsum pa ba su rigs drug dgod/
101b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khar gzhong sman gyis dkang ba ni// lcug ma'i gAdan de nang rnams gdab// nA ga yu lu zhes brjod la// dgang gzar blugs gzar dag gis dbul// zhi ba chu yi sbyin sreg go/ gu gul dud pas gdug pa dang // bra ma'i
101b2(rgyud 'grel): lcag gis brab pa dang // khyung dang mthu chen sdig shing brag/ mdongs kyi dung khung ltar bya ba// rlung gri dkyil 'khor bskyon byas la// gdon de dpag tshad brgyud khror 'phang // gdon rigs nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga// sman yang
101b3(rgyud 'grel): lngas na rnad rnams 'jil// mthong ba'i gdug dang reg pa'i dug/ kha blangs dug dang bsams pa'i dug/ myos pa'i dug dang dug mtsho lnga// gtum po khros pa'i rgyud bzhin du// rten cing 'brel pa'i rdzas rnams
101b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / ye shes lha'i sngags kyis dgrol// mdze rigs sum brgya drug cu las// bsdus na bco brgyad shin tu rgyas// rtsa dang chu dang dbang po dngas// skra dang rus pa sen mo spu// dug dang rkyen dang rigs dang gdon//
101b5(rgyud 'grel): mngal dang srin bu chu dang lhas// dang po brtag pa ces pa yin// gnyis pa gso thabs bstan par bya// brtag pa brgyad la gso thabs gnyis// sman dang lha ru shes par bya// lha ni mngon du song ba yis// sman ni rten
101b6(rgyud 'grel): cing 'brel ba'i rdzas// bcangs pa tsam gyis bsrung ba'i mchog/ rtsa bshal brtsub bshal sna bshal sogs// sde sbrul thabs sbyor ngag dang ni// gtar dang me thur la sogs pas// rigs pas dpyad la kun nas
102a1(rgyud 'grel): dgrol// madz+re rigs brgyad la gso thabs brgyad// brtag thabs brgyad la gso thabs brgyad// brtag thabs brgyad la man ngag brgyad// bla ma'i ngag gis brgyan par bya// dug la sman gyis
102a2(rgyud 'grel): gso bar bya// rkyen la rten cing 'brel pa'i thabs// rigs la rin+da chen gter gyi gzor// gdon la bya ba bsrungs lha'i sngags// mngal dang srin la rtsa bshal lo// tshul gtar dang de bzhin te// l-is la dge ba'i stobs
102a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis gso// lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo dag las// bdag nyid 'phags pasA lung bstan pas// brtsam par mi 'os ma yin te// yan lag brgyud du de bshad do// rgyud kyi dgongs pa yan lag brgyad// lhag
102a4(rgyud 'grel): chang rgyal po bka' las 'gal// zab mo sgrub thabs 'di bris pas// 'dir 'jug gsang bdag 'grub par shog/ phyag na rdo rje'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa klu grub kyi
102a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
103a1(rgyud 'grel): maskor gyigang sgrur med bzhin nor bu rdzob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa bzhugs/
103b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i bdag po dpal lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshalo// phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ dang por khrus byas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ yan
103b2(rgyud 'grel): lag bdun dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// rang gi snying khar nyi ma dang zla ba gnas pa'i sa bon gyi gos sngo po can dang // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa spyan drangs te/ sa bon las byung
103b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchod pas mchod do// de nas 'di skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa/ phyogs bcu na bzhug so 'tshal la/ bdag lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs
103b4(rgyud 'grel): su gsol lo// mchod pa bla na med pa 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi char dag pa'i sems kyis sgrol zhing mchis na/ thugs rje'i dbang gis bzhe su gsol// thog ma med pa'i dus na/ dug gsum gyis dbang gis sdig pa ci bgyis
103b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams so sor bshags shing slan chad kyang sdom par bgyid do// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag bskul ba'i sa la bzhugs pa rnams la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskul bar bgyi'o// bde bar gshegs pa dgeng dag mya
103b6(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das par bzhed pa rnams la 'khor ba ji srid par gsol ba 'debs so// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs byang chub
104a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu sems bskyed cing dngos po thams cad dang bral ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du thugs bskyed pa bzhin/ bdag gis kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o// gzhan yang dag gis 'phags pa rnams
104a2(rgyud 'grel): la lus phul te/ sems can thams cad mya ngan los 'da' bar bgyi'o// de nas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad stong po nyid du bsam par bya'o// de'i ngang las yaM lhas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla ba dang nyi ma'o//
104a3(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du hUM sngon po las byung ba'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i gos sngon po can gyi gzugs su gyur par bya'o// de nas yungs kar phyogs su gtor bar bya zhing / oM AHbig+h+nAM ta kr-ita hUM phaT ces brjod cing bskrad par
104a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// lcogs kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te/ sa bon las 'od zer spros te spyan drang bar bya'o// gzungs kyi mjug la/ oM na ma sA mA ya maN+Da la ma de/ A gats+tsha ya oM gats+tsha ya/ pra be sha ye pra be shaM y+ya/ A lo ka ya A lo ka
104a5(rgyud 'grel): hU~M swAhA// zhes bya ba btags te spyan drang bar bya'o// de nas ngo la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// pro d+ha haM zhes pas ar+g+ha yi'o// badz+ra puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha si mu dra s+pha ru Na~M sa ma ye sAd+d+ha/ zhes pas me tog dbu la dbul lo// oM
104a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ri d+b+ha bi pU dza me g+ho sa mu swa ra Na sa mo ye swA hA/ zhes pas bdug pa mdun du'o// oM badz+ra dI pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra swai ra Na sa ma ye swA hrIM/ zhes pas mar me spyan la'o// oM badz+ra gan+d+he pU ra me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma me
104b1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pas dri thugs kar ro// oM badz+ra nai b+hi d+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes pas zhal zlas zhal du'o// oM badz+ra gI tI gi ta swA hA/ zhes pas sil snyan snyan la'o// de nas bstod do// oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/
104b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gnyis su med par bya'o// de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas rang gi snying ge ra raM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i steng du// rang gI sa bon la bzlas par bya ba'i yi ges bskor bar bya'o// blos dmigs bya ste/ sngags
104b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya'o// sngags ni 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho pan nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sho rI rAM/ bAdz+ra pA Ni hri da yaM aHsra mA tI kr-i ma tha/ mA ku lA ud+Ya dA nI/ b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ tad+ya thAM/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/
104b4(rgyud 'grel): bi bud+d+ha/ bi br-id+d+ha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ha ra ha ra/ nAM gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra tI ra/ sarba nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ dA gA hri da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+na/ nA gA mA r+m+ma Ni/ bI shIn+than+tu/ nA gai sha rI r-I Ni/ bi s+pha Ta yau/ nA ga na yaM nA nAM/ tA
104b5(rgyud 'grel): thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA rA NA ya hUM phaT/ nA got+se da nI ya hUM phaT/ nI lAM ba sA nA yai hU~M phaT/ oM pre ti he taM be la be rakra mAM yai d+hI phaT/ kr-i tA nAM tA ya hUM bau T+wA~M kri tAn+tA ya phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta ru bA ya hUM phaT/ ro khor+N+Na
104b6(rgyud 'grel): mo hU~M phaT/ trA sanA ma~M d+hU ya/ kud+g+ha dr-i dA nA ya hUM phadz+re/ pr-i ta hriM shA tsa bi nAM sha ka~M rA ye hU~M phaT/ yak+Sha a bstA ra bin rig ka rA mo hU~M phaT/ hase ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sA re ya mA ra ya'i nA sha ya hA
105a1(rgyud 'grel): b+hUk+ShA ya b+hAk+Sh+ma s+ya/ sarba big+h+nAM b+hin+na yA k+Sha bi nA shA ka rA sa d+h+waM b+h+yaT/ s+yAn shad+d+ha ga Na bI nA sha ka rA ya hU~M b+hAT/ nI la~M ba ra d+hA ra byAdz+nyA ba Ni rA dz+nyA ba ya d+hi swAn+d+ha/ naswA bzlas par bya'o// sa la hU~M gtong nga/
105a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na/ brjod par gsol ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba pa'i sgo zhing smon lam gdab bo// de nas oM AHhU~M muHzhes pas ye shes kyi lha gsheg su gsol// de ni sa thams cad mi dmigs par bsgom par bya'o// de nas
105a3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags brjod par bya'o// bla ma la gus pa dang nga/ shes rab dang / snying rje dang ldan zhing / khyad par du gang la dad pa cher yod pa de la/ myur du 'grub par 'gyu ro// gsang po'i bdag po rdo rje'i sgrub
105a4(rgyud 'grel): thabs/ slob dpon chen po nag po zhabos kyis mdzad pa N+Dog so// / rgya gar skad du/ mahA yad+d+hi sI nA pa~M ti nI laM ba ru d+hA rU badz+ra pA N+Di ga ru Da ya tu/
105a5(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagA na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang / byA khyung gi sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud dang ni// gser mig 'a dz+wal pa'i rgyud ngag las/
105a6(rgyud 'grel): brten nas nang gi sgrub thabs 'di // bdag gi dran phyir bshad bar bya// lha mo rnol 'byor yung tsam bsam// rang gi snying kha ro zla dkyil bsam// de yi steng du hU~M yig bsam// hUM las 'od zer 'phros pa las/
105b1(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gsal nas 'od zer 'phro// bla ma dang ni gos sngon can// dkon mchog la sogs spyan drangs nas// phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang // rje su yi rang bskul zhing gsol// skyabs 'gro lus dbul
105b2(rgyud 'grel): dge rtsa bsngo// tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya// de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ de nas 'od dpung tshul du bdag/ de yi nang du hUM gnas ga/ de las dzaH'phros 'khor lor sbyor// lte bar nyi bsam
105b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM de nyid// de las gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur// thugs ka'i hUM gi 'phro 'du lngas// khro bo chen po btsu ru gyur// hUM bzhi gsang sngags brjod pa yis// khro bcu'i sprul pas gdug pa bkug/ sku gsung
105b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi phur pa btab// btul zhing sbyangs nasu nu mkhar gyur// de nas hUM gi 'phro 'du las// rdo rje'i gur dang ra ba dang // dra ba nyid du gyur pa'o// hUM gi 'phro 'du slar la zhu// stong pa nyid las 'od dpung
105b5(rgyud 'grel): byung // de las nyi zla kha sbyar gyur// A li kA li nyi zlas brgyan// dbus su aHdang hUM sbyar te// kha dog dkar dmar nyid du gyur// 'od zer dkar dmar 'phro 'du las// zhu bas rdo rje pad+mar gyur// pad ltar
105b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rkeng nub tsam// lte bo gnyis la snying pos bskor// de gnyis ngo bo thugs dang gsung // gnyis kas sku gsung byin gyis brlab// de nyid 'ong du zhu ba las// rdo rje las ni khro bor gyur// pad+ma las ni khro mor
106a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ khro bo rdo rje gos sngon ni// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams// mche ba btsigs shing spyan gsum dmar// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil//
106a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan// zhabs gnyis brkyang bsku mo 'khril ba'i tshul// mdun du rdo rje phag mo ni// sku myadog dmar mo zhil gcig ma// g.yas pa rdo rje gri gug bsgoms// g.yon pa ban+d+ha dmar gyis baukang
106a3(rgyud 'grel): gcer bu spyan gsum+b+ha dbu skra mdzes// phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan+d+ha// gdan du rdo rje rgya gram bsam// oM hUM traM hrIHaHe baM mA ya/ hUM swa ta hri a/ dz+dzaHhU~M baM hoHoM aHhUM sa me ya s+t+wa~M/ oM a
106a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM sa ma iHau ID+b+hihUM sa ma yau AHbud d+ha ga ru Na au/ badz+ra gra ru Ta hU~M/ rat+na ga ru DA traM/ pad+ma gI ru Ta hriHkarma gA ru DA AHI puSh+pa gA ru DA/ bAM d+hU pa g+ha ru Ta/ mA a lo ke ga ru DA
106a5(rgyud 'grel): gAn d+hu ga r+yA Ta/ ga ru Ta ak+ShA/ ga rU Ta ya m+b+ha ga ru D+hA hu lu/ ga ru Ta tsan+ta/ dzaHga rU Ta/ d+h+r-i ga ruD+ha/ kr-IH)gi ru Ta/ yab kye gau cha'o// au baM/ tsiyau/ tIm+l-i/ to hi/ hU d+h+waM/ phaT badz+ra/
106a6(rgyud 'grel): yum gyi go cha'o// thugs kha'i 'od zer 'phros pa yis// ye shis sems dpa'i spyan drangs la// phyi nang bdud rtsi bcas pas mchod// dzaHhUM baM hoHbcas pas bcing // bdud rtsi tsum pas pa dbang bsku
106b1(rgyud 'grel): bas/ rigs kyi gtso bos dbu rgyan bsam// de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// / thig le ge sar bcas pa'i dbus// A li kA li yang dag ldan// de yi dbus na gnas pa'i lha// dar dkar phra
106b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skud pa tsam// de la bsam gyis mi khyab bsam// bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na// de la gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'gyur// dang po rnal 'byor lung gis brgyan// de nas chos kyi dbyingasu thim// phag mo'i
106b3(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid ni// phag zhal don dam dngos po med// kun rdzob khro zhal mtshon pa la// bya ni gsal ba'i thabs yin te// khyud ni gsal ba dngos med yin// go ni gang du mi gnas te// ru ni tshogs dang bral
106b4(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid// bya ni gzugs sku rnam gnyis te// khyung ni rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// gdong nas dag pas na mkha' bzhin// rang sems gdong nas ma skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha
106b5(rgyud 'grel): NA hUM/ badz+ra ga ru Da hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mA ra ya mU rA ya/ s+pho Ta yA s+pho Ta badz+ra pA Ni ga ru DA be ga/ hUM d+b+h+yAMHdzaHdzaHra rtse pre tsi hUM phaT/ oM badz+dzi TAkI nI d+hu hUM phaT/ yum gyi snying po'o// dz+raHd+h+waM da ra ma kA kA
106b6(rgyud 'grel): kikiM nau da ri/ da ra ma he sha d+hu d+hu ra/ rat+ne te shaM kai ri/ dar me sti sha tse ka ra/ dar ma ste sha sa ma yau/ bu ta ya s+phu Ta ya/ te bi te pe/ kha kha raM/ te pa te pa tsa ke ri/ te pa te pa mun 'du ri/ te bai te ba rbung do ta

107b1(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya/ dus twA ya sAd ta ra mu du rak+Sha sa ma ya/ d+hU ba ta ya sU tra rA/ gdon gshed ma dang 'phral ba'i sngag so// / d+hU hra la hril dim di makun phob phob shar sha ra/ daM rI da~M ri rbad/
107b2(rgyud 'grel): kha waM thaM thums/ dzi re dza re/ b+h+yo/ ha si hA s+ya/ twe b+hi te bA/ d+h+r-i tI h+yA trI ta ha/ tri khug tri khug/ rgyal pa tshal ba/ stog tshi gu nAn zad/ khros rdul mA ra ya rbad/ ruM raM dza lA dza la/ thig shig/
107b3(rgyud 'grel): rdul bun rbang song/ nA ga sarbo ga ru Da kha hi/ spyi drol ba'i sngog so// / oM na mo b+hu tA ya/ kI li mi li tsan+da na ga ban+d+ha yau swA hI/ bur pA'i sngag so// ra li hu ra thu hu ra
107b4(rgyud 'grel): thums b+h+yo d+ha sha thu hu ra thums b+h+yo/ ma ma shi b+h+yo/ sarba ga ru se ra ba la b+h+yo/ ser ba bzlog bi'i sngags so// / oM be ra pe ra badz+ra d+ha ri ye swAhwA/ rims
107b5(rgyud 'grel): nang bsrung ba'i sngags so// hUM di ri ga ru Do N+yA nU hUM dzaHdzaHe a re lI rje tri b+h+yo/ 'khor gyi klu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// d+hu dzu ti ting ting teg te ga ho ho// d+h+yA b+h+yo/ gtang 'don
107b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags so// tri naM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ 'byung po skrod pa'i sngags so// bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// 'di la brten po'i rnal 'byor rnams//

109a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje'i sbru sapas slob dpon las kyis rdo rjes mdzad pa bzhunas//
109b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ kri badz+ra pA NI s+yA d+h+yA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i bdag po bsgrub par 'dod pas//
109b2(rgyud 'grel): dang por chos thams cad stong par bsam/ de nas snying rje chen po bskyed/ de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i dkyil du hU~M mthing nago 'bar bA bsam/ hUM gi 'iphro 'du las rdo rje mthing nag 'bar ba hUM gis mtshan pa
109b3(rgyud 'grel): babasam/ oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ de drug yongasu gyur pa las rdo rje gtum po shin tu khros pa/ 'jig su rung ba/ sku mdog mthing nag/ spyan gsum pa/ 'jig su rung ba'i rgyan sbrul gyis brgyan pa/
109b4(rgyud 'grel): stag lpags kyi shi mi thabs can/ phyag g.yas rdo rje tho ba 'phyararo ze/ g.yon myi rus kyi phur pas 'dre na gcig tu bsams lnga/ oM badz+ra rAt+na hUM/ oM d+hU tra~M hriM/ oM d+b+ha zhes go bamo'o// de nas ma shes sems dpa'
109b5(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bsam/ bdun rnam dag bya/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sa rong la bstim/ oM badz+ra tsan+d+ra ma hA ro khA Na hUM phaT/ sum 'bum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas s+ho// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di nung ca zad bzlas pas sdig pa thams
109b6(rgyud 'grel): tshad the sreg par byed do// sems ca bsrung bar bying ngo // gnod pa'i lage 'dren thams cang mang bar byed do// oM badz+ra baN+Da ma hA re Sha Na hU~M ya~M// mdzo/ gr-i h+Na gr-i d+ha/ khI si dzA hrI/ b+h+ya&hoH bi
110a1(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ye swAhA/ de bsnyen pa byed pa'i dus su rgyun tu gtor mA gtang ba'i sngags so// / de nas drug pa'i las bya bar 'dod bsra/ dang por dkyil 'khor ji tsam dran pa cag/
110a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rdo rje rgya gram b+hi/ ra kun nag por bya/ re ga tshil dang thal chen bsres pas bI/ de'i dbus su e gru gsum zabs su mdzub gang pa cig brus la/ nang ro bsregs pa'i thal bas byug/ gru gsum de yi phyi rol
110a3(rgyud 'grel): dodamar por bya/ de ni dkyil 'khor bya ba'i thab so// de nas ling+ga bca' ba'i thabs ni// pra tshil la sor bzhi pa byas la de'i snying khar shog pu lu dmar chen gyis rdo rgya gram bris la/ bsgrub bya rang gi rten dang bral bar
110a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ gru bo gsum de yi dbus su ming bris la gzhug/ de nas gru gsum nang du bcug la/ ske nas skud pa sngon dmar gyis btags la/ de'i sna la ma'i rje ngar gyi phur pa sor bzhi po gcig btags la/ 'jig
110a5(rgyud 'grel): byed chen por mnga' gsol te/ sngags nam phyed ngam nyi ma phyed na brdeg go// phyi rol tu 'gro ba la sogs pa byed na ling+ga la phur po mi dbyug par btab la bzhag go// maN+Dal dbus su lha'i gdan du byas la/ sum
110a6(rgyud 'grel): 'obum du bzlas la gdab/ de'i dus su gtoro ma dang mchong po dus drug du dbul lo// de 'debs rtsan rang nyid phyag na rdo rje sku mdog sngo nag/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa
110b1(rgyud 'grel): stag lpags kyi sham thabs can/ bsgrub bya'i steng na 'dug pa/ phyag nA phur bu dang sdig mdzub mdzad pa cig tu bsgom zhing sngags bzlas la brdeg go// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ che ge mo shi ri kI la ye ha hU~M phaT/ mu ga sta~M b+ha
110b2(rgyud 'grel): ya/ hrI s+t+waM b+ha ya kI lA ye tra hUM phaT/ tsos bzlas la brdag go/ daM ltar drag pA lA byed pa'i dus su gtor ma btang ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha hUM phaT/ ma ma sarba sha traM/ a mu ka ma tsa ye tA pra ya
110b3(rgyud 'grel): maM sa rdzi gr-i/ bu ga ru tI ra pri yang beg k+She na ba laM i daM gAMh+Na gr-ih+Na/ khA hi khA hi/ b+huny+dza ho/ rak+Sha bi pa to/ Ar+ya pra tsa gr-ih+Na grih+Na/ khA hi khA hi/ rak+Sha bi ba ti/ e ti kra ma ti sa ma ye swA hA/ phur bu'i las rdzogs nas
110b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon rnon pos ling+ga stong smad du btubs la/ smad lha'i zhal du sbyin sreg pa/ stong mang byang dang bcas pa mnan pa bya/ las kyi dus su rdo rje rgya gram gnyis kyi bar du gzugs brnyan de bcug la/ thod pa'i nang du
110b5(rgyud 'grel): skud pa sngon dmar gyis dkri'o// skud pa lag pa g.yon pas gzung la/ las kyi dus su gzugs brnyanA la gnas lngar phur pas gdab/ dA nas slar bcug la sngon dmar gyis dkris lam rgya gram du sba'o//
110b6(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du phye dang sre mog gis rgya gram bris la bzhag go// las 'gor na sbyar la bya'o// spra tshol la ling+ga sor bzhi pa byas la/ bsgrub pa'i ming dang bcas pa ri bcug la cher mes de'i kha la btsugs na/
111a1(rgyud 'grel): byi rgol ba'i kha chumasu par 'gyur ro// lcags kyi phur bu dang mi'i rje ngar la ming nas smos te/ yan lag gang dang gang la btab pa des rengs par 'gyuraro// mtsho lkugs par smras na ngag rengs par
111a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// sgo rtsar sAsngo na 'byer bar 'gyuraro// ral gri la bsngags nas g.yul du zhugs na rgyal bar byed do// khros pas snying khar bsnun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// me'i dur du sbas nA rim gyis 'chi bar
111a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// rabs chad kyi thod pa la ming dang sngag spu bris nas rab chad kyi dur du smras na rabs chud par 'gyuraro// mngon par bsngags pas duraM khrod kyi thal ba'i steng du bzhag na 'byor bar byed do// khyi nag po'i
111a4(rgyud 'grel): thod pa la sngags dang ming bcas par bris nas klu'i gnas su sbas na mdzes 'dzin par 'gyuraro// dbang ma thob cing man drag med// tshe dang mi ldan 'di mi bya// 'dri la nyes pa yod paso na// shin tu gsang
111a5(rgyud 'grel): hrI sbrul mi bya// slob dpon lngas kyi rdo rjes mdzod bI gsang ba thugs kyi phur gaN+DIg ma'o// khaN+Di ta tha la tsan+d+ra drang / lits+tsha ba dar mo tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o//
111a6(rgyud 'grel): oM brje tsaN+Da mo ra/ She na ma s+t+rai mi ne hU~M/ che ga che shi re gi la ye te hU~M phaT/ shi ra sta~M d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ ka ti mu la ye ta ya hU~M phaT/ ka to mu kha sto b+ha ya hUM phaT/ dzi tra ste d+hA ma~M hUM phaT/ pa ta ki la ye
111b1(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ mchog phur gyis gnas lngar gdab bo// stong gsum snod kyi sems can rnams// khro bo gtum po'i sku ru bsgom// 'gro drug bcud kyi 'jig rten dag/ bcom ldan gtum po'i bsam pa bya// de la bsam
111b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyud ni/ rlung rdo rje rgya gram+b+ha nus sred pa'i rtse mo'i bar du stong pa phyi mtha' dag rdo rje gtum po rdul gcig gi steng na rdul skyed kyi skye'i rang bzhin du bsam ste/ de'i dbus su zla bu'u dkyil 'khor la zhabs g.yo zhing
111b3(rgyud 'grel): brdabs pas skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi zad tsam zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'drar ba dang / skur ba spu'i bu ga nas nyi ma stong gi 'od gzi brjid can gyi me'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang / ljags kyi rdo rje
111b4(rgyud 'grel): las bzlas pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer rim pa gsum 'phros/ stong gsum gyi stong rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyis 'gengs pa dang / klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pas bdug pa du ba'i 'od kyis klu phra mo dang sa bdag rnams
111b5(rgyud 'grel): bsreg pa dang / thugs kyi rdo rje las khro bo du ma 'phros pas/ bskal pa chen po'i rlung bzhin du bgegs kun tu 'thor ba dang / phyag gi rdo rje gsor bas gang du gnod par sem sa pa de'i sa phyogs su//
111b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chen po 'od zer sgrogs 'phen pa bzhin du yang dang yang bsnun par bsam/ de nas bzlas pa ma yin bar du hUM 'brug gi sgra lta bu rgyun du 'don/ bsnun pa'i 'khor lo zangs lcags kyi phye ma dang / yungs kar
112a1(rgyud 'grel): ke tshe dug chus brab bo// / yang rnam pa gcig la/ snying kha'i hUM las 'phros pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad phyag na rdo d+hAr gyur te/ 'jim pa mi dmigs
112a2(rgyud 'grel): pa las phyag na rdo rjer gyur/ sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ shog bu la gnod pa'i gdon lam staM b+ha ba nan shAn ti sta~M b+ha naM ku ru ni hUM phaT/ sUts+tsha de mchod rteni nag po 'di 'bar ba mthong ba tsam gyis skrag
112a3(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa/ bum pa'i nang du phyag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mtshon cha thogs pa bzhugs par bsam mo// de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis gzhan gyi srung ma rig sngags rnams bkug nas mthu
112a4(rgyud 'grel): med par bsam zhing / gtum po'i zhabs 'og nas mi 'chor bar bsam/ de nas mchod pa dang bden pa'i byi nA brlabs brjod pa la sogs pa bya'o// de lta bu 'bum btab na/ drang srong dmod pa yang zlogs par
112a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// rigs sngags bcad pa dang mnan pa'i cho ga'o// / dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sprin sreg mdor bsdus pa/ bkro shis pa'i gnas su me thabs zlum po dkar po byas la/ tsin+dan nu ma
112a6(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma can gyi shing dkar po la zlum por brtsigs te/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ dang po bdun rnam dag bya/ de nas me tog dkar pos dus gsum du mchod cing 'bras cha no dang mar gyi sbyin sreg
112b1(rgyud 'grel): byA/ brgya rtsa brgyad byas na gang lnga dmigs pa de zhi bar 'gyuro// shAn+tiM ku ru ye swA hA/ dpal 'phel ba'i gnas su me thabs gru bzhi ser po byas la/ shing ser po gru bzhir brtsigs te/ me tog ser pos dus gsum mU tshwa
112b2(rgyud 'grel): tsici / rin po che lnga dang 'bru sna lnga'i sbyin sreg byas na/ gdA la dmigs pa de rgyas par 'gyur ro// puSh+TiM ku ru ye swA hA/ rgyas pa lta bu'i gnas su ni/ me thab zla gamaM dmar po brtsigs la sing ldan dmar pos zla gam
112b3(rgyud 'grel): brtsigs la/ me tog dmar pos dus gsum du mchod cing / me tog dang sman gyis sbyin sreg byas na/ gang la dmigs pa de nyid dbang du 'gyur ro// dzaHdzaHho dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su e thabs gru gsum
112b4(rgyud 'grel): mthing nag brtsig/ shing nag po cher ma tsAn gru gsum brtsigs la/ me tog sngon bros dus gsum du mchod cing / dug sna sha chen chen yungs kar/ ske tshe/ bgegs kyi ling ka la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na/
112b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa po tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro// mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ra go rim dang po maN+Dal byaM/ de nas lha mchod/ de nas spyan drang / de nas bdun rnam dag bya/ de nas me lho'i sbyin sreg bya/ de nas thab
112b6(rgyud 'grel): khung mi dmigs par bya/ de nas me lha rang gnasu gsol// slob dpon las kyis rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzog so// / hUM bde gshegs gtso bo gtum po dang // lha rnams phyogasu 'khor ba
113a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// bdag dang sems can+ta rgyud sbyang phyir// skad cig tsam gyis gshegasu gsol// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan/ mAhA kA ru Ni ka ho/ sa ma yA s+thA/ sa ma yA dzaHbadz+ra aM ku sha dz+dzaHzhes
113a2(rgyud 'grel): pas spyan drangs la/ yi ge brgya pas spyi khrus dbul/ oM sa~M ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma yo haM zhes pas zhal bsil dbul/ oM pra ba ra sat+ka ra a ding tsing swA hA/ zhes zhabs bsil dbul/ oM ka mA la ye swAt+ma/ zhes pas
113a3(rgyud 'grel): me tog phul la gdan dbul/ gang gis 'khor ba'i nyes pa ni// dran pa tsam gyis 'joms mdzad cing // bla med byang chub thob mdzad pa// bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshalo// lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa na//
113a4(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po ni// yon tan thams cad sku la rdzogs// skyon med sku la phyag 'tshalo// chos nyid stong po'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // thabs la mkhas phyir sna tshogs skur ston pa// rgyal sras byung
113a5(rgyud 'grel): gi tshogs la phyag 'tshalo// phyogs bcur bzhugs pi 'i sangs rgyas thams cad la// yid kyis ci nus dmigs pa'i mchod 'bul na// kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin chen po ltar// sku gsum thugs la
113a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes pa'i mo tshig gyur cig/ bdag gi thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// sdig pa ma lus bgyis pa rnams// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// spyan sngar so sor sdig bshagaso// shes rab snying rjer ldan pa'i byang chub
113b1(rgyud 'grel): sems// dus gsum rgyal ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin// de yi rjesu bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// byang chub sems de nam yang mi btang ngo // bla ma rdo rje 'chang dang ni// gsang sngags kun bdag rdo rje 'chang // rig
113b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa yi rnal 'byor rnams// dge ba mdzod la rje yi rang // bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po dang // 'khor dang bcas la lus 'bul nas// bzhes nas bdag la rjes mthun par// dngos grub rnams ni rtsal du gsol//
113b3(rgyud 'grel): drang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// da lta dge ba gang sprad pa// bdag dang sems can don slad du// byang chub tu ni bsngo bar bgyi// pheg rdor bdun rnams dag go// / gser mes ma
113b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig pa/ g.yu mig ma phug pa/ mu tig rin po che mdung len/ gur gum gyis bris pa'i rten 'brel gyi snying po/ rma bya'i mdongs/ bya khyung gi snying po khrom gser gyis bris pa/ gla rtsi ga pur mu zi/ btsan dug/ gu gul
113b5(rgyud 'grel): tsan+dan gor shir sha/ sman 'gi'u waM/ bya rgod kyi tshil bu/ spre'u yi lpags pa la gtum/ au// rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du 'bru sna tshogs dang / klu smana? sna tshogs dang / zan la sogs
113b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phung po brtsal la/ zan la sogs pa'i phung po la baM las rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i snod / a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du paM las bdud rtsi'i ba rgya mtsho/ de'i steng du hriHlas 'od 'phros pas
114a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho dang 'o ma'i rgya mtsho kha dog dkar zhing ro mchog brgyad dang ldan pa dri zhim pa bsam/ oM las sman gyi sdong po stong gsum gang ba/ swA las ut+pal gyi nags tshal
114a2(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi tshal chags pa bsam gyis mi khyab par bsam/ taM las dpag bsam gyi shing 'o ma dang bum pa dpag tu med pa 'bab pa bskyed la/ bdag lha'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa'i snying ga'i yi ge las 'od 'phros
114a3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ klu rigs thams cad sbrul mgo bdun pa la sogs pa'am/ klu rigs sa bdag bsam/ 'od zer lcags kyu dang zhags pa lta bu i/ gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa na mkha' dang sa gzhi thams cad nas dkug
114a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ de'i lce la rdo rje bsam/ de las rdo rjer bsam/ de'i steng du hUM las 'od 'phros pas/ 'od zer gyi smyu gu yis 'thungs/ gnyis su med pa'i sems dang ldan par bskum/ mchod pa lnga dang ldan pa la/ oM ba
114a5(rgyud 'grel): ta li ma hA ba ta li/ hUM hUM hUM/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ snyan gsan dbabe pa'o// oM d+hu a d+hi pa ti mahA pad+ma/ mA lo nr-i dzaHAk+ShA rA ya dzaMHhU~M thai haHoM ba r+yA Na nA ga de ba twA au A kaR+Sha dz+dzaHhUM bAM ho/ oM A gats+tsha/
114a6(rgyud 'grel): A gar+dz+dza/ mad+hA nA \u0f7fbti sarba phuHsa ma ya rdza/ me tog dbul/ oM b+hu sa ma ya tISh+ThadzaHhUM swA hA/ 'o ma la sogs dbul/ oM ba ru Ne nA gi de ba ti ye ta ye swA hUM/ oM n+d+ra
114b1(rgyud 'grel): s+yAH puHphuHA nan+ta ka yA swAhA/ oM phuHphuHtak+Sha ye swAh+ma/ oM phu phuHba su ki sA hA/ oM phuHphuHkarko DA ka bo swAhA/ oM phuHphuHbang+ga ye swA hA/ oM puHpu mAh+ma pad+ma ye swAhA/ oM phu pu shaM ka pa li swAh+ma/
114b2(rgyud 'grel): oM phu phu hu lu k+She swA hA/ oM phuM phu a nan+ta shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM nA gA dza a nan+ta swA hA/ nA ga shaM ka pa la swA hA/ oM nA ga sarba pU dza me g+ha sa ma ye swA hA/ oM nA ga sarba i daM ba li gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na sa ma ye swA hA/ nA ga tu/
114b3(rgyud 'grel): lu ke swA hA/ A~M nA ge ba su kI swA hA/ tAk+Sha ya swA hA/ bai tA li swA hA/ u bA naMn daM swA hA/ ba ru nan swA hA/ oM bi ru pak+Sha Na yai swA hA/ oM nA ga laM nA ga le swA hA/ oM nA ga ke she phung ya twe nA ma ka pra ma d+hi na ye swA hA/
114b4(rgyud 'grel): oM b+hu e ti b+hU ti ma hA pad+ma l+lem+b+hi dza~M/ I daM ba liM gr-i h+Na gr-ih+NA pa yuM swAhA/ oM b+hu a d+hi paM ti ma hA ba ra/ me hA pad+ma ma lo mr-i dz+r-i/ ma~M hUM pU dz+nyA saM ma ya swA hA/ saM bdag mcho dA pa/ klu shi saM bstan pa nAM/
114b5(rgyud 'grel): bA ni nA ga shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ stong bzlas na sa bdag klu gnyan kha chings par 'gyur ro// zab che chung blta/ zab che na gzugs sna tshogs bye be bar la du sha dang nya sha dang / chu mig nas chu blangs la ba dmar ser
114b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'o mas byas/ chung ni gter mas chog/ bya khyung sa ma ya tan tra'i rgyud las btus pa/ lots+tsha ba glan chung dar ma tshul cha khrims kyis bsgyur ba'i klu gtor rgyas pa rdzogaso//
115a1(rgyud 'grel): dngas rgyam pa'i sprub thabs dpal zla ba snying bas mdzad pa bzhugs// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra tsan+ta kro d+hA sA d+ha nA na ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo rdo rje gtum po'i grub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje gtum
115a2(rgyud 'grel): po la phyag 'tshalo// dang po sgrub pa bo dkon mchog gsum la dad pas/ byang chub sems bskyed lnga/ bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o// de nas stong pa nyid du bsams la/ pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i stong
115a3(rgyud 'grel): du hUM l-is yang dag par byung ba'i rdo rje gtum po sku mdog nag po/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas pas gnam lcags kyi rdo rje zhun mA bsnams pa/ g.yon pas thugs kar sdig mdzub
115a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang ba/ g.yas bskum pa/ spyan gsum me'i mdog 'dra ba/ sgrol gyis brgyan pa/ skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba/ bskal po'i me'i nang na bzhugs pa/ sku las khro chung dang khyud blo 'phro
115a5(rgyud 'grel): ba cig gsal bar bskyed la/ snying ga ra hUM la/ sngags 'dis bskor la bzlas so// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Ne hUM phaT/ skyon sngags hUM la bsdu'o// de nas gdon gzhom par 'dod na/ rdo rje daM khyud ni ga po
115a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis kyis sbrul gyi mgo nas za ba/ gshog pa gdengs pa/ mchu sder rdo rje 'bar bar bsam/ g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub thur du bstan pa las me 'bar bar bsam la/ sngags 'das bzlas par bya'o/
115b1(rgyud 'grel): d+hU ya ShAn ro myAHbrgyu badz+rA ga ru Na de bzhin byung / sa g+hA n+ta grwa snying la gu zer/ thum ril zung drag blo gsum dang ldan par bzlas sa// de nas gdun bsad par 'dod na/ rang gi rmi lam du byung ba thams cad bsreg cing /
115b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di bzlaso// oM nA ga tsaN+Da tshal ba u r-i tA ke/ nA gai tsit+ta shag ti tshal bA naM/ nA ga d+hi sa ya ti/ g+h+r-i tA/ nA ga kro d+ha bi dA rA dzA ya/ shi shi/ nan tan/ dul dul cung drung thum rI la rjeHdzaHlan gsum
115b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis thub par 'gyur ro// tha ma mnan par bya'o// gtum chung khro thog ma'i sgrub thabs/ rgyal po zla ba'i snying pos mdzod pa rdzog so// / l-its+tsha ba sgeg pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
115b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+rA ga ru Da sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ rdo rje khyung gi sgrub thabs// rdo rje gtum po lnga phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byas la/ rlung nyid rdo rje khyung kha dog
115b5(rgyud 'grel): nag po lag pa gnyis kyis sbrul za ba/ gshog pa dang sgro la sogs pa rnams lcags kyi ral gri mau 'bar ba/ mig khro chu khrol ba lta bu/ sgo che ba cig tu bsgom ste/ oM badz+ra ga ru Da tsaN+Da ma hA
115b6(rgyud 'grel): nA ga mA ra ya sod sod/ nA ga mA ra ya thum ril rbad rbad hUM phaT/ rtag tu bzlas la ma yengs pas bsgrub par bya'o// 'di ni las thams cad pa'i sngags te/ gang la yang bum par chu blugs la
116a1(rgyud 'grel): khyung skyeng lnga bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de nas yungs kar la khrus bya'o// nad gang na bar yang byug par bya'o// bya'i shA mI bzar/ sgo nga mi bza'/ bya la mi brdeg/ rtag
116a2(rgyud 'grel): tultar bsgom par bya'o// rdo rje khyod gi sgrub pa'i man ngag rdzog so// / slob dpon rdo rje bad+mas mdzad pa'o// paN+Di ta sa'iri snying po ngo / lo ts+tsha ba rma ban gyis bsgyur ba'o//
117a1(rgyud 'grel): rang tum pa'i byam can sa sams cha mam
117b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya g+har skad du/ badz+ra tsaN+Da muN+Da la bi d+hi b+hU sa dza ka b+hA dra na ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje gtum po la
117b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// bsad ba bstan pa'i rgyud dang ni// bla ma'i gdams pa'i lam zhugs nas// cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus 'di// rang dga' nyes pa dor de bri// slob dben mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing // rgyud kyi dbang thob dam
117b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig brtan// gzhan phan bsgrub la dga' ba la// gzhan dag gus pa sa gsol 'debs sam// yang ni rang bzhin sgrub don du// nus pa dris la tshig gis sbyin// dur khrid la sogs dben pa'i gnas/
117b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i rim pa ga sal byas la// gtso bo 'bum la 'khor rnams khri// rab 'bring mtshan mu thob par bya// de nas bla gos logs bgos nas// snyom pa me tog gis bkang ste// gus pas gsol
117b5(rgyud 'grel): bau gdab pa ru bA// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir// dur khrod dben pa rdo legs dang // sngon byas pa'i yid 'ong l-i sogs su// lto 'phye'i sbyor bas brko bar bya// brtag cing sbyang dang bsrung bar bya// nyes pa
