117b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sa gzhi der// rdo rje 'dzin par gsal po dang // baM las skyes pa'i lha mo ser// mdzes pa brgyan ldan lus phyed snang // bu mo pa 'dzin la lus mchod bstod// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
118a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i tshul dang rnam thar ni// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom gyur// de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las// rgyal
118a2(rgyud 'grel): bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri// lag pa la sA la brdabs pa las// dga' ba'i mdangs ljon lha mo yang // khyod ni slob dpon mchog yin gyis// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las kyis zhes// zer cing sa la thim par 'gyur// ro
118a3(rgyud 'grel): gas lo nyes pa spangs pa ste// 'thas par bcag cing rnam lnga dang // dri bzang dag ni byugs par bya// yang na ma yi los kyis snang // stong pa'i sngags kyis byin brlangs te// rim pas lha'i khang par bsam// me tog steng du rdo rje
118a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ bla ma swA khrus byas rdo rje 'chang // bskyed pa'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas// shar bltos dkyil 'khor steng 'dug lo// chang med bzhi yis gzhon don sgrub// rnam rgyal la sogs bskyed pa yi// slob ma gus spos thogs
118a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ mchod la tshig 'od brjod par bya// hUM byams pa chen po rdo rje 'dzin// zhe sdang dag pas mi long ye shes gsol// gtum po gdug pa 'dul mdzad po// rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
118a6(rgyud 'grel): kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa mo lus gnos// chos kun bdag dang bral ba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengasu gsol// de bzhin lho phyogs la sogs nas// hUM snying rje chen po rdo rje 'dzin// nga rgyal dag pa mnyam nyid
118b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mchog/ gtum po gdugs pa 'dul mdzad pa// rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yis// mtshan min thams cad spangs pa ste// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor/
118b2(rgyud 'grel): dam pa bzhengs su gsol// hUM dga' ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags dag pa so sor rtog/ gtum po gdug pa kun 'dul ba// rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba mchog gi chos chen po// ye shes spyod pa
118b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengasu gsol// hUM btang snyoms chen po rdo rje 'dzin// gti mug rnam dag non tan ye shes mchog/ gtum po gdug pa kun 'dul ba// rdo rje
118b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la phyag 'tsholo// sems can kun gyi srog chen po// rang bzhin rnam dag dri mA med// kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bkangs su gsol// de nA rdo slob dpon gyis// khro zhing brjid pa'i
118b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar byas to// rkang bya'i hUM lasna rdo rjer bsam// mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba ste// rdo rje dri lta bu'i phyag rgya yis// 'jigs spangs byang shAr mtshamus song la// rang gis bstod cing nga rgyal gyis// hUM dkyil 'khor sa bzhi la
118b6(rgyud 'grel): zhen mo pa'i// lha sogs bge ges chags kun ci nyon cig// de ni ngapal ldan rdo rje dzi ni// oM bka' las ma 'da' bar/ bgegs kyi chags rnams 'gro bar gyis// nam te khyed rnams mi 'gro na/
119a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'bar ba yis// mgo bo chal pa brgyar 'gas shing // lus rnams stong du gyur nas ni// rnam par 'joms par gdon mi za/ de bas khyed rnams gzhan du dengs// oM bad+d+hA tsaN+Da mang+ga ro
119a2(rgyud 'grel): sarba big+ha na uts+tshu tA ya phaT/ ces pas bgegs rnams bskrad par bya// gar stabs kyis ni bskor ba dang // dang por phyin la 'di skad brjod// grang dag mi 'gro'o bgegs yod nA// lus ngag yid kyi nus pa rnams
119a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhom phyir khro bo'i phur bus gang ba// kI dIm+b+ha zhes btab nas kyang // arko Ta yas bdud bar bya// mi ri la sogs snga gos kyis bsrung // gtso bo'i gdan ni gru bzhi ste// 'khor lo dri chus zlum por bya// kha dog mthun
119a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i me tog dgram// sa yi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // lha ni lhag par gnas par bya// rang sar lho rnams rdzogs pa dang // mchod bstod me tog spos thogs la// hUM dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// thugs
119a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sras po rdo rje 'chang // dpa' bo rdo rje bde mas 'khyud// 'khor gyi khro bo ma lus kun// kun nas bdag la dgongs nas kyang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa dang // slob ma rnams la phan pa'i phyir// rdo rje can
119a6(rgyud 'grel): bong gi che ge zhes// dkyil 'khor dam pa banang su gsil// rjesu brtse bas nyer dgongs te// sang ni dgyes pas byon par mdzad// gzhon yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba ma lus dang // rdzogs spyi
119b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems bskyed rnams// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i tshe sgyu rnams// gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan pa// rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ deng dag 'dri bar gyur pa la// bdag dang skal ldan slob ma rnams// byin gyis
119b2(rgyud 'grel): banub phyir srung bar mdzod// bum pra lhag brla gnas 'dod pas// rin chen 'byung khu ngas las byung ba// dri ma med cing lto nga che// mgrin pa phra mchu 'phyang dri zhim chus// dkar zhel byas nas mtshan mo dgod/
119b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal phyag mtshan rdzogs par bri// skud cing chu dang byang sems dang // bya khri song khri dbyig pa dang // ut+pa la gzhan gyis mi thub pa// haM sa de ba gsir drongul dang // mu tig mu men b+hu ru gzhug/ nag til gro
119b4(rgyud 'grel): sran mung ko dang // gA bur dz+nyA ti gur kum mchog/ tsAn+don gnyis dang a ko ru// mar dong bu ram sbrang rtsi dang // lanA tshwa rnams kyis lto ba dgang // gos kyi sna mgrin pa dkab pa dang // d+hU ta la sogs 'bras bu
119b5(rgyud 'grel): can ka yang na me tog yod pas brgyan// me tog ldan pa'i ras stengs sem// ku sha'i gdan la rang sar zhugs// bum pa bruM las gzhal yas khang // chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan bcas pa// rnam rgyal lha rnams tshogs par
119b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// gzhan du sa bon gang yin pas// cho ga ma lus rdzogs pas bskyed// hUM khro bo gdug pa 'dul// rang bzhin e shes lnga yis dngos// rnam dag dri med sku 'chang ba// 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo//
120a1(rgyud 'grel): bang gshegs sku la gnyis med 'khyud// snang ba nyid kyi bdi ster ma// dmar snang gri gug thod pa 'dzin// dpa' mo bde ba ma phyag 'tshalo// sku gsung thugs dang phrin las kyi// gcag khro chen 'jig
120a2(rgyud 'grel): pa che// gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i sku// phyogs bzhi khro bo phyag 'tshalo// mar me bdug spos dri cheb ma// zhal zas kyis ni tshim byed pa// mchod pa'i lha mo dgos 'dod 'byung // mtsham su bzhugs la phyag 'tshal
120a3(rgyud 'grel): lo// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog ma// dgyes pa'i dril bu sgrogs mdzad ma// khro mo dbang phyug chen mo rnams// sgo ma bzhi lo phyag 'tshalo// bstod cing srang bu dang ldan pas// phrin las sbyar zhing bzlos par
120a4(rgyud 'grel): bya// gtor mas mchod cing gsol ba gdab// slob ma lhag par gnas pa ang // bsrung zhing mdzes pa'i me tog thogs// khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos ldan zhing // dga' ba'i sems kyis gsol ba gdab//
120a5(rgyud 'grel): dodang ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems mchog bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/
120a6(rgyud 'grel): skyabs gsum dag kyang bdog la stsol// thar po chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni gzhug par mdzod// lan gsum bor du gsol ba gdab// 'od kyis phur byas sdig pa sbyang // rje su gzung bas sgo
120b1(rgyud 'grel): bani// du chur theg pa chen po yi// tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga mchog/ khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje mi phyeng mthu yis ni// mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes mchog/ de bas kun mkhyen
120b2(rgyud 'grel): thob 'dod pas// bu yi blo gros 'di yis gyis shig/ bla ma sangs rgyas kun mchod cing // rtsa ba yan log nyes pa spongs// ma sbal 'khor ba'i sems can la// snying rje chen por rab bskyed nas// bsgral zhing grol ba'i
120b3(rgyud 'grel): lam la bkod// bde bar dbugs ni dbyung bar gyis// slob ma'i tshogs kyis sdig bshugs la// dge bsnyen la sogs rim pas sbyin// gang yin bslab pa bstan pa dang // slob ma lhar bya yang na ni// gnas gsum lhar bcas
120b4(rgyud 'grel): rtags btab la// bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang // bcom ldan phyog ni rdo rje ni// 'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kyang // bdag la dgongs nas gzigasu gsol// bdag gos thog ma med pa nas// sdig pa bgyis
120b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ma lus kun// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// spyan sngar da ltar mthol zhing bshegs// bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang po dang // sangs rgyas kun bdag rdo rje can// de rigs 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// dge ba
120b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad la rje yi rang // bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// gsang sngags bdag pos dbang bskur la// gsong sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// mthu ldan skyon med khyed
121a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la// skye rgan 'chi mi mi mnga' yang // 'gro ba'i don du sku sprul pa// mthun 'jug mya ngan mi 'da' gsol// don dam rang bzhin mtshan ma med// mtshan mar mi rtog chos
121a2(rgyud 'grel): sku la// bde gshegs mtshan dpe'i skur gnang ba// rdo rje can la skyabasu mchi// dus gsum mgon po thugs rje can// byams pa'i thugs lus ma g.yos kyang // dgos pa'i dbang gis khro sbrul
121a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ gsang sngags lnga tshogs kun skyabs mchi// nges bsgrub des mtshon gsung gis tshos// nyi shu rtsa brgyad drag po'i tshogs// chos kyi rang bzhin dri ma med// chos kyi mchog la skyabasu mchi// sna tshogs
121a4(rgyud 'grel): sku sbrul don mchog bsgrub// rin chen skabs mchog dge 'dun dang // 'phags pa gos sngon byang chub sems// dge 'dun mchog la skyabasu mchi// bla ma dus gsum mgon po dang // bcom ldan phyag
121a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ni// 'khor da bcas la lus 'bul bas// bzhes nas bdag la rjes brtse bas// rjesu mthun pa'i dngos grub go stsol// dang po byang chub sems bskyod nas// tshogs gnyis las byung dge ba rnams
121a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor po'i sems can ma lus don// byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya// byang chub tu yang sems bskyed la// sngags kyi dam tshig sbyin par bya// maN+Dal mngon du 'gro ba yis// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang /
121b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po dang // dkon mchog gsum dang bstan dga' kun// bdag la dgongs nas gzigasu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di// dus 'di nyid nas bzung na su// byang chub snying por
121b2(rgyud 'grel): mchis kyi bar// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// ji ltar dus gsum mgron po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges gnas pa// tshul khrims
121b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum sdom pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdod pa dang // sems tsam don byed tshul khrims rnams// so sor bdag gis gzung bar bya// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
121b4(rgyud 'grel): te// dam pa bdag gis bskyeng bar bgyi// 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs ngag po'o// dem tshig yin par rgyal bas bsgrags// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang // skyon bral rdo rje chen po'i rigs// thugs rjes 'brel pa'i slob
121b5(rgyud 'grel): dpon ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya// dri ma med pa'i dam tshig chos// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyinA re bzhin du dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bya// byang chub chen po las byung ba// pad+ma'i
121b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi nang gsong ba theg pa gsum// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya// las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ni// thun mong thun mod+ma yin pa'i// sdom pa ma luso thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid du
122a1(rgyud 'grel): so sor bzung // byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar// mchod pa'i las ni ci nus kyi// ma bsgral ba ni bdag gis bsgral// ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgol// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyung
122a2(rgyud 'grel): bgyi// sems can dngos grub che la dgod// dkyil 'khor me tog mngon par bcas// rdo rje 'chang la dbul bar bya// bdud rtsi rnam lnga gtor ma'i tshogs// rnam pa kun tu bsten par bya// thabs kyi bsgral ba'i de ma
122a3(rgyud 'grel): gas ni// snying rje las byung bsgral bar bya// lan gsum par du dam bcas la// rigs kyi lha las 'ong 'phros pas// rang rang ye shes yig bzhis bstim// rdo rje bu tshur dri yis chus// mas rim bzhin du
122a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya// de rjes mchod pa spro bar bya// a shwad tha dad pa la sha/ u dum wA rA la sogs pa'i// ser bcu 'am ni yang rwa brgyad// rtse mo me tog mdzes pas brgya ni// dkyil 'khor 'dab brgyad rnam lngas
122a5(rgyud 'grel): byug/ sha ro bltas dbus su sos bzung nos// dam pa'i phyag rgyas ngor byas te// khyod ni dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// zhugs pa'i dngos grub brtag pa'i phyir// rnam shes dag pa'i so shing 'di// so shing gnas
122a6(rgyud 'grel): ni dbus su dor// bdag dang bla ma steng bltas nas// mchog gi dngos grub dam pa yin// phyogasu phyin las so so te// mtsham su 'jig rten dngos grub 'byung // thur bltas sa 'og grub pa yin// sa la ma
122b1(rgyud 'grel): spyang mkha' spyod do// bad+mad rtsi byin brlabs thong bar blug/ rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje'i chu// 'thung cig dam tshig byin gyis brlabs// gal te dam tshig 'das pa nA// dmyal bar nges par bsreg byed de// a Sh+Ta shud+d+ha d+harmAs pa/
122b2(rgyud 'grel): bApA paM Niny+tsa sho d+ha ya bi kal+lo na a pa na hUM ya hUM lin gsum sbyor chus ngag dag byas// lha dang rjes mthun skud pA la// sngags btab g.yas dang phrin las g.yon// khro bo gtum po'i phyin brlabs dang // gres
122b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags nus pa thA na med// skal ldan par tshed me par bsrung // su yang snod pa maM byed cig/ ku sha gtsang ma byin brlabs te// bzhin bzangs tshur nyen dkyil 'khor du// 'jug pa'i sngags rnams brtag pa'i
122b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir// shaM ku sha'i rtsa 'di sngags dang stan+da// thub pas ting 'odzin grub ltar shog/ ma nAM ra seng ge bzhi nyal nas// mtsha na ma ji ltar byung ba ltar// bla mo'i mdun du brjid par bya// bzang na dngos grubA spro ba bskyed
122b5(rgyud 'grel): grol te ngan na bskrad dang bsrung // me yi las kyis bzlog par bya// gzhan yang dge bo'i las kun shes// bla mas rdo rje can mchod lo// nang par langs te dkyil 'khor pa// na mkhar btegs lo thig gdob
122b6(rgyud 'grel): ste// bu mo gtsang zhing sdom ldan gyis// bkal ba ras bal las byung ba// ye shes lnga ni gcig bsdus pa'am// yang na sku gsung thugs kyang ru// aM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA s+pha ra s+pha ra a nu ga ta sarba
123a1(rgyud 'grel): d+har+m+ma a d+yan ta a nu pra biSh+Ti sarba d+har+m+ma/ zhes brjod pas bsgril bar bya/ pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas kyang // mi 'chi lnga yis spang bAs la// blo ldan ye shes bstim byas la// na mkhar ye
123a2(rgyud 'grel): shes dza dza gdab// sgro yis bcu gnyis tshwa dang ldan// srid kyang khang pa gnyis 'gyur la// tshangs pa'i las thig drang byas nas// oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+pho traM ma tI kra ma hUM/ tshangs dang zur thog la sogs pa/
123a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan des// cha ni gang yin rnam par dbye// gal te nyes pa'i 'bras bu ni// chang na bla mo'i stog g.yo zhing // sman lhag nad kyis btab pAr 'gyur// phyogs 'khrul slob ma
123a4(rgyud 'grel): rmongs par 'gyur// blo ldan nyes pa med par bya// gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs bcas// dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan// nyi zla dril bu dbyer khas spras// pad+ma khyams dang rdo rje'i phreng // du ro khrod me r-I la sogs pa/
123a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa mA lus rdzogs par bya// rin chen rnam lnga 'phru byed dang // 'byung khungs las byung rnam pa lnga// pad+mar so sor bzhig bya ste// sngags kyis btab pa yig 'bru bsam// ye shes bstim la yig
123a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis// byin gyis brlabs te mthing kha blangs// dbang ldan mtshamasu drang bya ste// 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can khams ni sgrol byed pa// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa gnas//
123b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de bzhin ljang du drang byas la// 'di ni so sor rtog pa dag/ dmar po mnyam nyid ye shes te// ser po bya ba grub pa la// dkar po me long ye shes dag/ me tog
123b2(rgyud 'grel): dor la mtshan ma brtag/ pathams cad g.yas bskor ma ne ri bo'o// sbom 'phra chad pa med par bri// nyes pa 'byung ba'i rim pa ni// tshen mi mnyam zhing yo dang rma// dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ba yin/
123b3(rgyud 'grel): yon pos rtsod la gdud par 'gyur// sbom na nad 'byung gal te phra// nor nyams chad par gyur pas na// 'chi 'gyur phyogs nyams phur bus 'dabs// shwar dkar lho sir nub phyogs dmar/ byang
123b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ lci ba mthon mthing 'khyil bar bya// mtshams sogs cho gse brtags pa dang // dur khrod rnams ni rim pas bri// rdo rje dkyil 'khor lhar bsgrib pa// yel bso
123b5(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa'i dkyil 'khor du// khrus byas dri yis lus byugaso te// gong bzang gis brgyan lan gsum bskor// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// nga rgyal byas te hUM sgrogs pas// ra gyi sgo nas nang du
123b6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs// sgo bzhi yang ni dbye bar bya// oM badz+ra ud g+ha Ta sa ma A be sha ya hUM/ bum par 'ang gnas 'dug byas te// mchod pa'i rdzas kyis legs brgyan nas// dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par
124a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// ye shes bstim lnga mchod par bya// bstod cing glu dang lnga na pa yis// tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod par bya// de nas lhag pa'i lha yang bsdu// bzlas pa'i rim pa bzhin du
124a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod// shar du zhi ba'i me los bya// de nas shar gyi dbang stegs pa// slob ma'i cho ga ji lta bar// slob dpon dbang dang ldan par bya// me tog thogs la tshig 'di brjod// hUM thugs kyi sras po rdo rje 'dzin//
124a3(rgyud 'grel): gadrug pa 'dul mdzad gtumr-i po yis// slob ma smin par bya ba'i phyir// bdag la dbang bskur sbyin par mdzod// de ltar ri mo pa rdzogs pa dang // de nas slob ma gzhug pa ri bya// yol ba'i phyir gnas rim
124a4(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin// khrus byas sngags 'dis dag par bsama?// kA ya br-ika tsit+to sarba pA paM sho d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas lhar byas gnas ga sum+ba du// oM badz+ra ban+d+ha tra Ta k+ShA ya bA ga tsit+ta/ zhes pos sdig pa dralo byas la// rang
124a5(rgyud 'grel): rang yi ges bsom par bya// bgegs bskang sdig pa gzhom pa dang // bla mas rang gi sa bon gyiso// slob ma'i sdig pa sbyang bar bya// au kA ye shud+d+hi sarba d+harma kA ye shud+d+hiM haM/ oM b+ha ga shud+d+ha
124a6(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma bAka shud+d+ho haM/ oM tsid+d+ha shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA tsit+tA shud+d+ho haM/ rnam dag lha yi ngo bor bya// gdong pa ras kyis bkab nas ni// bu khyod su yin ci la dga'// sangs rgyas kun gyi ring bzhin sku// slob
124b1(rgyud 'grel): dpon mgon la skyabasu mchi// gtso bo khro bor bcas pa yis// lha rnams kun la phyag 'tshale// bdag ni bskal bzung rigs yin te// rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la dga'// phrin las ma lus khyod la rdzogs//
124b2(rgyud 'grel): thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du// mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod// slob mas yon phul sngags 'di brjod// oM a khaM bI ra hUM/ rang rang gnas su bzhag nas kyang // bgegs kyi bar chang gsal
124b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// dkyil 'khor la ni bskor byas te// shar gyi phyogs nas sgo phye la// lha dang sangs rgyas rnams bskul te// sku gsung thugasde kyi byin brlabs kyis// bdud bzhi rnam par dag bcom nas// sngags
124b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dis phyag gsum brkyang la byA/ oM na mA te hUM/ oM no ma mAM hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA/ de nas thal sbyar she ra phyogs nas// oM trai lo kyo bi dza ya/ pu dze pas+tha nAM ya/ At+ma nAM nir+ya tA yA mi/ sarba tA thA ga
124b5(rgyud 'grel): ta a k+Sho b+h+yA/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa o d+hI tiSh+Tha ta sra maM/ mi skyong brgya byin steng du gsal/ oM ma hA kA la pu dzI bas+thA nA yA/ At+ma nAM nir+ya drA ya mi/ sarbA tA thA ga ta rat+na saM b+ha baM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a d+hi taMny+dzA sA mAM/ lho'i phyogs
124b6(rgyud 'grel): nas phyag byes te// bral bar sU ni khyab 'jug mnan// nub nas gsung gi dbang phyug gzhom// oM a mr-i ta ku t+l-i li/ puM dza bas+tha nA ya/ At+ma naM nI r+ya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma d+ha ri aM b+hi Shiny+tsa/ o d+hi
125a1(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha ta sam+b+he/ oM Ur+yA dzA b+hA la pU dzo bAs+tha nA ya/ A nir+yA ta yA maM/ sarba t+yA thA ga ta a mo g+hA spr-id+d+ha/ a b+h+r-i ShiT+Ta a d+hI tiSh+Tha ta srA maM/ nub byung rim pas+yA phyag bya'o// las kyi bum byas
125a2(rgyud 'grel): khrus byas te// sdom pa ma lus pa yang sbyin// byin gyis brla bris phyir ye shes kyang // bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// bdog la byin gyis brlabs mdzod la// rdo rje
125a3(rgyud 'grel): sesomaso dpa' bla na med// bdag la da ltar bskyed du gsol// sdig byol spos kyis bdug byas nas// 'gying bcas rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// sangs rgyas ma lus lhag pa'i lhararo// bsdus la gnyis med bde ba tshe//
125a4(rgyud 'grel): zag med bde bas yan lag khyab// hUM 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste// rdo rje gtum po semaso dpa' che// ye shes rdo rje bla mid 'di// da lta nyid du 'bab par shog/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA r-i ShA Na/ a b+hi sha yA staM ta pA
125a5(rgyud 'grel): ye/ rA rA rA rA/ tsa lA ya/ a hUM me hA d+h+yaM badz+ra tsaN+Da a b+he sha yA a a a A a zhes bzlas gang la bab gyur kyang // oM badz+rA tsaN+Da mA hA ro Sha Na/ a d+hiSh+ThA te swa ma yaM/ sngags kyis brtan byas lce la a/
125a6(rgyud 'grel): dge mi dge'i lung bstan bya// me tog rdo rje dang bcas pa// spyi bor bzhag la 'di dag skad brjod// hUM rdo rje gtum po deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag zhugs pa ni// gal te tshul 'di gzhan smras na// de ma
125b1(rgyud 'grel): thag tu bral te gshegs// bdud rtsi lngas bkang ka pA la ra// sngags btab rdo rje dang bcas sbyin// hUM 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i chu// dam tshig nyams na bsreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub rnams// rdo rje bdud
125b2(rgyud 'grel): ci'i chu 'dis 'grub// oM aHhUM/ badz+re tha kA hUM/ shwar du 'dug ste 'di skad brjod// dong nas brtsams te khyed rnams kyi// rdo rje gtum po nga yin gyi// khyed kyis nga lu brnyas pa na// ma bde ma spangs dus byas
125b3(rgyud 'grel): nas// dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re// phyogs bzhi nas ni dngos grub brtag/ mdzes pa'i me tog lha la dor// gsang ba bla na meng me tog 'di// po brang dkyil 'khor lha mchog la// las dang rjes mthun badz+ra bo yI/
125b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs dang mthun par 'bab par shog/ b+h+r-i tI dza ho badz+ra/ lha'i bstod deng rked pa dang // smad dang nye ridra gtso 'khor gyi// bye brag dngos grub brtags yin no// de nas bla mas me tog blangs// slob ma'i mgor bcings
125b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di badz+rod// oM d+har+m+ma kun+na d+ha a b+hI Shiny+dza/ lha bsti ma rigs kyi ming yang gzung // sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yos// ma rig ling rtog gsal ba ltar// de bzhin khyod kyi mig ga dbye ste// yis mig gI
125b6(rgyud 'grel): mthong bar shog/ badz+ra tsak+Sha~M trai l-i hri/ gdong g.yogs pa shus nas 'di skad brjod// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'od la ltos// mthong na dang ba rab tu skye// khyod ni sangs rgyas rigaso su gyur// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin
126a1(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs te/ dngos grub ma lus snod du 'gyur// rigs kyi rnam par dag pa bstan// de nas slob ma dang ldan pas// bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te// yon mchog bla med phulA nas kyang // dbang /
126a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba yi gsol ba gdab// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod kyi cing gsol mdzad pa// bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag gsol// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag
126a3(rgyud 'grel): ni slob dpon mchog bgyid do// lan gsum brjod nas shar phyogs// pad+ma 'dab brgyad khri lnga 'dug/ rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs pas// chu rnams thod ba'am bum par bsdus// rdo rje'i glu dang dril bu ro ldan// rigs/
126a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga rlig pa'i lha mor ldan// bag chags mA lus ngag byas te// sku gsung dam tshig las byung ba'i// ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med// lha'i bdud rtsi rnam dag 'dis// mi bskyod rdo rje'i dbang bskur ro// oM A daR+sha dz+nyA na a
126a5(rgyud 'grel): b+hI Shiny+tsa hUM/ chu yi dbang bskur dam pa 'dri// sgrib po rnam pa gsum bral nas// mi bskyod rnam dag ye shes 'thob// mi bskyod rdo rje dngos grub shog/ lugs ma 'am thong ka 'bur bris po'i// gser sogs dgu brgyan
126a6(rgyud 'grel): rin 'byung bsam// dbu brgyan rin chen dam pa 'dis// sems can tshim par byed pa'i mchog/ yid bzhin bsam pa 'grub byed pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra sa ma tA/ dz+nyA na hUM Sha tiSh+Tha a b+hi
126b1(rgyud 'grel): wi hUM/ dbu rgyan dbang bskur dam pa 'dis// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs// bdag gi mgo la rgyan gyur te// rin tshun 'byung ldan dngos grub shog/ rin chen la sogs rdo rje la// snang ba mtha' yas bcug
126b2(rgyud 'grel): byas la// lag tu gtad la tshig 'di brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang // mi phyeng rnam dag 'od gsal stong // dam chos 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pa// rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/
126b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dbang bskur dam pa 'dis// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin// bdag gi rgyud las skyes gyur te// snang ba mtha' yas dngos grub sh+log/ dril bur don yod grub pa bcug/ lag pa g.yon gtang tshig 'di brjod//
126b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'gre don mnyam pa med byed pa// 'dod po'i phrin las rdzogs byed kyi cing // dril bu las kyi dbang bskur bas// oM kr-i t+yA nuSh+TA naM/ dz+nyA na pA ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ dril bu'i dbang bskur
126b5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa 'dis// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// gsung gi dngos grub bdag gyur te// don yod grub pa'i dngos grub shog/ rnam snang bskyed las tsho rigs mi'i steng // 'kho ra lo thogs pa'i mi nga
126b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs te// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas// byang chub thob pa'i bar du ni// cis kyang gzhom par mi nus pas// rdo rje ming du rab tu grags/ oM pro ti she d+harmA d+ha tu dz+nyA na nA ma oM b+hi Shiny+tsa mi hUM/ ming gi dbang bskur
127a1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa 'dis// stong gsum bye ba phrag brgya ru// sprul pas 'gro rnams chos ston cing // rnam par snang mdzad dngos grub shog/ rigs lnga yum gyis rig rdza// rnam ngag ye shes lnga sbyor bas// rig
127a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang du rgyud pas bstan// shar du seng ge'i khri la 'dug/ steng du gdugs kar phug nas kyang // phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur te// slob dpon rang bzhin 'od dpag mchog/ skal pa chen po bdag la gsol// bde gshegs
127a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi dbung bskur ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa// de ni sangs rgyas dpag med do// brtul bzhugs bla na med pa de// ji ltar 'dul bzhin bdag la gsol// de nas rnam rgyal bum pa blangs// mgo steng bzhag la
127a4(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'dis sbyin// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gang sum kun gyis phyog byas pa// gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin pa yin// phrin las thogs pa med pa rnams// bu yis gzhan
127a5(rgyud 'grel): don bla med byos// khyod ni rdo rje slob dpon yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas sros yin no// zhes bya dung dang rol mo dbul// lung bstan bya phyir bla mo yis// sprul pa'i skur bcas dga' dang bcas// chos gos bzung
127a6(rgyud 'grel): la 'di skad brjod// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gshegs// srid pa'i mtha' ni grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton// kye rdo rje de bzhi gshegs pa che ge zhes// sid d+hi badz+ra tsan+na ta thA ga te sa ma ya
127b1(rgyud 'grel): s+t+waM b+hur b+hu ba swA hA// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus pra// khyod la lung bstan byas pa 'dis// gsang sngags rdo rje'i mthu yin pas// dad pas 'di la spro bar gyis// de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin// rdo rje lag+na tu legs
127b2(rgyud 'grel): byinra lu// 'di daM sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag nA bsgoms// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yA tISh+Tha e ShastaM d+ha ra ya
127b3(rgyud 'grel): mau hi hi hUM/ de nas dril bu sbyin byas te// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes ra ba dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha
127b4(rgyud 'grel): g+haN+The sa ma yaSh+NI ta a shwa tau d+haur+m+ma mi hi hIhi hUM/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po is// mi shes rab rib bsal ba lhor// bu khyod kyi yang mi shes pa'i// ma rig ling tog bsal bar bya// sman ldan gser
127b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi thur ma yis// ye shes dag par mig 'byeng ngo // oM badz+ra na tra oM pa ha ra pA Ta laM hI/ de nas me long g.ya' ngag bstan// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lnga bus te// dag cing gosal la rnyog pa medra//
127b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod du med cing gzung du med// rgyu dang las los thams cad 'byung // de nas rdo rje me long phyar// rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar// dag cing gsal la dri ma med// sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin ni//
128a1(rgyud 'grel): bu khyod kyi nI snying la gnas// zhes bya ho yis mnga' gzhu sbyin// bskyod la phyogs gzhir bdud la 'phang // de nas hUM las skyes pa yis// 'khor lo rkang pa'i bur bcug la// dri ring phan
128a2(rgyud 'grel): chad 'jig rten lnga// skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// kun tu dri mi sdig dang bral// de nas dung byin bus nas kyang // chos kyi dung ni bla na med// som gnyis yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
128a3(rgyud 'grel): dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su// sangs rgyas spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ 'jig rten 'dir ni rab tu sgrogs// de ltar byas nA sangs rgyas la// phan btags drin du gzo zhes bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di kun kyang // khyod ni
128a4(rgyud 'grel): rjesu bsrung bar byed// de nas rigs lngar bsam byas la// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par// sems can ma lus drang po'i phyir// chags pa med pa'i bsam b+ha yis// ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs pa'o// chos
128a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis// de bzhin rigs kyis gang 'dul ba// khyod kyi phrin las mchog yin no// de nas slar yang rdo rje 'dzin// gsal byur byas te tshig 'di brjod// de nas bzung nas rigs kyi bus/
128a6(rgyud 'grel): zho rgyas dbang dang bsad pa dang // dgug dang bcing dang sreg pa dang // bslang dang dbye pa la sogs pa'i// phrin las sna tshogs bsgrub par gyis// ral gri mig smin sa 'og dang // mchin lhamo de bzhin
128b1(rgyud 'grel): ri lu ste// thun mong dngos grub ma lus pa// de dag khyod kyis bsgrub par gyis// ma lus snang ba byin par bya// dAde bar dbugs dbyung rnams kyang sbyin// khyad par bkra shis dbang rnams dang // rim pa bzhin du rdzogs
128b2(rgyud 'grel): pabar bya// gal te gsang po'i dbang bskur ba// bzhin bzangs mig yangs lang tsher ldan// lus lo dri yis byugs byas te// brtse dang rgod pas g.yo byas la// thabs dang shes gnyis pab ste// nor bu
128b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems lhung bas// bde gshegs khu ba mtheb srin gyis// dril bcas slob ma'i kha ru rbab// e ho su kasa? te ltung ngo // rdo rje sra ra yi nyon mongs 'joms// mtshan ldan bde ba bskyed pa de// yol bas
128b4(rgyud 'grel): bor bcad snyoms 'jug brtsam// bsrub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgra yi rgyun med longs spyod kyis// brlabs kyi rgyuni ni chad pa las// lhan cig skyes pa ye shes kyang // rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dran par bya//
128b5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig de dang ma bral na// mi tog ye shes skye bar 'gyur// de nyid brjod du med pa la// brjod med tshig gi dab nga du bshad// gal te de la mi rtogs pas// bzhi pa'i dbang du rgyu du bsten// dkyil
128b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam lnga'i dbang bskur nas// tshogs dang mchod pa rgya tshan bya// slob ma dang ldan mchog des kyang // rta dang glang po ma he dang // bu dang chung ma srol dang dbyig/ ci yod phyag byas ma zhen pos// bla ma mnyes phyir
129a1(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya// bla mas slob ma dam pa'i mgor// bkra shIs brjod cing gdugs phug pas// slob ma mchod pa rdzas thogs nas// drin lan dkyil 'khor lan gsum
129a2(rgyud 'grel): bskor// smon lam gdab cing dge ba bsngo// tho rangs tshon bsdus bum par blug/ chu 'am ri 'am neg phug sde// dri bzangs kyis ni thig phyis la// sa der zhi ba'i mye las bya// yang na 'phongs pa tshim pa
129a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // tse ta'i las la brtson par bya// ji ltar rgyud las glasal gyur cing // bla mra'i man+da ngag thob gyur kyang // cung zad spros phyir bdag nyid spros par byas// 'on kyang nyes tshogs ci mchis bshags
129a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// bzang po mdor bsdus cho ga mchog/ gzhan phyir bkod pa'i dge ba yis// rigs drug gtum po'i lAm zhugs naso// myur du de'i 'bras thob bo shog/ rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
129a5(rgyud 'grel): bang po mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba glan chung dar me tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o//
130a1(rgyud 'grel): chos sngon mam gyi rgyud kyi rnams gang dge slong klu'i byang chub kyi mdzad pa bzhugs/
130b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pa Ni Ar+ya nA mra tan+t+ra TI kA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lagA na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rnam par bshad pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
130b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// bden pa gnyis la rab gnas shing // thibs dang shes rab zung 'brel ba'i// mgon po sgrib pa kun spangs yin tan ma lus kun gyi bdag po de// shes ra thabs kyis
130b3(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan mtha' spangs nas// snying rje chen pos sems can mun 'thibs pa// mun ma mthong sgom rtsa ba nyon mongs zhi mdzad pa// gsang sngags sdud mdzad mi g.yo bcom ldan 'das// thugs rje bsnyel ba med la phyag
130b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// gang gis gsal bar byas pa de rnams byas pa ma yin tshig don skyen drang ldan// de na 'dir ni gsang ba don las dga' ba skyes// tshig gi skyon bral man ngage nyams dang ldan// shAkya'i rigs kyi ma
130b5(rgyud 'grel): ngag don ldan rgyas par bstan pa la so// shes rab domigs ma phyed pas bshad zin bstan pa dag/ de drag dman gyur 'dir ni gsal bar byas// deso ni nyi zla dag dang mthun pa'i bstan bcos 'di// thugs rje nye
130b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bsngos pa yis// snying rje ldan pa'i sems kyis su// rnga rgyud mon ngag bshad par bya// rtsa rgyung rang bzhin don rnams la// sde tshan lnga lnga ni shu lnga// yAM sha mtha' bcas rtsa baM ldan// thabs dang shes
131a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gnyis ldan gsum du 'dus// brjod pa rtogs byed tshig gi don// rtsa ba bshad dang tshig gi don phyi ma// phyi ma mchog dang ma log bzhi ru ston// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos/
131a2(rgyud 'grel): 'og yin chos dbyings pho brang du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas// sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas// ma lus pA yi stobs kyi su// sku de rnam pa gsum gyi don// thobs byed rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi lam//
131a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos byed 'bras bu'i lam yin te// rgyu ni tshogs te dran sogs pa'i// phyi zhing dro ba'i rang bzhin te// nyon mongs dam tshig zhi rtse mo'o// phyir mi ldog dang 'jig rten mthar stobs lnga// dbang po lnga yi rang
131a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// byang chub yan lag bdun po ni// mthong lam skad cig bcu drug go// sa dang bsgom lam mthar phyin 'bras bu'o// dngos byed lam ni 'bras bu sngags// byin gyis brlabs sngags mthu yon tan
131a5(rgyud 'grel): no// lam ma bgrod pas 'bras bu med// dper na gru gzing bskyod pa yis/ rin chen mchog ni thob par 'gyur// brjod bya ston pa'i tshig gis kyang // 'bras bu bden pa myur du 'byin// des na sngags ni gsang
131a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags lam// lam ma bgrod par gsal byed 'gyur// deso na brjod ya khyad kyi nus pa yino// 'di skad la sogs po bshad pa mdzes pa byo ba'i phyir// rgyud 'di par brjod bya ba dang // dgos pa dang 'brel
131b1(rgyud 'grel): pab dang // mchog gi dgos pa bstan par bya ste// brjod bya dngos po med pa'i tshig ni// bstan kyang rtogs pa sngon du gtong ba rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur te// dung la dkar po spyi ni 'jug gi spyi bye brag la 'khrul pa bzhin no//
131b2(rgyud 'grel): de na skyon yod pa'i phyir chos kyis rjes su 'drang ba rnams mi 'jug go// des na byis pa dang smon pa dang mchog yin zhing gzhan la sogs pa ni dgos pa med snyam pa'am// 'di nyid kyi mo yin snyam pas mi 'jug ste/
131b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig drong don thams cad kyi 'brel ba dang // brjod bya dang / dgos pa dang / dogos pa yang dgos pa rnams gtan la phab pa sngon du byas nas mchod pas na// 'di nyid 'brel pa la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o/
131b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du 'brel pa dang brjod pa bshad pa ra tsa sau te mi bya/ smyon pa'i tshig bzhin du mi 'brel pa'am/ mo sha ma la sogs pa la don med par// 'dod pa'i zhen pas tshig chud par 'gyur bas// ma ning gi
131b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la zhen pa'i 'dod pa rnams// ci nas kyang tshig tshong par 'gyur zhes brtags nas 'jug par mi 'gyur ba nyid do// de bas na 'jug pa'i yan lag gi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te// thog ma nyid du dgos
131b6(rgyud 'grel): pa brjod par bya'o// de gang las shes par bya ba'i phyir// dgos pa dang 'brel pa brjod par bya ba yang bstan to// de nas dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa bstan to// brjod pa ji lta bu snyam pa la// 'di ltar
132a1(rgyud 'grel): lam dang 'bras bu brjod bya'i 'bras bur rtog ces bya'o// brjod pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes s+ho// de yang sgyus drangs nas tha lta dang su snang bas dngas kyi brjod bya skyes nas snang bar
132a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i brjod byas/ sgra drangs pa'i tshig gi don 'dis brjod bya rdzogs pas brjod bya/ mtshon par byed pa'i tshig la yang brjod bya 'di yi don zhes 'brel par bya ste/ 'di ltar lim la rten pas 'bras bu thob ste/ de ni de dang
132a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gal ba'o chos spring bar 'gyur ro// gal te de ltar yin no zad mod// de nyid bstan pa ci phyir snyam nas des na 'dir sgra'i tshogs la mi rten par nam yang rtogs pa mi 'byung ngo // ci'i phyir gal te byung na ni
132a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gzhung gi tshogs la sogs pa mi bltos par 'gyur na ni don med do// gal te yod na thams cad skye ba'am/ rkyen med pa rtogs pa thar par gyur pa las/ rgyu me dra 'bras bu skyo bar rigs pa med
132a5(rgyud 'grel): pa de/ namakha'i me tog bzhin no// des na rgyu la rang bzhin du bye brag gyur pa med pas rgyu med pa las 'byung bar 'gyuraro// phyi ma lta na yang 'ba' zhig pa rnams la ni 'ba' zhig rang la sro gzhan nus pa'i phyir
132a6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'byung ngo // 'bras bu yan lag rgyu la ma tshang bar byung na no// dus thams cad du 'bras bu 'byung ste/ de ni mengo pa'i phyir ro// de bas na gzhung gi tshogs med na brjod bya'i rtogs pa mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du
132b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhung thabs yin pa dang gzhung yang brjod bya'i don rtogs pa thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa'o// de bas na gzhung gi tshogs 'di bya dbugs kyi rtogs bya yin la/ dgos pa ni thabs las 'byung ba yin la/ nyid kyis 'brel
132b2(rgyud 'grel): te de bdag rang nyid kyi 'brel pa'o// de'i phyir gzhung bstan pas blang dang ngor ni dgos pa yin no// des cir 'gyur zhe na/ rang gi don phun sul tshogs par 'gyur ro te/ lam gyi rim pas tshogs lam dang drod la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
132b3(rgyud 'grel): tshu rol gyi ye shes dang mthong sgom la sogs pas 'brel zhes te de ni mthar phyin pa yang bzung ste// rigs kyi bu rnams dgos pa'o// // de ni me dang du ba bzhin te de dang de las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa ste/ thabs
132b4(rgyud 'grel): dang thabs nas las 'byung ba'i tshul gyis 'brel pa'o// des na nyon mongs pa dang shes pa rtsa nas byung ba ni rang don no// 'brel pa la yang de nyid do// sa bon dang bcas pa ston pa ni rang don phun sum tshogs pa'o// des na dgos
132b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dgos pa yang // gzhan la brten gzhan du mu stegs dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyag rgya chen pos gzhan mthar phyin pas la sogs pa ni/ dgos pa'i dgos pa'o// des na
132b6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba rnams la ni/ rgyud 'di brjod kyi'i 'brel pa dang // dgos pa'i dgos pa bstan to// de nas brjod bya dang 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang 'bros bu dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa bzhi nges par
133a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan to// gang zag dad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba rnams ni/ srid pa'i mtsho nges par gzung nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' nges par 'jug pa'i phyir bstan mi dgos so// de ltar brjod bya dang dgos pa brjod nas
133a2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag bstan pa ni gzhung don no// de la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ sdud pa po'i tshig tu smos te/ 'di skad smras pa thos zhes sbyar ro// 'di'i tshe 'di thos gzhan gyi tshe gzhan gyis thos
133a3(rgyud 'grel): par bstan to// thos pa ni bdag kho nas thos te/ gzhan dang 'brelnga med de/ de ni gzhan thos pa'o// 'di ni ri rab rtse rtsa brgyud nyi khri sum stong kha nas thos pa'o// des ni thos pa dka' ba dang / thos pa myang ba la
133a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yang yongs su bzung ngo // gzhan ni wa rA NA ser bden pa bzhi la sogs pa ste/ gzhan nye bar 'khor dang / shA ri'i bu la sogs pa'o// gtso 'khor tha dad pa'i phyi ro// 'di skad bdag gis thos
133a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyal ba mar me mdzad dang / shAkya thub pa dang / gats+tsha bo rdo rje 'chang dang / rnam rgyal la sogs pra thos pa ste/ sngon dang de lta la sogs pa ste/ bAr du yang thos pa ste/ gtso bo 'khor tha ma dad par bstan to//
133a6(rgyud 'grel): tha moM dang na rang gi tshig dang 'gal lo// gcig pa yin pa'i phyir snyam pa la/ gcig ca kyang mi stong ste/ kun rdzob tu snang ba thams cad kyang / 'khrul pa mi bden pa sgyu ma yin pas don ni stong nyid kho na'o zhes rgyud
133b1(rgyud 'grel): las gsungs pa yino// tha dad kyang mi 'gal bde bar gshegs pa la skyon gnyis med de/ thams cad zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa khams dang skye mched bral bas dus thams cad bdag dang bdag gis stong pa gnyis
133b2(rgyud 'grel): med/ zla ba dang chu bzhin no// de bas khams gsum rnam par rgyalnga ba ni/ phyag na rdo rje nyid deng rang bzhin gcig pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdul ba ni/ snang bas snang zhes bstan te me long rkyen gyi
133b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rang la gnyis su snang ba'o// de bzhin du sems bskyed pa'i smon lo ma dang snying rje chen po/ sems can gzhug po'i tshong du ston pa dang / 'khor ba drang ldan pa dang lam dang dri za'i gzugs dang / phung po
133b4(rgyud 'grel): dang skye mched ga bcu gnyis dang / khams dang rnam par byang ba'i 'bras bu dang nyon mongs pa dang mang du bstan pa rnams ni/ sems can gzhug pa'i ched yin pas thos zhes bya/ gzhan nas theg pa bstan
133b5(rgyud 'grel): pa sems can gzhug pa'i ched du lpags/ theg pa med cing 'bras bu med ces gsung so// des na phyag na rdo rje la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba thos pa ste/ gtso 'khor tha mi dod par bstan to// gcig pa'i
133b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir thos pa dang 'gal snyam pa lo mi 'gal te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang phyag na rdo rjer snang la/ de yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ru snang ngo // 'o na de dngosu snang ngam mi snang ba yin/ sprul pa yin
134a1(rgyud 'grel): nam ma sprul pa yin/ snang zhing sprul pa yin na sangs rgyas ma yin te/ dngos po tha dad du snang zhing shes pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i paro// bcom ldan 'das ni log pa'i shes bya dang ste/
134a2(rgyud 'grel): sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang khyad par med do// de'i phyi rA de ni sangs rgyas su lta bA r+ra mi bya'o// sprul po mya yin na snang bar mi rigs// ci'i phyir rgyu med 'bras bu snang phyir/ ri bong rA sogs
134a3(rgyud 'grel): snang bar rig sheso bya'o// bden de log pa'i shes pa dang ldan na de gnyis 'byung gi/ de med pa'i phyi ro dri mi 'a byung ngo // dngos su sprul yang mi lto 'dul ba'i dus la byab pa'i phyiraro/ de'i rang bzhin der snang
134a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ ma sbrul ang rang nyid de'i tshe des 'dul ba la rnam par rgyal bar snang ba'o// de nas dka' la por med pa'i phyir rang ging thos pa dang yang sdud pa pos thos zhes bya'o// 'di ro sems can gdul bya ma rtag
134a5(rgyud 'grel): par ston pa dang sdud pa po tha dang du bya ba med do// smon lam dang thugs rje dpag/ tu med pa'i 'gro don 'byung ba'i phyir thos zhes sbyaro// de na skyon dId gnyis mi 'byung ste/ de ni skyon thams cad bralaM ba'i
134a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir// dus kyang de ste de'i tshe de thos gzhan gyi tshe/ gzhan thos pa ste dus kyang de'i tshe/ zhes bstan te// 'di skad bang ga gis thos po ni e baM mA yA zhes 'byung bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'byung ba
134b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga rig dang she ye shes lnga dang sgra dang skye mched dang / khams bco brgyad dang / g.yo ba dang / mI g.yo ba dang / rtsa lnga dang dbang dang dga' ba la sogs pa la'ang shes par bya'o// de dag bstan pa'i yan lag ni/ phyi
134b2(rgyud 'grel): nang mthar thug rnam pa gsum ci bzhi no min dang ji bzhin sgra/ dgongs pos bshad dang dgongs pa myin// drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don// phyi ni mi bzang dbyings dang sbyar// nang ni rtsa rlung byang chub sems// rtsa lnga gtum
134b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i man ngag go/ mthar thug mthong nga lam ye shes te// dpe ye shes gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i lami bcu gnyis ni dngos po bral ba des na bral ba'i shes pa'o// gzhan yang phung po lnga dang / tshogs drug dang
134b4(rgyud 'grel): skye mched bcu gnyis dang khams dang bag chags khams gsum na bag chags rnams de ni brda min skye thal po'i tshig/ dgos pa ma yin zhesu byA/ shu tra su tra ma nu ha ra dang tan tra yan tra man tra'o// byang sems
134b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems can phal pa rnams thugs rje zag bcas thams cad skyob pa'o// sngags dang shes pa ma lus yongs su 'dzin rgyud ni 'khor ba rgyud de chos nyid byang chub sems// 'di yang gnas pa ma lus stong pas
134b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par byed// lung las 'di lta ste/ ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur bas// sems can ma lus bsad par bya// ma byin len dang brdzun smra dang // de ltar de ltar sems can don// 'dod chags la sogs spang
135a1(rgyud 'grel): bas sbyang // sems can kun la phan don du// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyu yi phyir// sems can thams cad bsad nas yang // de la sdig pa mi gos so// sems can kun la phan don du// sangs
135a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun la sbyor ba yis// gzhan gyi nor rnams phrog na yang // de la sdig pa mI gos so// 'dod tshogs lta bu bde ba med// de ni rgyal ba rnams la phul// sems can don du gzhan bud med// ston pas bsod nams
135a3(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur// sems can kun la phan don du// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyu yi phyir// mi dge bcu sogs spyad pa yang // bsod noms rnams mang 'phel zhes gsungs// snyoms par 'jug pa nas bzung ba// pha
135a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ma ni bsod par bya// rgyal po ngan pa bkur mi bya// bram ze'i grong khyer gzhom par bya// des kyang grolo bar gsungs pa ste// dgongs pa bshad pA zhes ni bya// drang ba'i don ni theg pa gsum dang dgu ru bstan
135a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// yod pas nyan thos rang rgyal rnams ni smos// phro rab rdzasu 'dod pa nyon thos rnams// byang chub sems dpa' de ni byis pa'i rang bzhin no// med par zhen cing chags par 'dod pa'o byis pa ste// theg pa dmin pa log
135a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shes pa ste// de mkho de la de'i theg pa bstan// ces rgyud las gsung so// yang dag ngo na dang ldan gyur pa// stong nyid rang bzhin lhug pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dngos// blang dor med pa thar pa'i lam//
135b1(rgyud 'grel): lung las kyang byang chub snyoms dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa ni bcing ba'o// tshul khrims nas ye shes kyi bar du ni bcing ba'o// bde ba dang stong pa dang / rig pa dang / bdag med pa ni bting ba'o// ci'i phyir tron bdan/
135b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang bral ba'i phyiraro// de nas bral ba'i chos la yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bslab par mi bya'o// des na mu stegs la sogs pa'i bdag lha dang / byis pa rnams kyi yod pa'i shes pa rnams ni gzhom
135b3(rgyud 'grel): pa sla'o// bdag med dang rig pa stong la sogs pa phyogs bral kyi bdag rnams ni gzhom pa dka' ba yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba las mi thar pastan to// des na 'dod pa lam du byas pa'i bcing ba'o// bya ba med pa thob pa med
135b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni nges po'i don zhes bya'o// de skad gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir de ni dus phun sum tshogs pa'o// gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu/ shin tu dben pa/ shin tu yongs dag pa zhes pas gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan
135b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin te/ gnod sbyin thams cad yongasu rgyu ba ni ri rab kyi rtse mo ste/ de na ni gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po dang lnga rtsen la sogs pa ste/ gnod sbyin gos sngon can gyi 'khor du bstan te/ de na ni gnod sbyin
135b6(rgyud 'grel): ma rungs pa gzhan yang yod pa ste/ de rnams yod pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad yongasu rgyu ba zhes bya'o// shin tu dben pa ni stug po bkod pa'i gnas te/ 'di yong dpe shel gsal ba'i nang du chud pa'i dkyil 'khor
136a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu gsal bA ni/ gzhal yas khang 'dug pa ni/ ma lus pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// de na ye shes chen po ston pa bzhugs te/ 'khor dang chos la sogs pa gcig tu
136a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs te me dang tsha ba bzhin no// rang bzhin gcig par shes par bya'o// des na gnas ni gsumo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
136a3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis las kyi khro bo dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar gnas gsum du ston pa gsum tha mi dad par bstan to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de rnams kyi gtso bo sbrul sku
136a4(rgyud 'grel): lag na rdo rjes 'dul bar bstan to// de la ni sbrul gyi rgyan ni/ nying las tha mi dad pa'i 'khor gyis gnod sbyin rnams ston pa'i gzi brjid kyis nyes pa'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sprul pa'i sbrul gyi rgyan btegs/
136a5(rgyud 'grel): ces bya bar bstan to// stag gi sham thabs pa nga gau sde sngon po bla gos rnams ni/ gnod sbyin zad pa'i stobs kyis skyabs kyi 'od la phul zhes bya'o// dus gsum bdi gshegs zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag
136a6(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rjes bcu la gnas pa'i tshe/ pad+ma stong dang ldan pa'i dbus su bzhag ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis thugs kyi stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje phyung nas phyag na rdo rje la thugs kyi bdag por sdud pa por dbang bskor
136b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing bka' gnang nas/ las thams cad brting phan chad kyis ces pa'o// mche ba gtsigs pa ying khros pa lta bu/ mig me mngag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can zhes bya ba la mche
136b2(rgyud 'grel): bAb gtsigs pa ni log par rtog pa'i bdud rnams za zhing 'joms pa'o// yid khros pas ni don snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ kun rdzob tu khro bo'i cha byad do// mig me mdag gi phung po ni/ las gnyis l-i 'jug/ rang
136b3(rgyud 'grel): smin pa'i las dang bltas pa tsam gyis 'jigs par byed pa'o// dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba ni/ smin ma dang sgra tsam gyi 'dul bar bstan to// 'jigaso pa'i nga ro ni ngag gi skyon bzhi dang bral zhing yid kyi zug rngu 'don
136b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing / hUM dang phaT kyi sgra bsgrags pas// 'khor rnams bsgrags pa'o// lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyis brgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/ klu nag po dang gnyen dga' bos snyan cha brgyan pa zhes pa ni/
136b5(rgyud 'grel): lag pa ni sbrul nag po dang ser pos brgyan par shes par bya'o// rkang pa la sbrul nag pos bai rgyan pa'i ske rags ni dmur por byas pa'o// sa ral khaM ni klu khang po'i rigs kyis ga shar byas pa'o// klu dga' bo
136b6(rgyud 'grel): nye dga' bo'i ming yin la/ de dang 'dra ba'i sbrul dkar pos snyan cha brgyan par bstan to// sbrul 'bar ba ran po che'i cod pa na thogs pa/ sbrul gdugs pa 'bar ba za zhes pa la/ sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod
137a1(rgyud 'grel): pan thogs pa ni/ dbu la nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'o// 'bar ba nI nag po la sogs pa'i kha dog bzhi/ sbrul rin po che dang ldan pas dbu la brgyan par bstan to// gdug pa za ba ni zhal du sprul
137a2(rgyud 'grel): nag po gsol bar bstan to// des kyang gtso'i 'dod chags rnam pa ru dag pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa'i skyon dang bral zhing / phyi rol gyi klu'i rigs drug 'dul ba'i rtag su bstan// bzhin rgyas pa smin ma
137a3(rgyud 'grel): dadal bar bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byed can zhes bya ba la ni/ bzhin rgyas par mi stong pa nyid kyi don rgyas par/ gding gi 'phel ba ste/ lha lo sogs pa gdul ba 'dul bar bstan to//
137a4(rgyud 'grel): ye sos ma mchu mnan pa ni/ ya sos ma mchu'i steng du phyin pa ste/ b+he brag tu srin po 'dul ba'i rtags so// smin ma dang dpral bar bsdus pa ni khro gnyer gsum dpral bar 'dug po sku gsum dang ldan pa'i
137a5(rgyud 'grel): rtags/ gshin rje'i cha byad can ni/ khro bo mi thung gzugs 'dra ba'o// des ni gshin rje'i rigs 'dul ba'o// lce grogs ltar 'gyu ba/ sbrul za ba/ gsus pa che ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa zhes
137a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ lce grogs lta ro 'gyu ba ni/ sprul pa klog pas myur ba'o// sbrul za ba'i sbrul klu'i nang ngan 'dra bas 'dod chags kyi gdung ba sel ba'o'o// gsus pa che ba gsus khyim che ba ste/ stong pa nyid kyang bstan to//
137b1(rgyud 'grel): lag pa brdabs pa ni gtso bo lag pa rdo rje dang ldan pas ma rungs pas 'jigs par byed pa'o// klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs skye ragasu bcings pa/ a la la zhes grags par byed pa zhes pa lA/ 'dab bzangs ni
137b2(rgyud 'grel): sbrul dmar po'i ska ra gsu bcings pa/ a la la mi de 'dra rgyan cha la ngo mtshar ba'o// de sgrogs pa ni sgra sgrogs pa'o// rgya mtsho'i zabasu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong od pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang
137b3(rgyud 'grel): nyo ma 'phrag pa la khur zhes pa la/ rgya mtsho la dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas phyag na rdo rje'i pus mo nub pre/ sku byin po lo nyis 'bum drug khri yod pa zhes pa ste/ sprul pa'i sku'i dong tshad bstan to// dbang po dang nyi ma ni
137b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs shes rab kyi ste/ nang gtso bo bzhugs zhes pa la/ yang na gtso bo'i phrag pa la nyi zla rgya ba ste zhes pa'i tsha // lA la na rI lha'i dbang po'i phrag pa la nyi zla rgyu ste/ de'i steng na phyag na rdo rje bzhug ces pa ste/ lha 'dul
137b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// klu thams cadra brlag par byed pa/ gad rgyangs chen po rgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa zhes pa la/ klu'i rigs kyi sa bdag la spogs pa brlag par ro// ha ho zhes bya ba'i sgra dngaswa pa'i phyir ro// gang
137b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyangs ni ha sa dwe ta'i sgra sgrags pas klu thams cad dngangs shing brgyal te sha ruHsa khro bo zhol du stobs zhes pa'o// klu thams cad 'ching bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'ogugs shing zhi ba ro mdzad pa zhes
138a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la/ 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pa 'gugs shIng bcing ba ste/ lcags kyu'i sbyor bas bkug nas/ dkar gsum dang mngar gsum dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bzhin zhes
138a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// klu thams cad ces pa ni/ bcing ba ni gcod mi nus te gzhan gshin rje dang 'byung po spyi yang yongs su bzung ba ste/ sbyor ba thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ sbyor ba thams cad bzlog par mdzad pa/
138a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba thams cad gnod par mdzad pa/ yon tan ma lus pa'i bdag po de zhes pa la zhes pa ni/ sbyor ba ni phyi'i drug dang / khrag dang sngags kyis byas pa'i gnod pa ste/ gzhan gyis byas pI'i rig snga
138a4(rgyud 'grel): tshur la mi tshugs par bzlog pa'o// sbyor ba bzlog pa ni rang bsrung ba dang / phra rol rang la bzlog pa'o// sbyor ba gA nod pa ni pha ra la bzlog pa'i 'khor lo thog pa mi mthun pas gnon zhes pa'o// tshig de gsum
138a5(rgyud 'grel): yang zab pa'i phyir bla ma'i min ngag la rog las par bya ba'i phyir bshad par mi bya'o// yon tan ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / stobs bcu dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
138a6(rgyud 'grel): par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// des kyang gnas khyad par can na ston pa yon tan dang ldan par bzhugs par bstan to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad
138b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che thams cad ces pas 'khor phun suM no \u0f7f bar bstan te/ rang gi 'khor ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang lha dang mI dang mi ma yin la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang rigs
138b2(rgyud 'grel): lngas khro bo dang lha mo dang / sgom la sogs pa'i nang nas khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal langs te/ 'di skad gsol zhes 'og dang 'brel to// bar du gcod pa'i phyir gnod sbyin smos te gang ba bzang po dang / nor bu
138b3(rgyud 'grel): bzezang po dang / l-I rtsen la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad do// gnod sbyin mthu bo che thams cad dang / zhes pa la mthu ni rang gi 'khor rnams thams cad la 'dul sems can thams cad la shing gi yol gos chu 'thor ba'o//
138b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin drag po thams cad mi sha rlon po rjen por za ba'o// sa nI l+yA min lha dang gnod sbyin ma rungs 'dul ba pa yang shes par bya'o// lha thams cad dang / k+Sha thams cad dang / dri zla thams cad dang / lha ma yin
138b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang / zhes pa lha ni brgyad de lha dang lha'i dbang po dang / lha mi ni bdag m+b+ha dwA de ba dang / khyab 'jug chen po dang u mA de ba kun tu rgyug/ 'chi med dbang po'o// klu yang dga' bo la sogs pa brgyad de/ de
138b6(rgyud 'grel): yang 'khor dang bcas pa'o// dri zo ni zur phung lnga pa'o// lha ma yin ni thag bzangs ris dang / 'khor dong bcas pa'o// na mkha' lding thams cad dang / mi 'am ci thams cad dang / lto 'phye thams chen po thams cad dang /
139a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po dang zhes pa la/ na mkha' lding ni gser mig can 'khor bcas pa'o// mi 'am ci ni ljon pa rta mgo can la sogs pa ri rab kyi khong seng gnas pa'o// lto 'phya ni lto 'phya nyid de/ mi'i lus po la
139a2(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gyi mgo bo la sogs pa'o// 'byung po ni dbang ldan la sogs pa brgyad do// yi dgras dang brjed byed la sogs pa dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te zhes bya ba la/ yI dgra ni kha nas mo 'bar ba lo sogs pa'o// brjed byed
139a3(rgyud 'grel): ni byol srong gi rgyal po ri rab la ge nas pa rnamaso// thabs gcig ni bskor ba'o// 'di ltar nyi ma dang zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs lta bu bzhugaso// zhes pa la nyi zla dang 'dra ba ni bden pa gnyis dang thabs shes rab
139a4(rgyud 'grel): dang lam gnyis dang la sogs skar ma lta bu bzhugs ces pa ste/ gnas de ston pa de 'khor de rnams dang lhan cig tu chos gsung ngo zhes bstan/ de ni chos phun sum tshogs pa yang yongasu bstan to// de'i chos yang zhes
139a5(rgyud 'grel): pa mi snang bar gyur kyi bar la dngosu bskrun/ ston pa dang chos kyi byin brlag yin pa'i phyir de ma gsung so// de nas 'phags pa lagu nA rdo rje gros sngon po can la 'khor thams cad kyis gsol ba zhes pa la/ de nas ni chos
139a6(rgyud 'grel): de lta bu la ston pa bzhugs te zhes pa'o// 'phags pa ni sgrib po rnam pa gnyis spang so pa'o// gong ma dang khyad par gyi don de ni sbrul sku lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can no// de la 'khor thams cad kyi nang nas
139b1(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba langs nas bla gos sngon po gsol te/ gos sngon po can khyod ci zhes te/ khyod kyi bya ba'i las dang po ngo bo ji lta bu lags/ bde gshegs kun gyi sprul pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kun
139b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi sprul pa'i ngo bo khyod yin nam/ gal te sku gsung thugs kyi bdag por bsdus pa'o yin nam/ phrin las thams cad kyi bdag por dbang bskur ba yin nam/ bdag khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang 'khor rnams
139b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bya ba lngas bskyed rdzogs grogs dang las kyi tshogs la sogs pa sngon po'i bstan pa sangs rgyas thams cad gcig gi ngo bo las kyi bu rgyud ji lta bu lags/ bdag cag gi bka' mnyan gyi khyod kyi sku gsung thugs drag
139b4(rgyud 'grel): bor bston pa ni/ lha mo nye ba ste 'khor ba las myur du bsgral zhes pa'o// daM bdag cag+ni 'khor dang bcas pa rnams ston pas gsungs pa nyan no zhes pa'i don to// le'u gang la ming de yod pA lo de ska da ces bya ste/ gleng
139b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhi sa phun sum tshogs pa lnga yod pas/ de rol deng po gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya'o// / rtsa ba'i rgyud las le'u sum cu rtsa gcig rgya cher bshad pa/ dge slong klu'i byang chub kyiso mdzad pa
139b6(rgyud 'grel): ste dang po'o// / de ltar gleng gzhi bstan kyang bskyeng tshogs kyis don ma bstan na 'grub par mi 'gyur ba des ni le'u gnyis pa bstan to// / des na lag ni rdo rjes rdo rje drag po zhes bya
140a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad gsung so zhes pa la/ de nas zhes bya ba la ni/ de nas sgras gleng gzhi song ba'i rting de nas/ bar cis kyang mchod par lag na rdo rje'i ston pa sku gsung
140a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs drag po'i chos gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms parA zhugs te/ 'di skad gsungs zhes bya bar sbyar ro// phyag rgya gsang sngags thugs sbyor la// khro bo rgyal po bsam par bya// khro bo rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis// byini brlabs
140a3(rgyud 'grel): ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan/ zhes bya ba la bla ma cig nas cig tu brgyud pA'i rim pa/ phyug rgya nI srung po dang byaso donams kyi tshogs dang ye shes dngos bsam gzhalnga yas khang bskyed pa la sogs pa'o// gsong sngags
140a4(rgyud 'grel): ni gzhal yas khyung gi nang du s+yeng+ga gau d+ha pUd+d+ha lA sogs pa'i steng / snying rje stobs kyi tho bo hU~M duM byung ba'o// thugs sbyor ni yig 'bru las phyag mtshan du gyur pa ste/ las gnyis byas pa'o// de la sku rdzogs pa ni/ khro bo
140a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po ste rdo rje rigs kyi skye bo'o// khro d+hi'i mIng ni gos ston tsan de mthong na ni khro bo gzhan thams cad kyi ni log tsha 'tsher zhes gsungs pa ste/ ri rab tu gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dus su'o// de rnams kyi rgyal po yin
140a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir rgyal po'o// khro bo rdo rje ting 'dzin ni/ oM AHhUM gis bsdus pa dang / srel pa dang sbyangs pa ste/ sku gsung gi lhar bskyed pa'o// byin rlabs ni lhag pa'i ye shes bstim pa dang / rig pa'i dbang lnga
140b1(rgyud 'grel): bskur sangs rgyas lnga gtso bo la dbang rtagasu brgyan pa'o// bla ma rigs lnga'i rang bzhin/ a hUM dkar dmar gyi ngo bo/ gu h+ya a b+hi'iShiny+tsa zhes pas lce la bzhag nas gsung dbyangs yan lag brgyad cu dang ldan ste/ a ts+tsha
140b2(rgyud 'grel): sukha zhes btung b.ru bya'o// des sngags bzlos pa dang / 'brel to// ya mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i dngos grub thob pa'o// yang man ngag rgya chen po rA dang sbyar te bshad de/ phyag rgya ni gzho lnga yas khang dang gtso
140b3(rgyud 'grel): bopo bskyed pa bstun te/ de yang tshogs bsag pa dang / tshad med pa bsgom pa dang / oM ma hA shU n+te dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+h+rUM wa/ U ta ma ko haM zhes pas ye shes kyi tsho gas bsags te/ de nas bsrung ba bzhi dang pad+ma yang hUM gi cho
140b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul kyis bskyed par bya'o// gusang sngags ni stong pa nyid do// de'i byin brlabs kyis yaM rA baM l-i suM bruM las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi pa dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa phyi rgyan dang nang gi
140b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis mdzes pa bskyod do// de'i dbus su gladan gyis mtshan pa ste/ gzhal yas khang de yang rin po che lnga yis brtsigs pa lha'i snam bu dang bcas pa'o// dar hUM gi cho 'phrul gyi cho ga gsung gis gtso bor yab
140b6(rgyud 'grel): yum rdzogs par bskyed po'o// de yang um la ni bskyed pa med/ lus dang grib ma bzhin du rdzogs ces pa'o// gsang sngags ni yab yum gyis/ e waM byin gyis rlabs te yab yum snyoms par zhugs te/ des rigs
141a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga yab yum bskul te thig le dkar dra mar/ gzhal yas khang gi nang du gsang sngags kyi ngo bo thig le dang yig 'bru bsam pa'o// thugs ni de ltas phyag mtshan du gyur pa'o//
141a2(rgyud 'grel): khro bo rgyalnga po ni de las sku rdzogs pa'o// khro bo rdo rje ting nge 'dzin ni/ gsadra ba nas lha rnams spro ba bstan+da te/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI lAM bu rA d+ha ra hUM/ oM bud+d+ha kro d+ha nI laM bA rA d+hA ra hUM/ oM rat+na kro d+ha nI lAM bu ra d+ha hUM/ oM
141a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma kro d+ha nI lAM ba ra d+hA rA hU~M/ oM karma kro d+hA nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra hUM/ oM trai lokya bi dza ye hUM/ oM mA hA kA l-i ro Sha Na hUM/ oM ba ru DA ka ye hUM/ oM be ru pa~Mk+Sha ya~M hU~M/ oM badz+ra lA s+ye hUM/ oM badz+ra mA le traM/ oM badz+ra
141a4(rgyud 'grel): gI ti hrI/ oM badz+ra nr-i tri a/ oM badz+ra d+hu p+te hUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe traM/ oM badz+ra A lo kri hri/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he a/ oM badz+ra aM ku shadz+riMHoM badz+ra pA shA hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta bau/ oM badz+ra grAN+Te ho/ oM bud+d+ha DA
141a5(rgyud 'grel): ki a hri hUM/ oM badz+ra TI ki a hri hUM/ oM rat+na DA ki a hraM hU~M/ oM pad+ma DA kri a hrI hUM/ oM karma TI ki a hrI hUM/ yang na kro d+hi shwa ri hUM zhes sbyar bA ra bya'o// zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi khro bo rnams ma
141a6(rgyud 'grel): nas bton te/ dbus kyi khro bo rang sor song nas/ gzhan yang rang rang rigs kyi kha dog la/ stag dang gis sngon sham thabs can// rang rang rigs kyi dbu rgyan byas pa'o// khro bo rdo rje ting 'dzin
141b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis zhes pa la/ shar du sangs rgyas gos sngon can// lho ru rin chen gos sngon can// nub tu pad+ma gos sngon can// byang du las kyi gos sngon can// sangs rgyas spyan la khro bo zhal// phyag mtshan rnams ni kun
141b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang g.yas na rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang / rgya gram bsnams pa la/ g.yon pa dril bu bsnams pa'o// rnam rgyal ni sku mdog dmar po// 'khor lo dang dbyug pa bsnams pa'o// mgon po yang sku
141b3(rgyud 'grel): mdog nag po dud kha la phyag na rin po che dang / tsan de na bsnams pa/ lus ngan po yang sku mdog sngon po la phyag na mchod rten dang pud+ma bsnams pa'o// rnam thos sras kyang sku mdog ser po la/ phyag na mchod
141b4(rgyud 'grel): rten dang ne le bsnams po'o// lha mo dang sgo ba yang rang gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams pa'o// de rnamaso la sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa'i yig 'bru'am/ phage mtshan nam sku yi so byin gyis
141b5(rgyud 'grel): brlab ces pa'o// byin brlab ni ye shes sems dpa' mdun gyis na mkha' la spyan drangs te/ bgegs bskrad pa dang mchod yon dang mochod pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas/ bcom ldan rdo rje gos
141b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon can// 'od zer stobs kyis klu rnams 'dul// mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan sangs rgyas gos sngom can// sku mdog dkar po skyon ma gos// 'khor lo dril bu phyag na bsnams// me long
142a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan rin chen gos sngon can// sku mdog ser po don rnam rgyas// ril chen dril bu phyag na bsnams// mnyam nyid ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal// bcom
142a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pad+ma gos sngon can// sku mdog dmar po chags par ldan// chu skyes dril bu phyag na bsnams// kun rtogs ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan las kyi gos sngon can// sku mdog ljang khu phrin las
142a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas// rgya gram dril bu phyagA na bsnams// bya grub ye shes khyod phyug 'tshal// khyams kyi cha lnga gnas pa ni// khams gsum rgyal dang mgon po gnag/ lus ngan po dang rnam thos sras// sprul pa sku
142a4(rgyud 'grel): yi tshul bsten pa// stong pa'i rang bzhin khyod phyog 'tshal// dkar mo sgeg dang rin tshon ser// pi waM ma ni dmar mo ste// nri ti ljang ku gar rnams bsgyur// stong pa'i don gyi tshim mdzad pa// mchod po'i lha mo
142a5(rgyud 'grel): khyod phyag 'tshal// shar lho lha mo bdug pa s+ho// lho nub mthing kha me tog ma// nub byang dmar mo gsal byed ma// byang shar ljang ku dr-i chab ma// pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs mdzad cing // 'dod pa'i don grub phyag
142a6(rgyud 'grel): 'otsho lo bstod// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrogs dril// bdud bzhi ma lus char gcod cing // phrin las rnam bzhi lhun grub pa/ bsgre ba bzhi la phyag 'tsha lo bstod// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dpal 'bor mo//
142b1(rgyud 'grel): sdug nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma// mthing nag 'bar ba'i rul pa can// rin chen mkha' 'gro dpalnga 'bar ma// ser nA ga 'bar ba'i ral pa can// pad+ma mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma//
142b2(rgyud 'grel): dmar nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// las kyi mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma// ljang nag 'bar bA'i ral pa can// stong pa bzhi yi rang bzhin can// sprul pa'i sku yi tshul ston pa// phyag na cang te kha T+wAM bsnams//
142b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// zhes pas bstod la sngags bzhis gnyisu med par bstim mo// dbang yang snga ma bzhin du blang ba ste// gong du bstan pa 'di re bshad ngo // des gtor ma dang bstod pa thun
142b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi bar du byas te/ bzlas pa bya ba ni/ rin po che'i pho brang du sems pa sum brtsegs gsal bar byas te/ grangs kyis bsnyen pa bsgyel zhes pa ste/ mtshan ma dang dus kyang yongasu shes shing gzung ngo // thun
142b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi rnal 'byor gyis spyod pa'i skabasu lam kyi sems bskyed kyang bsgom zhing bzlas so// swA hA hUM phaT ces brjod cing yongasu smin par bya'o// smon lam dge rtsa bsngo legs pas tshe 'di la nad dang sdug bsngal byeng
142b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ thun mong thun gyi dngos grub 'byung zhes bla ma rnams gsung ngo // de ni ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan zhes pa'o// las rnams grub la the tshom med// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po ste// bsang rmongs sna tshogs nges
143a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'grub// de nyid nges 'grub gdon mi za// zhes pa la gong du bstan pa bzhin bsgrubs na/ las sna tshogs zhi ba dang rgyas pa 'grub par the tshom mi za ste/ rtsa ba na gsal bas ma bris so// des na dkyil 'khor
143a2(rgyud 'grel): de la gtso bo'i dbang du byas te/ lha gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum du sgrub pa dang / lha bcu dang / bco brgyad nyid shu rtsa gnyis dang / rtsa drug sum cu lnga'i 'o dkyil 'khoraru lnga dang ni// mkha' 'gro bzhi'i dkyil 'kho
143a3(rgyud 'grel): dang drug tu 'gyur/ rang dang gzhan gyi dkyil 'khor du bla ma mkhas pa rnams kyi bstan to// de dag bstan pa kun la yang // tshogs bsags bsrung dang lha bskyed pa// cho ga'i sbyor ba mkhas par bya// zhes pa ste/ bla
143a4(rgyud 'grel): mama'i man ngag la rag khas pa'o// yang shi ba la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ phyag rgya gsang sngags gsungs te/ rgyas par ro bsreg cho ga nas shes par bya'o// 'di ro dang por ro la khrus bya bgegs bskrad/ gos dang rgyan
143a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang po btags nas// rgyun 'chags dang sdom pa gzung ba yang gnyen 'dun nam pha mas bya ste/ ro la bsrung ba dang bsnyen pa bya ste/ phyi rol du sa cho ga rgyas bsdus gang rung bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mtha' yos
143a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ thig gi cho gas thig gdab ste/ dbus dang tshangs thig btab lo thig chen dang tsho chen dang pha cha phran dang / tshig phran la sogs btab la/ sa tshon byin gyis brlabs la/ dkyil 'khor sgo gnyis brter
143b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang bcas pa bri zhes pa'o// lung las shi ba la phan gdags don chen du// sa tshogs rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor brnam// sgo gnyis rdzogs nas rgyan rnams mdzes// mchod dang gtor ma yongasu btang zhes gsung so//
143b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod pa'i yo byad gtor ma tshwa gnyis la sogs pa rdzogs la/ dkyil 'khor dbus su thab brtsigs la// ro shing rta'i 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ rnga dang dung pi waM chen po dang bcas pas seng ge dang rol mos sku
143b3(rgyud 'grel): drangs te// dbang gi bum pas khrus byed cing // bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis// shi la phan gongags don ched du// dbang bskur byin brlabs mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA
143b4(rgyud 'grel): ga ta nI lAM ba ra shud d+haHshud d+ho ha~M zhes brjod do// bsreg khang la bskor ba byas te ro bsreg khang du bzhag lo/ rang sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa gzung ba dang lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms la/ bde bar gshegs pa spyan drang ba
143b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / bzhugasu gsol ba yan tshad bya ste/ rdul tshon gyi steng gi na mkha' lo mchod pa dang / phyag 'tshal pa dang rin po che sna bdun dang rdo rje lha mo mchod pa dang / bstod pa la sogs pa yang yongasu rdzogs par byas la/
143b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsang gtor dang 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin gyis brlabs pa dang mgron bskyed po dang / gtor ma dbul ba la sogs pa'o// tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po gzugs khams lha tshogs zhes bya ba la
144a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i tshig bcad yang phyi rgyud bzhin brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du gtor ma gnyis pa yang dga' ba'i tshal dang / lha rnams dang / spyan drang ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang bstod pa dang
144a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis dbul ba la sogs pa bya'o// gtor mau phul te/ ngan song yongasu sbyong po'i sngags dang / ye shes pa'i 'od zer gyis gshin gyi las sbyang ba lo sogs pa pa zhes so// tha mar gshin dang yongasu 'brel

144a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i dbang dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang / rtsa rlung thig le dang / byang chub sems dang rin pa lnga la sogs pa yang sbyar bar shes par bya'o// radro gzhan 'phags dang bla ma dang // shin tu bla ma dam pa la
144a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod na/ dngos grub myur du 'byung zhe spa la// rang ngam gzhan gyis 'phags pa ste// dkon mchog gsum mam/ rang gi lhag pa'i dngos sam yid kyis mchod ces pa'o// bla ma'i snga snod gsum ston pa'i

144b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni bskyed pa'i skabasu/ tshogs pa'i cho ga bstan to// gal te gzhan la phan 'dogs na// sku de sna tshogs sku ru snang // snang ba sgyu ma'i sku yin te// zhes pa la/ gzhan la phran 'dogs pa'i ni sbrul sku'o// sku de
144b2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs sku ru snang // zhes pa la/ gang dang gang 'dul ba de dang de ru snang ste/ des de'i don byed ces pa'i don to// lha'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba yod pa ma yin te/ sgyu rma ma'am rmi lam du snang gis do na dam pa le med
144b3(rgyud 'grel): ces bya'o// 'o ni sgo med na snang bar mi rigaso snyam na/ gdug pa 'dul phyir rags pa'i sku ston to// sna tshogs de nyid bsam bral bas// dngos gzhi thar par yang dag gcig ces pa la/ sna tshogs dngos po'i don
144b4(rgyud 'grel): to// bsam pa ni shes pa'o// ngo bo ni sna tshogs par snang ba'o// de yang lung las chu rdul 'ja' smang ba bzhin// sems nyid dngos po yul du snang zhes pa'o// 'o na sems nyid dngos por bden nam snyam pa la
144b5(rgyud 'grel): shes par snang yang shes par mi bden te/ rigs pas brtags nu snang ba nyid// dngos po stong pa nyid ces gsung sro// stong pa yang bde ba dang snang ba'o// snang ba yang dade stong de bzhin nyid// thar par yang
144b6(rgyud 'grel): dag gcig ni bden pa gnyis las 'das te dngos po la bden pa gnyis po yang ma bstan ces bya'o// gnyis sam gcig tu yang ma grub pa ste gnyis med pas mi bral dngos gyi don zhes gsungs so// des na sna
145a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sems kyi cho 'phrul te/ sems lus ma rdzogs chos gzhan med// chos smra sdang ba 'khrul pa'i sems// sems nyid de yang skye med phyir// yong med mthara' las 'das pa'o// bas
145a2(rgyud 'grel): du med de brjod du med// ming med tshig med yi ge med ces gsungs so// le'u gnyis pa ni grangs kyi gnyis pa'o// lag na rdo rje rtsa dI'i rgyud las/ le'u gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o// / de ltar
145a3(rgyud 'grel): le'u gnyis par bdag don dang gzhan don bstan yang / gos sngon po can gyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang / mtha' sbyar ma shes na/ grub par mi 'gyur bas// de'i phyir de la de bstan to// de nas yang 'khor gyi nang nas khro bo
145a4(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba langs nas/ blo gros phrag pa g.yas su sbyar nas 'di skad gsol zhes sgyu ro// yang gsungs pa gang / gzhan yang gsang sngags sbyor ba yis// da ha sreg sogs gsang sngags

145a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan to// da ha zhes pas sngags sngon du bstan to sreg par byed pa rtsa ba'i sngags dang / da ha da ha pa tsa zhes gsungaso// thogs med las rnams 'grub pa ni// lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa la sngags bzlas na/ gang la bya/
145b1(rgyud 'grel): ba 'grub ste/ dper na gnam las lce 'bab pa bzhin no// gnyis kyi 'og ma gsum par brgyan// de la gnyis kyi gong ldan pas// zung rab zung ming dang ldan pa// yang ming skul dang bsam gtan nI// lcags kyu sbyor
145b2(rgyud 'grel): bas rab tu bya// zhes pa la/ gnyis kyi 'og ma ni shes rab kyi yi ge gnyis pa'o// gsum pa thabs kyi yi ge ring po gsum pa'o// rgyan ni drug pa gnyis pa'o// de la gnyis kyi gong ldan pa ni// thabs kyi yi ge zad pa'o// gong
145b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ste ha'o ldan pa ni thabs kyis gsum pa'i mtha' 'o// gr-i h+Na gri hA ste zung rab tu bzung ba'o// yang ming che ge mo zhes bya ba'o// bsam gtan ni lcags kyu thogs pa'i khro bo rnamaso// rang gi lag pas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya
145b4(rgyud 'grel): ca zhes pa'o// sngags ni dngos su bsams te/ lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas// gong gi sngags bzlas pas 'gugs pa thogs pa med pa zhes pa'o// mjug rdzogs gong dang gsum pa'i mtha'// lan gnyis gong bzhin
145b5(rgyud 'grel): brdeg sngags shes// nus pa 'jug rdzogs sha gsum pa thabs kyi yi ge kho na'o// gong ni ha'o gnyis gong bzhin ni ha na ha na zhes brjod pas/ rang dang 'brel pa'i sngags brjod pas ral gri dang mtshon thogs pa'i khro bo
145b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis gnang sar mtshon rgyob cig pa'o// gsum po'i dang po'i gnyis pa dang // gong gi drug pa'i thabs yig ldan// lan gnyis gong bzhin rtogs byeng sngags// zhes pa la/ gsum pa'i dang po ni bag yig tu
146a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa ni tha'o// gong gi drug pa ni po yig ya'o// lan gnyis gong bzhin brdeg sngags shes ni/ tho ba dang / thog dang / rdo rje rnams kyis brdungs rab tu brdungs shig pa'o// gnyis dang lnga
146a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i dang po la drag po'i dga' ba'i sa bon ldan// lan gnyis lan 'gyur las 'grub pa gong ma bzhin du mched byed do zhes pa la/ gnyis pa ni thabs kyi ste/ gtso bo drang po ste gong bzhin du shes par bya'o// lnga pa'i dang
146a3(rgyud 'grel): po'o// drag po dga' ba ni ha'o// lan gnyis nI tsA ha zhes pa spun gnyis so// las grub pa ni gang byas pa ste grub pa'o// chod byed na ni mtshon dang tho bas tshogs shin tu tshogs la bsregs shig po'o// le'u gsum
146a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni grangs kyi gsum pa'o// lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las le'u gsum pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o// / de ltar sngags btub bshad kyang rtsa ba'i sngags dang sham bu ma bstan na gang
146a5(rgyud 'grel): la bya ba mi 'grub pas/ de la de bstan to// de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ de skad gsung so zhes pa la/ 'phags pa lag
146a6(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje ni sbrul sku gzhan las bya ba khyad par 'phags pa ste/ de ni lag na rdo rje ste/ nyon mongs pa dang shes bya dang 'og ma rnams las/ lag ni rdo rje 'phags ces pa'o// sna tshogs sngon po'i sku gsum sna tshogs
146b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ las kun 'grub pa sngags 'di gsungs so// sngags 'di sngon du bas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bsgrub pa'i sngags 'di rgyun du bzlas ces pa'o// rgyun tu rtsa ba'i gsang sngags
146b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas// gradonA dang sdug bsngal thams cad lngas// thar bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// zhes gsungaso// gang zhig 'di 'dzin rnal 'byor de// nyes pa kun las rab tu thar// legs pa'i yon tan thams cad thob ces pa la/
146b3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig 'di 'dzin pa ni sgrub pa po// rigs kyi bu'am bu mo gang la las sngags 'di 'dzin na/ de rnal 'byor to stong pa'i don dang ldan zhes pa'o// nyes pa ni ngan 'gro dang / sdug bsngal gsum mam brgyad dang nad de
146b4(rgyud 'grel): las thar pa'o// legs pa'i ston ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad thob ces pa'o// 'bras bu yang dag mngon par 'grub// sngags 'di gang yin ming yin te// gdul byi'i mtha' dang
146b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa la// tha ma las sngags mtha' dang ldan zhes pa la// 'bras bu yang drag mngon par 'grub pa ni// mchog gi yon tan dang thun mong 'grub ces pa'o// sngags 'di gang yin ming yIn nI// don dam pa'i ming yin
146b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ kun rdzob tu phyag na rdo rje'o// gdul bya'i mtha' ni che ge mo zhes pa dang / phrin las gzhi'i sngags 'brel bas// rtsa sngags bsdongs pa de 'grub zhes pa'i don to// le'u bzhi pa ni grangs kyi bzhi pa'o// lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i
147a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las le'u bzhi pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o// / rtsu ba'i sngags dang sham bu bskrun kyang / klu'i nang dbyung ba'i gnyen po ma bstan du 'grub par mi 'gyur bas/ de las bstan to//
147a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can 'od zer mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad gsungs so zhes bya ba la/ 'phags pa ni gong du bstan pas 'dir mi bshad do// de la
147a3(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas zhus te/ de nas ston pas 'od zer ni 'byung ba lnga'i 'od zer nus pa dang ldan pa de la snyoms par zhugs te/ klu'i nangad 'byung ba'i chos 'di gsungs zhes sbyar bar bya'o// 'byung bzhi
147a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rab bsgoms na// so so las kyi sgom pa ni// me brgyad rlung gnyis ldan par bsam// chu brgyud dngos po de yin te// de bzhi ni sa brgyad hUM 'bras ldan zhes bya ba la// 'byung ba bzhi'i sangs rgyas
147a5(rgyud 'grel): ni chu'i lha rdo rje gos can la sogs pa'o// so so las 'byung ba'i sgra 'thob pa dang // lugs bzhin gso ba'o// sngags kyang raM dang baM dang laM dang yaM zhes rang rang gi gnyen po go nas brgyad du yig 'bru bsgoms te
147a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sngags bzlas ces pa dang 'brel to// 'byung bzhi ni las tha dad snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbang du byas te gnas/ rkang mthil gnyis dbyi mig gnyis lag pa gnyis 'dams dang mgron pa brgyad du/ raM la
147b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i gru gsum dmar ser brgyad bsgoms nas// nang sel ba dang / yaM las rlung brgyad kyis 'thor ba dang / baM las chu brgyad kyis 'khru ba dang / lam brgyad dang sa gzhi ser po brgyad kyis brtan par bya ste/ rin chen 'byung
147b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan brgyad bsams te brtan pa'i don to// de bzhin du 'byung ba gzhan la yang de ster snang zhes gsungs so// lugs gcig la 'byung ba bzhi'i rang bzhin nus pa sgrib pa la bstim pa ston to// 'byung ba so so'i lhas rang
147b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi nus pa bskyed par ston to// de yang yum lcang lo can bdud rtsi bum pa thogs pa yis// 'od 'phros stong gsum ma lus che// phyi nang dgugs dang bstan pa ni// yi ge gsum gyi las su gsungs// de nas

147b5(rgyud 'grel): me'i sngags gsum sras te/ bzlas pas 'grub ste khyad par du mdze nad do// me gnyis po yang zab pa'i phyir bla ma'i man ngag la rag las pas 'dir ma bris so// 'bras bu rigs kyi gnod sbyin gtso// grub pa'i sngu Da
147b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mngon par 'grub ces pa la// 'bras bu rim gyis ni 'byung ba bzhis nang byung nas// thig le baM gyis bkrus te/ yi ge las rang lhag pa'i lha ru bskyed gnas brgyad du rin chen 'byung ldan bsgom zhes

148a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ e dang ni gong du bstan pa de la ngo mtshar ba'i tshig go// sau'i mtha' ni 'byung ba bzhi'i sngag so// me lhas gong ma 'grub ni chu'i lha la sogs pa yang de bzhin du 'grub ces bstan to// rgyun tu rtsu ba'i sngaT
148a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas zhes pa la// rgyun tu de nyid ma grub kyi bar du bzlas pa ste/ lus sngags ni las kyi skabs su'o// le'u lnga pa ni grangs kyi lnga pa'o// lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ le'u lnga pa'i rgya cher
