231a6(rgyud 'grel): le sdigs dang 'od zer chas// 'od zer dkar pos bag chags dang // gdug rtsub mo lus kau bar byed// snying nang brtson 'dra'i bzlas pa'o// 'od zer dkar dmar 'phro 'du yis// nye bsnyen mno dgo rab tu gsungs
231b1(rgyud 'grel): gtso dang 'khor gyi bzlas pa yang // mes su bsreg cing rnam par sbyong // tshogs pa gtso 'khor bzlas pa yang // me gnyis tshogs pas nyon mongs bsreg/ rang nyid ye shes lus su snang // sgrub pani po tshul du bzlas//
231b2(rgyud 'grel): mgul ma 'phreng bas kun la khyab// grangs ni rnal 'byor bye brag gis// sum 'bum drug dang bcu gnyis sogs// mtshan ma mthong ba myur du 'byung // des kyang ma grub pa rnams la// bsnyen sgrub ma ni ngage tshu la du sgrogs/
231b3(rgyud 'grel): des ni mtshan ma mthong ba gsungs// rtogs rnams byung bor me gyur na// sdig sgrib shin tu che bas na// rgyud spyong bzlas pa bar 'dir gsungs// lus ngag yid kyi rnam smin las// sdig 'gyu ra dbyung dang bsreg dang
231b4(rgyud 'grel): bkru/ mi sdug yig 'bru 'od kyi gzugs// hUM dang raM dang haM rnams lnga// ming gi yi ge rab bskul te// mgol me 'phreng ba nyi ma yis// rgyud rnams yongasu sbyang bar gsungs// spogs ti bsnyen sogs gong bzhin
231b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyal// des ni mtshan ma'i rtag phyin 'gyur// the tshom med pa shin tu gces// mtshan ma 'dod pa'i bzlas pa'o// khyad par bzlas pa'i man ngag yang / bar du gcod pa'i 'byung po la// bdag 'od dkyil
231b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lha la 'phros// 'gugs shing dbang du sdud par byed// de la khro bo mang spros te// ral gri mtshon dang thog 'bebs dang // bcing btubs gzir ba'i sha khrag rnams// ma lus sha khrag mdun du stob// ha ha
232a1(rgyud 'grel): ru lu sgra sgrogs shing // bstabs pa'i dus kyi bzlas pa'o// rang srung phyi la bzlog pa dang // khro tshogs 'khor lo thogs pa yis// snying dang klang pA 'khor la bskor// bzlog pa dus kyi bzlas pa'o// rnga rmo
232a2(rgyud 'grel): can gyi khro tshogs kyis// phyi gsu gzung nas 'phen par byung // bskrad nas char gtsang don du gsungs// 'od zer dkar po tshegs byung nus// lha la sogs pa'i sdig pa sbyor// tshur 'dus rlung gi smrig pa sbyong // zhi ba'i
232a3(rgyud 'grel): mAn ngag rab tu gsungs// 'od 'phros gang zhig glang gi stobs// ma lus bsdus nas rang gi stobaso// gzi brjid rang 'byung tshe yig gsos// bkrag dang gzi myangang sna ga tu rgyus// 'di ni rgyas po'i man ngag go/ ming
232a4(rgyud 'grel): gi sngags bzlas ting 'dzin ldan// 'od zer kha dog rnam lnga 'phros// spos sngogs lha mo rnams kyis gang // gang la phul na don grub pa// mchod par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa'o// rin chen tshogs bkang mchod pa
232a5(rgyud 'grel): yang // gong ma bzhin du rab tu gsungs// 'od zer dmar nAg 'phros pa lngas// spyi bo gcugs gnas rnamasu gzer// 'od gzer gzhin gyis gsos 'debs pa// rengs par byed pa'i bzlas pa'o// dmigs pa don
232a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi bzlas pa yang // rtse rlung bde bo byang chub sems// yid la brten pa'i man ngag gam// rang gi hUM lo 'od byung nas// bdag zhu der 'dus pade thob pa// rdo rje tshig gi gsol 'debs shing // dmigs pa stong
232b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid gsal ba ste// gsang ba dus kyi bzlas pa'o// rnam dag don la rab dmyigs shing // mi rtog snga phyi rgyu 'bras su// skyed par byed pa stong nyid gsal// rdo rje tshig dang rab ldan pa// 'di ni don dam bla med sngags//
232b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags brjod pa mA lus pa/ 'di rU nung zhig bstan par bya// oM na mo nI lAM ba r+yA d+hA rA ya/ bid+b+ha pa Ni hU~M phaT+Ta/ oM na mo badz+ra pA Ni mAt+mA yak+Sh+ma se nA pa ta ye badz+ra kro d+ha/ nI lAM ba ra d+hA ra hUM hUM phaT/ oM na
232b3(rgyud 'grel): mo badz+ra kr-i d+he shwa ri mu hUM hUM phaT/ oM rata two sha ya de baM rA dza mr-i khaM ku ru hUM phaT/ oM sarba de ba ma ra yA/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+d+ra hUM phaT/ b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ ha na hA nu hUM phAT/ ta thA ya ta thA a
232b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ dz+wa la dz+wa lA hUM biT+Te/ su ru su ru hUM phaT/ mu ru mu ru hUM phaT/ nAM sha ye nA sha yA hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa yau g+h+r-its+tsha pa ya hU~M phaT/ he sa ne yA hai se na yau hUM phaT/ krI li ki li a mu kAM mA ra ya hUM
232b5(rgyud 'grel): DA/ de ba rA dza ba 'i ba li/ grih+Na gr-iny+tsau/ khaM kha/ khA hai khI hau/ a kA ro mu khaM s+yAr+b+he d+hArmA NAM A d+yA nut+pan+mA tA tA mau.AHd+h+waM pUT sAr+N+Na/ oM sh+tsAn+taM ku r+yA swA tA/ buSh+Ti ku ru sAt+mA/ ba shAM ku ru maNA
232b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ nAr ye mA ra ya/ Sh+T+r-imai Sh+Ta ya/ ra bar dzi/ reg pa tshe rba/ ts+tsha Ti/ ma 'i dz+nyAn sa 'i ma ka
233a1(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM/ oM shud+d+he shud+d+ha dz+ra sho d+ha na ba sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la sarba pA paM da ha ni dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ha pa oM sa khri/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sarba truM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA
233a2(rgyud 'grel): sha ya hUM phaT/ nA ga bi tan nA ga/ rak+ShaM rak+Sha yak+Sha/ karma go ru pA ra bi tan/ zhes pa'i tshig gis bsnyen pa lasa? sbyor sham+bu sngags/ gcig pu tu byas la yongasu bzlas// rgyu dang 'bras bu yongs bskyed la/
233a3(rgyud 'grel): bsang sngags skyon rnams rab spangs nas// 'das ni 'bras bu 'byin pa las// las rnams gzhan gyis thob pa mino// zhes pe ni/ sngags kyi man ngag gi le'u gnyis pa'o//
233a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams khyad par 'dod pa yis// tshogs bstsags nges pa 'di ru bstan// 'jig rten rdzas rnams ma lus pa'i// kun tshogs rang gis ma nyams byasham// rnal 'byor lha grangs bsnyam pa 'am// yang
233a5(rgyud 'grel): nun rnal 'byor ma dr-i yang rung // mtshams pa da ni mchod pa drang // de gnyis meng du mi rung ngo // rgyas pa'i tshogs 'khor dus su'o// sngon 'gro sa cho ga la sogs rdzogs// maN+Dal lnga 'am bcu sogs la//
233a6(rgyud 'grel): me tog dang ni mchod pa dag ma// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'am// slob dpon rgyal pos sems dpa' bskul// phyi rol rnal 'byor nang du bsdu// de tshe rgyal pos mtshams rnams bcad// dge slong nub
233b1(rgyud 'grel): ladage tshul byang // sngags pa lho la yon bdag dang // trAs rnams shar du bsags par bya// phyogs kyi dngos grub thob par gsungs// rang rang nang du maN+Dal bya// rgyal pos mtshams byas tshogs rnams bsag/
233b2(rgyud 'grel): bsnyed de med pa las byung ba'i// rgyal pos bzhin ni thob bya ste// bde ba laM gnas nyid dog l-I// lha mo bzhis gsol skur ldang ste// dkyil 'khor rgyas nas rgyal po len// so sau gdan dang gsal ba las//
233b3(rgyud 'grel): bad gI 'jug pa ji bzhin du// 'khor rnams dam pa don lo 'jug/ mchod pa sgom dang sngon du rdzogs// las dang bdag bI ra 'brel pa yis// sgra dang ldan pas tshogs can drang // dam tshig ldan pa'i byin gyis brlab
233b4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi gsang ba'i cho ga yang // yaM raM a las rlung me thong // nang du dam rdzas bcu ru dmigs// yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs// yang ni ye shes bdud rtsi phab// bla ma rang dang lha mchod la// cho ga yan
233b5(rgyud 'grel): lug rdzogs pa dang // lhag ma gcig tu bsdu bya ste// kha chus dran la mkha' 'gro bskang // gsang ba'i don dang 'brel pa'i tshogs// tshes grangs bzang po shis pa la// nam phyed dusu bya bar gsungs// grogs
233b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs la nges pa med// zhi rgyas tshogs la sogs pa yang // sngags kyi man ngag bzhin du gsungs// 'di la rtag tu gnas pa yang // bar chad sel cing dngos grub myur// 'di yis 'byung gi gzhan gyis
234a1(rgyud 'grel): mina?/ rgyal po la sogs pas tshogs bsags pa'i man ngag go// / de ma nus pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'byor pa chung zhing bsam gtan ldan// tshogs kyi mchod pa bstan pa/
234a2(rgyud 'grel): Ang / rdzas ni lnga 'am bcu yi bAr// slob dpon gcig dang gnyis dang gsum// skyed de khyab byed bu mo yang // rim gyis 'di ru bya ba yin// drang dang byin gyis brlabs byas nas// dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i bar du mchod
234a3(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa'i byar yang gsungs pa yin// slob dpon nus pa bye brag gis// las ni gong dang 'og tu sbyar// mi rtsom 'di yis sdig po spyong // 'dis kyang los kun 'grub por gsungs// 'bras bu gang 'dod nges par 'byin//
234a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi man ngag bstan pa ste/ le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas rigs kyi bu 'amo bu mo bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu myur du smin par 'dod// sbyin sreg las la brtson par bya'o// sa cho ga lnga sogs gzhon
234a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te// sa yi rigs bzhin thab khung bris// zlum po gyu ba ni zla gam e// thab khung dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid ngo // dkar ser dau mAr dang nag pa yang // thob kyi kha dog nyid du gsungs// bru gang bri ba gang yin pa// sor gsuM
234a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi gnyis gsum yang dor// 'khor lo rin tshan pad+ma bri// thab la mtshan par rab tu bya// de yang rgyud las/ zhi la dkar po shing rnams rnam te// rgyas la ser shing las rnams bya// dbang la la seng ldang shing
234b1(rgyud 'grel): bsregs te// drag po cher mA nag+na po shing // gzhan ni tsan dan shing gis bya// zhes gsungs pas/ rang rang gi thag tu rang dang bsdebs pa'i shing // zlum po la sogs gcer bar gsungaso// las mang po'i thabs ni rin po che
234b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba 'am/ b+ha ga lta bu'i dbyibs la kha dog sna tshogs par bya bar gsungs so// shing yang de nyid ngo // gzar bu rdo rje bzhi yi dbyibs// rdo rje rin chen chu srin gyi// rin chen las byas gzar bu rgyun// byin rlabs so/
234b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs dang ldan// mchod rdzasau g.yas la smig rjes g.yon// mi tAM las rin chen stong// so so de nyid rgyas pa lngas// ha ho hri yis bdud rtsi sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlab// rang rdzogs rang gi sa bon las// 'od
234b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phros mi dmigs b+h+yAM du gyur// de las me yIs khang pa ni// rang gi gong ma dbyibs dang ldan// me lha bskyed pa'i rim pa yang // b+h+rUM las gro bzhi'i ngo gnyis gsum// so so kha dog dbyibs dang ldan// me ku raM las ye
234b5(rgyud 'grel): shes me// pad steng raM bcas yi ge bzhi// so so me lha kha dog bzhi// so so rigs kyi dbu rgyan byas// zhi ba'i me lha bab pa kaM/ sku mdog dkar po chu la gnas// gro d+ha mi tra ma ho tra// ma ta zhes pa la sogs pa//
234b6(rgyud 'grel): so so rigs kyi kha dog la// sna tshogs pa ru yang dag gnas// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa la// g.yas kyi dang po 'dzin pa ni// dbyug pa de bgrang phreng ral gri dang // lcags kyu nges par bsnams pa'o// gzhan yang phyag
235a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan sngo sor 'dzin// ye shes spyan drangs dbang bskur zhing // rgyan dang rgyas gdab 'thor 'thung rdzogs// snying gar phyogs skyong bcu po rdzogs// so so pu dzA rgyas pa la// dang po mchod pas mchod bya ste// gtso
235a2(rgyud 'grel): bo dang po man ngag kyang // shing gi 'od ni skyeng byed po// mer gyi 'od 'phros kun la khyab// dkar gsum sbyi i sdig pA sal// bu ram lus lo gnyis po yis// 'og ma gnyis po so sor 'byin// 'bras dang 'bru yi tshan dag
235a3(rgyud 'grel): gis// gong ma gnyis po so sor 'byin// nas thub 'o ma'i thug pa yis// rnam smin re re gan su bsreg/ til gyis snying gi nad rnams 'byin// yang na til gyis sgro dgu 'byin// tha ma mor gyis bkru bar byed// rdzas de
235a4(rgyud 'grel): ser por byas pa la// dmar ser zho yos kun la khyab// dkar gnyis kyis ni gzi byin bskyed// mngar gsum phul bas gsal bar snang // 'bru dang 'bras kyi sbyor ba yis// oM shes bcud rnams spyi bor sdud // nas dang
235a5(rgyud 'grel): bo ma'i sbyor ba yis// 'jig rten bcud rnams kun tu sdud // tha ma dur ba'i bsang gau tor gyis// d+hA ru btso zhing dngos grub len// mar gyi dgang blugs gsum po yis// rgyas par byed pa man ngag so ga swa// dbang
235a6(rgyud 'grel): gi sbyor po byed pa la// ba lang sha dang til la sogs// da mar po sbyor ba phul ba yis// steng gi 'khor lo rab tu 'phro// myur du 'gugs shing dbang du sdud// bsad pa las gzhan tha mau yang // dang po khrag gis 'od
235b1(rgyud 'grel): du 'phro// de bzhin sha yis khro bar byed// rus pas steng gi 'khor lo 'phro// bdud rtsi 'od 'phros sprul pa 'gyed// 'bru nag sprul pas drag tu bsreg/ dug rnams rdzas kyis 'gugs shing bsreg/ yungs kar phye ma gsum po yis//
235b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po ma lus thun gyis ba sreg/ tha mA mar nag srung zhing bsreg/ me yi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // snying glar bkod pa lho rnams la// so so de nyid rgyasgra las// gong du mchod pa bdun 'gyur rdzogs// bsdu dang gshegs
235b3(rgyud 'grel): su gsol byas nas// bzod gsol me yi sbyor ba yang // gcig tu bsdus te dbul bar bya// bstod cing phrin las dngos grub blang // nyis skor sum skor la sogs pa// gong gi man ngag don dang ldan// tshe dang rigs
235b4(rgyud 'grel): sel rgyas pa'o// bsrung ba zhi ba cha la gang gas// dgug pa dbang gi cha yin te// drag po las gzhan tha ma cha// dngos grub bas dang 'brel pa yis// 'di yis 'grub pa ma gtogs pa// gang zhig gzhan gyis
235b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub ma yin// des na man drug nan tan gces// sbyin sreg bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / las rnams ma lus 'jug pa la// kun gyi kha skong gtor ma shis// gtor ma las rab
235b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi mchog/ las kun la ni yongasu bsngags// ces gsungs pas// gtor ma yongs su bstan to// phyi nang rdzas rnams ma lus kun// ma nyams rdzas kyis yongasu gang // lhag 'gyur 'od zer kun tu 'phros// raM
236a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsregs te yaM gis brus// khaM gis bkrus te dag pa lngas// yaM raM tsan dang nyi zla bcas// sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje bcas// yaM raM dbab pa sbyor ba yis// ye shes bdud rtsi gnyis med 'dres//
236a2(rgyud 'grel): de dang gsang sngags 'dis kyang dgug/ oM a ra l-I ho dzaHhUM baM ho/ sa ma ya dr-i sh+ya ho/ zhes pas gnyis med bsre// yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs// gling na gsum dang ldan ye shes tshogs// gnyis da
236a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi bar du mchod// rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags la ni// kha kha khA hi khA hi dbul// grangs ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya 'am stong gi sbyor bas 'grub// bshags shing bstod pa dngos grub blang // smon lam btab la
236a4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dgye// lan chags chu bo gzhung la'am// yang nA ri rab rtse la bskyal// phrin las rnam bzhi gtor ma yang // rang rang cho ga byas pasa'i grub// rdzas ma tshogs dang bsam gtan bral// sngon bya med cing rgo
236a5(rgyud 'grel): rim bral// 'di ni bar chad sbyor ba ste// mkhas pa rnams kyi spang bar bya// phyi yi gtor ma rgya chen yang // sha chang spangs pa rdzas rnams tshogs// byin gyis brlabs shing spyan drangs la// so so rang gi khyad par
236a6(rgyud 'grel): yang / sngags dang tshigs bcad yongasu bsgrags// za ba rgyun gyi gtor ma yang // chags pa nyams pa tshig dang bral// mchod cing srid mtsho yongs bsgral ba// sems kyis yongasu zin pa dang // rang gsal snying
236b1(rgyud 'grel): ga'i lha rnams bkod// ye shes 'khor lo gnyis med bstim// zas ni sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga// oM raM sbyor bas byin gyis brlab// yang na sku gsung thugs kyis so// byin gyis brlabs la dbul bar bya// lce ni rdo rjer bsams la
236b2(rgyud 'grel): dbul// lag pa lha dang lha mo 'am// gzar bu rdo rjer bsams la dbul// zos pas mnyes shing sdig pa zhi// rgyas dang phrin las la sogs kun// gong du bstan pa bzhin du bya// btung ba la sogs gzhan pa yang //
236b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi byin brlabs gong bzhin mchod // chang sogs longs spyod byed pa yang // nad sel btung ba bya ba yin// tsau ran sman gyi tshod tsam mo// bdud rtser byin brlabs mo 'thungs na// chags shing skom sogs
236b4(rgyud 'grel): 'thung byed pa// skye ba lnga brgyar smyon par skye// nad sel yongasu spa bar bya// dug lnga'i grogs su 'gro ba ni// 'thung zhing spyad par bya ba min// grol bas mchod pa'i dus su yang // sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub
236b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan// thig gsum lce l-I ba zhag pa yang // kA ya bAk+ta tsit+ta hUM/ wa~Msa? bats+tshed lce reg par bya'o// zas sogs bdud rtsi thams cad kyang // lag pa rdo rje dbul pa dang // yang na lha mo sa? dbul ba'o// rdo rje lci
236b6(rgyud 'grel): 'thung las byed pa// nang gi gtor ma bstan pa yin// 'di ni rnal 'phyir mchog yin no// sna tsho las stong pa ye shes dang // dran med mtha' spangs spros dral ba// bla med gtor ma zhes ni gsungs// gang zhig
237a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i sbyor ba la// mi brten dngos grub sbyor ba spangs// zhes gsungs so// gtor ma'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / bsam gtan ngag la ma mos shing // mchod pa dag la mos ma gyur pa/
237a2(rgyud 'grel): de i gang zag gzung bar bya// dngos sam yid kyi mchod pa las// dang po dngos po mchod pa bstan// spos dang me tog mar me dri// bshos gtsang la sogs sbyor ba yang // thams cad ma spyad snod du blug/ las kyi chu
237a3(rgyud 'grel): yis sbyang byas nas// bsongs te skyon rnams bsal ba lnga// snod rnams trAM las rin chen snod // yon chab zhu ste yi ge A// de las yon chab dpag med gyur// a yis rtog sbyangs oM gyis 'bi ra// mchod pa
237a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yong de bzhin du// byin gyis brlabs par bya ba yin// dri ma nus pa'i gang zag gis// gsang sngags 'bru gsum byin gyis brlab// 'di ni spyi rgyud man dag go// yang na rgyang 'di mun ngag yang // yon chab la so//
237a5(rgyud 'grel): man ngag yang // trA ho hU~M yoMs sbyang byas te// on+do chob zhu bas yi gre A// de nas stong gsum yon chub bsdus// sla ro lnga lho mo me tog ma// de mo 'od las me tog tshogs// bsnyen pa'i skabasu kha dog lnga// ldan par
237a6(rgyud 'grel): byas te mchod pa'o// mchod pa gzhon yang de bzhin bya// yang na ming gi dang po la// hUM zhes pa yis byin gyi sa brlab// byin gyis brlabs la mchod pa yang // seng ge glang po pad sogs la// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas spyan
237b1(rgyud 'grel): drangs te// mdun du gsal bar bsam byas la// rin chen me tog mdun du gtor// rin chen la sogs gdan gyis mchod pa'i rim pa'o// / yon chab thogs pa lha mo'i tshogs// dpag tu med pa mdun du sprul
237b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje klu dang ldan pa yis// dang po lha mo sprul byas te// gnyis pa na mkha' bzhugs pa gsal// gsum pa na mkha' rdo rje tshig/ bzhi pa so so gnasu dbul// A hA ra yi sngags bzlas pas// yon chab gyis ni phyag zho
237b3(rgyud 'grel): bkru/ spos me shangs la me tog dbul// de la sogs pa mchod pa rnams// ming dang rang gi sngags rjes la// so so gan su dbul bar bya// zhes gsungs so// gzhan yang 'dod yon lha mo ni// sku gsung thugs
237b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sngags rjes la// te sha ra tI sngags bzlas pra// dkar mo gzugs ni spyan la thim// pad+ma ra ti sngags la sa byung // dmar mo sgra ni snyan la thim// karma ra ti sngags las byung // ljang khu dri ni shangs la thim// rat+na ra ti
237b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags las byung // ser mo ro ni ljags la thim// badz+ra rA ti sngags las byung // mthing kha rig bya lus la thim// shin tu bgyid bcas kyis mchod ngo // badz+ra kro d+hI shwa ri badz+rod// sngags las mthing gru byang chub
237b6(rgyud 'grel): sems// bi shwa kro d+hI shwa ri yis// sngags las dkar mo dri chen ni// rat+na kre d+hI sngags las ni// saur mo sha chen zhesu gsungs// pad+ma kro d+h+r-i sngags las ni// dmar mo khrag gi thod pa ste// karma kro d+hI shA ri'o// s+pha Da las
238a1(rgyud 'grel): ljang khu dri chu'o// lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang // thal ba'i mtshan mas lus byugs shing // dar dang zhing chen dril bu thogs// g.yas pa thod ba'i snod nang du// bdud rtsi so sor bkang nas su// rdo rje
238a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig gis ljags la dbul// gsang ba'i pU dza bstan pa yang // badz+ra k+Sho d+hI gu h+ya yis// mthing ka byang chub sems yang gsal// dkar dmar ser dang ljang khu yis// gnas lho phyi dang gnas lnga yi// nang du yang dag
238a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yin// gnas gcig byang sems gsal zhing rgyaste// 'dr-I nI rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i dpa' bo mnyes pa yin// sgeg dang khro bo la sogs pa// rin chen sna bduni dag dang yang // man
238a4(rgyud 'grel): pa nyi shu dbul bar bya// bAngag dang lha mo gang gis dbul// yi ge oM gyis mgo brgyan cing // rdo rje glu yis brten byas te// lha mo bskyed byas bskyed par byed// rang gri gtso 'am gang byed phyi'i// ming gI sngags
238a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis me go drangs te// rdo rje lha mo sngags rjes la// pU dza mU g+hA sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sA mA ye hUM/ zhes pa sa dbul bar bya'o// yang na badz+ro oM gnyis la// pU dza yang ni gnyis dang ldan// s+yo s+yo ming gi ring po
238a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ 'jug tu hUM zhes bya ba yin// tshogs rnams bsags pa'i man ngag la// las kyi sems dang 'khor gyi sku// mchod pa'i lha dang yum gyis su// bdag nyid mnyes par byas pa yin// gtso bo gzhan mchod
238b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes pa yang // dkyil 'khor gnyis dang gsum mnyes pa'o// rdzas dang bsam gtan phyag rgya sngags// rdo rje klu dang gnyis 'dus dang // gsum 'dus la sogs mchod pa bya// dadro dang yid ni ra re 'am// gnyis kas
238b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya ba'o// srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba dang // thun mong dngos grub ma lus po// mchod pa byas pas 'byung bar 'gyur// des na brtson 'grus bzang po yis// mchod pa rgyun tu gsal ba gsungs//
238b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang gsang sngags lam sgrub pa// rnal 'byor bla med sbyor ba yi sa// gsang sngags 'bras bu bsgrub par bya// bar ched bgegs sel dngos grub myur// rtsod ldan dbul bar 'phongs dus su ni// des na 'byung/
238b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sku gdung bstan// don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mdzes pa maN+Dal rin chen rgyun// de la bsgrub par 'dod pa yis// rIn chen lngas mtshan sa ba rkos te// bdag las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis// sa skyon dag pa
238b5(rgyud 'grel): brko bar bya// rin chen sna lnga rang bzhin te// slob chags med pa s+ya dang chu// gnyis med bsres pa 'o da du zhu// 'khor lo pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan// yi ge gsum las legs grub pa'i// sku gsung lha ru gsol ba la
238b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes spyan drangs mchod nas bstim// gnyis med gyur la mchod phu la te// 'od dang sngags kyis bskul gyur te// 'od zhu byang chub theg le 'am// yang 'od kyi gong bur 'gyur// byang chub mtshon gyi snum
239a1(rgyud 'grel): yang bsku// skrod du byin gyis brlab pa yang // 'od zhu me las na mkhar ste// bcad pa skong bu phra mo nyid// rlung gis na mkha' stong pa thim// brdabs shing gnyis med sngags sgra sbyor// phyung bas bde gshen
239a2(rgyud 'grel): rIng srel ni// rin chen bzhi las le gas phyung ba// pags rim bzhi gnyis zur bzhi pa// dbu gsum lnga dang dgu sogs te/ 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa la// bzhug pas gdan stengs don byed 'gyur// stong las skyong bu yum
239a3(rgyud 'grel): yin te// thig le lag pa yab du gyur// rlung gi stobs gyis b+ha gar zhugs// gnyis med dpal ldan sku mchog yin// bzhugs pas gdan stengs don byed 'gyur// yang na na mkho' stong pa las// brdabs dang sdigs
239a4(rgyud 'grel): sgras lha mo bskul// na mkha'i dbyings nas sku byung bzhugs// de dag gis ni sngags gsungs pa// oM nA mo s+t+waM yad d+hi sarba ta thAM ga ta hri da ya/ gar+b+he dz+wa la hr-i da ya/ d+harma d+hA gar+b+he saM ha ra/ A yu bu saM sho d+ha ya/ uSh+NI 2
239a5(rgyud 'grel): bi ma le/ bi shud+d+hi swA hA/ lha i sku ru smra ba pa la// gsang sngags oM na mo nI lam ba ra/ zhes pa dang spel bar bya'o// rab tu gnas pa bsdus pa yeng // ye shes spyan drangs ba mchod bstod nas// rang rang 'aM ngo
239a6(rgyud 'grel): bor gnas pa las// gnyis medo bsti la dbang bskur la// mchod bstod ma yus rdzogs par bya// phyag 'tshal yid kyis mchod byas la// rkang pa brgyad mar long btags la// ma grin pa'i sil snyan bskul nas
239b1(rgyud 'grel): ni// 'od las rin chen pad+ma gdan// sdig slong don bya bsam pa bskad // skor ba bya zhing smon la ma gdab// khyad par ting 'dzin spro 'dod na// sdig pa 'byung dang sreg pa yi// dzA la raM dang g+hi ha dza/ shud d+ho haM gi shaM shu
239b2(rgyud 'grel): 'am// phrin las bzhi yi sngags dang 'di// rang rang rigs kyi yongasu bstan// 'byung ba mchod rten dag la mI brten pa// dngos grub sbyor ba kun spangs sdug bsngal dag dang phrad// sngon gyi bram ze blo glos mchog
239b3(rgyud 'grel): che 'di nad med dngos grub kun dang ldan// shi dus dal 'byor lung bstan la// brten nas bla meng thob kun gyis// lung bstani yin par bla ma gsung// mching rten phra rab rdul du ma glag par// mi de ngan song
239b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum du nam yang 'gro maM yin// mtshams ming lnga byos 'bum tshe gcig gis byas// gong ma'i yon tan de bzhin 'phel bar gsungs// bar chod kun sel 'di la brtson par bya'o// mchod pa dang tshogs
239b5(rgyud 'grel): bsag pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de ltar tshogs rnams gsog pa la// bdud 'byung man ngag bstan par bya'o// bdud ni rnam pa lnga gnyis yin te// las kyi bag chags smin pa dang
239b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur pa'o// de la yang ni phyi dang nang // phyi ni dang ldan gang zag la// pha ma mkhan po gnyen bshes tshogs// zhi bos log po'i lam la 'jung // tshogs drug ro la chags 'gyur zhing //
240a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ni dkar dmar la sogs bya// gsal 'gyur mi gnas bdud kyi rtags// snyan dang mi snyan ting 'dzin nyams// bdud kyi rtagasu bstan pa yin// ting nge 'dzin lnga bzhag pa'i rgyu//
240a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med dris smad pa dang // sang ba'i rigs la nyung ba ston// che ba'i rigs la chung ba ston// de la bzlog par shes pa dang // dkar mo rigs la gzhan sogs ston// zab pa'i rigs la mi zab ston// mi
240a3(rgyud 'grel): zab pa la zab pa ston// grol ba'i rigs la chags lam dang // chags pa lnga yang bzlog pa ston// mtshan bcad la yang mtshan me rdzogs// dngosu sangs rgyus sprul pa rnams// gser dang g.yu yi sgras pa
240a4(rgyud 'grel): la// zegs par lam rnams rnon no dang // bstan bcos mtha' dag rtsom zer dang // sems can byang chub lam la yang // dgod cing ma lus don rnams kyis// rdo la sogs pa'i gdam ngag stor// 'di ni
240a5(rgyud 'grel): phyi yi bdud du gsungs// nang gi bdud kyi sbyor ba yang // bsam gtan ting 'dzin dus la sogs// 'du ba bskyed dang bsam pa bsgyur// rlung mkhris pang kun 'dus pa rnams// meng bzhin bskyed dang bsam
240a6(rgyud 'grel): log dang // dam po dag la ma mos shing // rtag tu bsam la ma mos shing // tha mal pa la chags pa dang // khro dang kho na 'dzib na 'chab ba dang // phra dog ser sna la sogs pa// nyon mongs nye ba nyon mongs
240b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// bsam gtAn dang la skye 'gyur dang // log pa'i shes pa bsam dgu rgyu// shin tu gdug rtsub drag po skye// sngon gyi 'bras bu rkyen bslang zhing // rtag tu mrig rtsa rgong pa dang // de bzhin 'phyar dang ga yaM
240b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // zhum pa dang ni g.yem pa dang // 'jig rten log chos bla ma slong // 'di yi nga bdud kyis bslus pa yin// bsam gtan 'phro la mi gsal zhing // nyams mi dga' zhing log la dang // za sau dang dang skom
240b3(rgyud 'grel): la snga rol bas// tshags par gyur pa de dag dang // kun rdzob spyod la dga' ba dang / phyag rgya re nga gi rigs la brten// de la nyon mongs skye ba dang // chags shing nus pa phrogs pa dang // tshogs drug skye/
240b4(rgyud 'grel): mched de rnamasu sbyar// log pa'i bla ma bsten pa dang // yang dog bla ma dor ba dang // sdig pa'i grogs po bstan pa dang // bsam gtan mi mos log chos mos// 'jig rten rdzus sogs chos rnams/
240b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshong // 'di yod bdud kyi rtagasu gsung // sngar gyis chos 'dor gzhan dag 'dod// thar pa bde 'dod tshul yang 'chos// khA sgra dbugs rgod mig ca drung // thar pa yin zhes sna tshogs smra// 'di yang bdud
240b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rtag su gsung // bdud kyi brtag pa mi shes ni// 'bras bu med de bsdud kyis bslu// de la sogs pa sbyor ba rnams// bsam mi khyab ste gzhan las shes// 'di ru brtag pa mdo tsam byas// mkhas pa
241a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis sngon du dpyod// ces gsungaso// bdud brtag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // yang dag rtags kyi man+ta ngag kyang // dngos dang nyams dang rmi lAm gsum// sngags grub
241a2(rgyud 'grel): gdon thub nad thon rtags// gsum dang drug tu bstan pa yin// yang dag don gyi blo maM la// sems bskyed dbang bskur yang yang brtson// dam tshig mi brjid nan tan byed// rang rlung rigs kyi chos rnams
241a3(rgyud 'grel): brten// khyad par sbyin pa tshogs gsog cing // dge ba'i grogs rnams bstan par byed// srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba'i phyir// rgyu bcas dge la shin tu mos// gzhan l-i bskul zhing nyams sogs ldan//
241a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di yang dngos kyi rtogs yin no// me tog sngon po 'thu pa dang // glegs bam dag la spyod pa dang // chos kyi bgro ba byed po dang // gzhan gyis mchod dang gzhan la mcho // stong gsum thams cad
241a5(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba dang // nyi zla'i stang na 'dug pa dang // thod du bcings shing shar dang phrad// 'khor lo glang la bskor ba drang // mchod rten rtse la 'dzeg pa dang // rags shing bskrag pa'i rgyan rnams thogs// gos
241a6(rgyud 'grel): sngon lus la gyon pa dang // gos sngon sku gzugs mthong ba dang // bder gshegs khang par phyin pa dang // yid bde ting 'dzin gsal ba dang // mi gtsang ma yis bsreg pa dang // khrag sogs lus
241b1(rgyud 'grel): la thon pa dang // nang khrol bton cing mu gtsang shol// lus skrangs rnam sogs mang po 'byung // ngan skyugs byung zhing bdud rtsi chu// 'o ma dang 'dres 'khrus pa dang // sha mdog sngo 'gyur bdud rtsi spyod// lus la mi gtsang gzun
241b2(rgyud 'grel): byung na// me dang bsreg cing dri ma 'khru// rtag tu gtsar bur 'dug pa dang // rang la mtshon rgyab so ral gris 'thub// stong nyid stong pa mthong ba da // bsams pas rmi lame ci yang mid// mthong lam skyes shing lus
241b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bral// dngos kyi nyams la brten pa yang // dbang dang srung ba byed pa dang // sems can dman la tshad med 'byung // yang dag don la brod pa skyes// sems can bdag dang 'dra bar sems// 'khor bas skyo la rgyab kyis
241b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs// sngon pas nga rgyal nyon mongs chung // zab pa'i don la mchog mi shes// dngos po rdzas la chags pa med// mig yang yun rings mi 'dzum zhing // 'jig rten gleng mo 'chol ba smra// mngon shes phra mo
241b5(rgyud 'grel): ston nus shing // sems can sdug bsngal sel bar nus// gser sogs che rin chen 'dod mi skye// rkang lag bcad kyang yid mi 'khrug/ rtag tu sbyin pa gtong bar byed// ldang ba yang zhing zo mdog bang // 'byung
241b6(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhi yis dgras mi tshugs// byang chub sems dpa'i skye bdu no// gsang la dad cing yid ches so// rang gi lhag pa'i bla ma la// ci yong rin chen tshogs bkong dbul// bla ma rigs dang mthun pa yis//
242a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong na dga' zhing man ngag la// the tshom med cing yid ches 'byung // de yang lam zin gang zag go// gzhan yang grub pa'i brtag bstan pa// dang po bder gshegs sku gzugs la// bder gshe
242a2(rgyud 'grel): sku gzugs mthong ba dang // 'gul dang bzhad dang sgra 'byung dang // 'od dang du ba 'byung ba yang // 'di yang yang dag rtags rnamaso// yon cha ba la sogs mchod pa la// rang gis byin brlabs 'bras bu 'byin// snang dang 'od dang
242a3(rgyud 'grel): sgra 'byung ba// 'di yang yang dag rtags rnamaso// sbyin sreg dngos grub tshol ba na// me bus sangs rgyas rab yAn te// de las sgra byung 'bring du bshad// me ni bdag gi dbang 'gyur zhing // las dang mthun pa 'byung ba'o// /
242a4(rgyud 'grel): gto ra ma'i sbyor ba la brten pa// khol dang 'od sgra bskumos pa dang // gang dmigs la byin de dbang 'byung // rab 'bring tha ma go rim bzhin// dung dang dril bu la sogs pa// ma bsgrags sgra rnams 'byung ba dang // 'jug
242a5(rgyud 'grel): pa nang rtags ye shes kyi// thams cad shes shing smra ba dang // 'gul dang shes pa bteg pa dang // rab 'bring tha ma go rim bzhin// gzhan yang dkar dmar 'od gyur pa// gsal ba sgyu mar bsgom pa dang // mi
242a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal bshags pas gsal 'gyur ba// 'di yang rab kyi rtag su gsungs// sku gsung thugs kyi rtags rnams la// rab 'bring gong gi stobasu gsungs// mdzes pa lha mo bde ster dang // gang zhig na mkha' stong
242b1(rgyud 'grel): las bsgral// sdig spong dge la 'dzud pa dang // bstan pA dam+ma ston 'gyur nA// yang dag rtag su 'di yang gsungs// nam mkha' lha mos dbang bskur dang // byang chub sems kyi chu 'bab dang // mchod pa sna tshogs ster ba
242b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // gzhan yang rtags kyi sbyor ba ni// 'ja' tshon dang ni sprin sngon dang // nyi zlas stong khams gang ba dang // de gse ba nAn 'dug pa dang // sbrul tshad rus zhing me tsho rnams bskams// tsan dan tshal dang nor bu tshal//
242b3(rgyud 'grel): sman gyi sdong po gur gum spang ri dang // sman gyi ljon shing sdug bsngal sel byed cing // 'dir ni rtag tu rang 'dug zhi khang chen po dang // mchod rten sku gzugs dag dang ni// bum pa sngon po rdo rje dang // rtag
242b4(rgyud 'grel): tu thod rlon nyams sogs mdun du 'byung // 'di yang dam pa'i rtag yin no// khrag dang mchi ma dngosu 'byung // yi dwags dbang du sdud nus dang // yi dwags zil gyis mnan pa'i tshe// mnan 'gyur skad ngan
242b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra 'don// 'o 'dod bus 'dabs byed pa rnams// 'di yang gsadra sngags grub pa'i rtags// gzhan yang bsam gtan byed dus su// dam chos dngosu brdar ma btags// phyis ni rje su dran shing shes// ma thos
242b6(rgyud 'grel): nges pa sbyin pa dang // sems can spyod dman gang 'khyams pa// snying rjes zin cing de don byed// tshul khrims ldan zhing gsang sngags mos// theg pa thun mong gcig tu shes// nang du mu stegs chos rnams la//
243a1(rgyud 'grel): ma grwa she rang rgyud zhi zhing des// sgyu mu rang bzhin med par shes// 'di yang yang dag dam pa'i rtags// de la sogs pa dpag tu med// 'byung bar 'gyur te gzhan las shes// de rnams gong du bstan
243a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bskyed par byed// srid mtsho rgol byed srid pa'o// rtog pas bskyed pa srid pa 'khor// zang por byed pa'i las rnams ni// mi rtag 'chi ba la sogs pa// srid pas 'jigs shing mi rtag pa// yud tsam las grub lo dang
243a3(rgyud 'grel): zla// rtago par sems pa byis sems yin// thang cig yud tsam mi sdod pas// gsang ba'i bde ba myur bar bya// dam tshig sdom pa sa gzhes yis// nan tan bskyed la bsrung zhing btsa'// de 'du bde ba spyod pa yang // dal 'byor
243a4(rgyud 'grel): mr-i yis spyad pa ste// bsod nams las byung mI lus 'ang // sa phug rim+bu pa gsum pA ru// chu thig so 'byung bar shin tu dkon// dkon pa'i dus 'di thob pa la// mi rnams rgya mtsho'i gling du phyin// nor bu rin tshon
243a5(rgyud 'grel): mi len par// byA bA la srogs g.yengs pa ni// skyes bu glen pa bdud kyis bslus// mi lus+t+ra thaM pA dka' rin chen 'di// thobA nas yal bar 'dor ba yAng // skyes bu mi mkhas 'kho bi'i rgyu// des na rgyal dka'
243a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i rgyu// 'di 'dra'i sdug snga la zad mi shes// snga phyi dus su byung ba yis// rang nyes khril zhing zhes pa brjod// tshe 'di'i bde ba thob dus su// thang cig yu da tsam mi sdod par// sring ma'i tshe 'khor bI nang du
243b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyug/ mi sdod rgyug pa'i bar 'di ru// rang gsos drag po sna don bskyed de// dbang po ma nyams lus 'dis yis// bsam gtan sngags bzlas brtson pa dang // rang gzhan 'phags dang bla ma dang // shin tu bla ma dam pa rnams//
243b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing gso la 'debs dge ba la// tshul khrims dam tshig ma nyams par// bla ma dkon mchog mi mos spang // tshogs dang gtor ma ci nus bya// gal te dge 'dun 'dun pa dang // dbul ba'i sems can ma lus pa//
243b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing sbyin pa mang du dgye// phye mar gyur pa'i smon lam yang // gtsang mar rgya cher gdab par gsungs// smon lam las byung dge ba yang / na mkha' na mkha' mtha' dang mtshungs// zas mi shes pa'i 'bras bu
243b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung // yong na 'byung ba de yis las// shin tu zhugs pas las rnams 'grub// kun rdzob la brten don dam dang // thabs la ma brten shes rab dang // srid pa'i bde ba ma brten par// thar pa mya ngan+ta 'das pa
243b5(rgyud 'grel): med// des na gas nga sngags nus pa yis// mi basmai 'bras bu 'byung ba ru// dris par gtsi ru gzung bar gsungs// yang dag rtags dang rgyu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // baudud kyi rtags
243b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams bzlog pa dang / srid pa'i mtsho las brgal 'dod pas// dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas// dam tshig sdom pa gtsang ba yis// nyes pa med cing bar chod sel// bdud rnams bzlog pa'i gtse ru gsungs//
244a1(rgyud 'grel): dang po gsang sngags sgor zhugs nas// lta ba spyod pa zung du 'brel// gsang sngags las kyi gtso ru gsungs// lta ba gtan la ma phebs pas// dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas// bdud kyi bar chod
244a2(rgyud 'grel): bsal ba dang // dngos grub myur bar 'dod pa yis// lta ba nyam su lon par bya// lta ba gnyis te yang dag log/ dngos po rnams dang mi mthun pa// bsam mi khyab ste gnyisu 'dus// rtag pa dang ni chad pa'o// yang
244a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa yang gnyisu gsungs// shes rab snying rje che chung dang // chung ba 'di ru mi smra ste// shes rab che ba gnyisu gsungs// gsang sngags pha rol phyim pa'o// de don gtan la dbab pa ni// don dam pa dang kun rdzob
244a4(rgyud 'grel): bogo/ yang na bden gcig 'dod pa dang // khas la na kun dang bral ba ni// rnam spyod med cing yongs gcod med// kun rdzob gnyis te dman dang mchog/ dman pa gnyis te log pa dang ni yang dag go/ log
244a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis te smig rgyu dang // gong du gsungs pa'i grub mtha'o// shes rab ngan pa'i rtog pa'o// ma brtags gcig pu nyams dga' ba// skye dang 'jig pa'i chos tshul can// don byed nus pa snang ba la// de ni yang
244a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag yin par gsungs// mchog ni dngos po 'di rnams kun// gzhal yas khang dang lha mo dang // sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu mas mtshono// sems kyi snang ba bag chags tshogs// srid pa bla mar shes par
244b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// tha ma la brten bag chags tshogs// ngan song gsum lus brgal bar gsungs// don dam pa yang rnam pa gnyis// phyogs snga 'dod pa rtog pa ngan// rang gi rtog pa gnyi su gsungs// phyogs su rtog pa/
244b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan pa rnams// yang ngag don la skye ba med// med pa grub par 'dod par snang // de tshe skye ba med grub na// med dang grub pa 'gal bya yis// phan tshun spangs pa mi gnas pas// med pa grub pa rigaso ma yin// grub/
244b3(rgyud 'grel): po zhe na rtog par 'gyur// gal to skye med grub na ni// de ni chos tshul grub par 'dod// 'ag la skyon gnas par 'gyur ma yin// chos tshul grub pa rtog yin phyir// bsgoms kyang mi rtog thobla med// dper na ma hAshi/
244b4(rgyud 'grel): tsha ba 'bar ba bzhin// yang stong don dam mi lus pa// chos nyid rang bzhin mtshan ma zhi// mi 'gyur phyir na rtag pa yin// de la rtag pa yod na mi rtag yang // chos tshul phye bas grub pas na// mi rtog ma yin/
244b5(rgyud 'grel): rtog par 'gyur// stong nyid mu stegs bdag yod du// rtag pa gcig pa grub par 'gyur// kha cig rang bzhin med pa la// med las chos tshul rigs snang 'dod// de bzhin sems kyis sems brtags pas// med par
244b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur kyang snang zhe na// mi rigs rgya mtsho mi dpog bzhin// mi dmigs gyur kyang snang zhe na// de ni yid rtog dpyod pa ste// long bas zla ba'i gzugs dpog bzhin// kha cig dngos por 'dzin pa de// da lta yang
245a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyis med par 'dzin to// de yi gzhung lugs la/ phyis ni rtog pas med par 'dzin// yod pas med pa grub 'gyur na// mi rigs thug pa med par 'gyur// mi rigs rgyu dgras 'dus byas bzhin// la la don
245a2(rgyud 'grel): dram gnas tshul la// rang bzhin med pa'i shes pa la// de dngos rang bzhin med par 'dod// zla phyed dngos la yod par 'dod// dper na byas pa mi rtag pa// ma byas rtag par shes par 'gyur// de la sogs pa dpag tu med// rang
245a3(rgyud 'grel): gi 'dod pa'i ngo bo yang // lung dang rig pas shes pa yi// rnam grangs don la yongs 'das pa'o// khas len bral bsdu yongasu 'dod// dmigs sogs sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor can// lha mo shes rab stong pa yis// srid dngos
245a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma stong par grol// dngos por snang ba 'di rnam kun// gcig dang du mar ma grub pas// shes rab kyis dpyang rang bzhin med// dngos por snang ba 'di rnams kun+da// smig rgyu chu zla bzhin du snang // rigs pas grub pa'i shes pa
245a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ chos can snang bar ngas ma mthong // nges pa brtags na rigs pa la// chos can chos tshul grub ma yin// gang yang ma grub gyur pa de// bla med don rnyed ce su gsungs// don de dngos po gnas tshul ni// ming med tshig
245a6(rgyud 'grel): med yi ge med// rtag med chad pa yod ma yin// de ltar yod par ma grub pas// med pa ma grub de yi phyir// de yi mtha' dang dbus ma grub// de ltar ma grub de shes na// phyag rgya chen por sbyor zhes bya// de bzhin
245b1(rgyud 'grel): lung rigs du ma yi// rdo rje gzegs ma rten 'brel stsogs// nges par brtags na grub pa min// zhib pa 'di ru ma sproso// gsang sngags phyag rgya chen po yis// rang bzhin mi gnas spros bral yang // thabs dang shes rab
245b2(rgyud 'grel): snang stong dang // rig dang bde la sogs pa yang // rigs pas ci yang grub pa min// don dam rang bzhin gnas tshul yang // rab tu mi gnas rang bzhin te// mi gnas pa yi ngo bor 'dod// bden gnyis gcig gi ngo yang /
245b3(rgyud 'grel): don dam spros bral stong nyid bsgom// kun rdzob sgyu mas bsod nams ba sag/ de ltar rtogs pa'i man dag kyang // bla med bla med las byung gi/ pha rol dbu ma pa la min// zhes gsungs so// de ltar rtogs pa'i gang zag/
245b4(rgyud 'grel): 2lam la bar tshong bdud med de// gang byas 'bras bu rnyed par 'gyur// lta bas man ngag rtogs pa ste// rigs pa bar chod myur du zhi// bar chong rung gi sems lngas byung // des na shes rab mig tu gsungs// ltu
245b5(rgyud 'grel): ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u s+t+waM dgu pa'o// / bdud rtsi lnga la spyod pa dang rig ma ye shes skye tshul gyis// bsang bas bzlog par bya ba ni// gsang bI spyod pas bzlog pa'o// cho ga bcu yis
245b6(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa dang // yid dam lha la lus dbul zhing // gsol ba 'debs shing skyabasu 'gro/ tsho gas dbang du sdud pa'o// bdog las byung ba'i khro tshogs dang // lus los mtshon cha'i char 'bebs dang // de dang drag po sbyor/
246a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang // mi 'da' gsang ba'i sngags bzlos pa// bdag 'od dbyibs las byung ba yi// thog 'bebs sbyor ba rtsom pa dang // me dang chu yi 'khor lo dang // man ngag stobs kyis bzlog pa'o// yungs kar dang ni yungs nag
246a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // skye che shing tshe gu gul dang // dug 'brus brab cing rdzas kyis bsrung // rdzas kyis bzlog pa'i man ngag go// mdun gyi snying du sems dpa' skyed // 'od 'phros ye shes me 'bar ba// 'di yang man ngag stobs kyis bzlog/ gang yang
246a3(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa'i mgrin pa ru// a bsams de dang spyi bo ru// d+hU las 'khor lo skor ba yang // sngags dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba ste// 'di ni bsam gtan bzlog pa'o// rdo rje rtse gsum phyag rgya dang // dam tshig rdo rje sdigs mdzub kyis//
246a4(rgyud 'grel): bram ral gri la sogs pa// phyag rgyu bzlog par gsungs pa yin// dngos dang nyams la sogs pa ru// bkru shis 'khor lo dga' zhing sogs// chags par gyur pa rul myags dang // dum bu lang+ga ling rnam par bsam// shin tu khro
246a5(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur pa la// byams pa bsgom zhing dngos po btsal// snying rje la sogs skye bar 'gyur// gti mug la sogs chos rnams dbye// de bzhin mi dge gnyen po ru// dge ba ma lus bsam pa yin// gzhan yang log pa'i don bstan
246a6(rgyud 'grel): naH/ bdag la chos dang chos can rnams// rang bzhin med dang sgyu ma dang // stong dang zhi ba sems kyi ngang // cho 'phrul yin par shes pa yis// brda' dang phyag rgya la sogs pa// don dang sbyar la sbyin par bya// thabs kyis ston na shes rab
246b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs la sogs pa sbyar// glen pa'i lan yang myur du sbyin// bdud rnams sbyor ba ma lus pa// ting 'dzin gsal zhing brtson 'grus drag/ bdud rnams bzlog pa'i mchog tu gsungs// bar du gcod pa a bzlog na// dngos grub med cing
246b2(rgyud 'grel): phyal bar gtong // des na bzlog pa shin tu gces// bdud bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / mdangs dang srog la bar tshad byed// gdug pa ma lus sel ba'i phyir// sbyor ba 'di yi man ngag bstan// gams ni yid 'ong la so//
246b3(rgyud 'grel): su/ bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs pa dang // zhi ba la sogs so so yi// gang ltar 'dod pa'i sku bskyed pa// bsdu ba la sogs rdzogs pa yis// zhi ba dang ni rgyas la sogs// cho gos dang gtor ma bsngo zhing bsdu// des kyang 'dul bar 'gyur ba
246b4(rgyud 'grel): yin// yang na dwe i sbyor ba la// rkang pa g.yas pa ral gri la// g.yon pa lcags kyu sbyor ba ausau// khro bo mi g.yo bsgom bya ste// g.yon pas bkug cing g.yas pas gtub// ral gri gsang sngags bzlas pa dang // gdab pa yang ni de yino//
246b5(rgyud 'grel): yang na gzir ba'i cho go ni// nad pa 'am ni gzugs dag la// dmigs pa legs pa bkug byas nas// rkang pa g.yas pa ri rab la// rgya gram 'drar bas mtshan pa'o// rgyal chen phyogs skyong gong dang 'og/ bang rim rnams la nges par bsam//
246b6(rgyud 'grel): pus mo chu srin rgyal mtshan te// mkha' lding rgyal po rab tu khros// gnas lnga las dang sbyor ba yis// g.yon pa lcags kyu sbyor ba yis// bkug pa la sogs sbyor po yis// snying gar anan gyur drag sngags dang // 'byung po khrag
247a1(rgyud 'grel): tu 'thon 'gyur te// ma mo mkha' 'gros 'thung bar byed// mi bzod smre sngags 'don pa dang // lus las bral zhing 'bros par 'gyur// yang na snying nang ram las me// 'bar zhing shin tu 'bar ba yis// gnod sems gtong zhing
247a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bros par 'gyur// phyogs skyong gang dang gang 'dul ba// gong ma 'am ni khro bo bcus// gzir zhing rang la srung ba byed// lha chen po yang 'dar zhing 'bros// bar chad byed pa gzhan yang sel// 'bros par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// mdangs la rgol
247a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gdug pa yang // khyad pa rak+Sha i sbyor ba ste// rigs bzhi la sogs klu rnams la// gzir ba mkha' lding lnga po ste// dgongs dang bka' rgyud gzhan rnams dang // 'dir yang 'os par rab tu bsten// yang snying pad+ma 'bar ba tsam// dus grangs

247a5(rgyud 'grel): nus dang ldan pa yis// rdo rjes brdeg cing lcags kyus 'dzin// sbyor ba 'di ni dam pa'o// gang yang rung bar 'dod pa yis// klu gnyen bde gshegs skur gnas te// g.yas pa rtse lnga thogs med lnga// rang gi sa bon 'og tu gnas// ga
247a6(rgyud 'grel): ba rtsa las byung ba ste// sum las rin chen rdo steng du// khrom las byung ba sna tshogs lnga bsam// 'od zer gyis ni legs bkug ste// lus dang ba spu mtshams rnamasu// nus dang ldan par byas pa la// bdag 'od bu ga dgu sogs zhugs//

247b4(rgyud 'grel): nus pa yin// dri bas 'di ni thabs kyi mchog/ sbyor ba gzhan la yod pa min// bar chod kyi bgegs bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // mi rgod la sogs ma rungs pas// gces shing chos la gnod byed pas//
247b5(rgyud 'grel): gnad khu bor ba'i dam tshig ni// dur khrod mkha' 'gro 'du gnas// drag po gru gsum dug gis bri// rkang rjes gos sogs bge zan dang // bsres te mi rgod gzugs byas la// de yi snying gar mi rus gzhug/ tsha ba bskyed pa'i sbyor ba
247b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ de la tshen skud rnam lnga bcing // rabs chad thod pa re gzhug pa ya ni// rang bskyed rang gi cho ga rdzogs// bdi gshegs mchog dang chos skyong sbyin// de 'od ni las gzugasu gyur// bdag las sprul pa'i khro tshogs kyis// dpog tu

248a3(rgyud 'grel): khro bo yis// sprul pa thog lngas 'byed par byed// phyi ma gsum gyis bsad pa dang // theg chen sbyor ba'i las bya yi// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gsang sngags kyis// bsad cing mnan po'i las rnams bya// yang na bsad pa'i dam pa ni/

248a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzas rnams ni// yungs kar yungs nag phye ma gsum// gdug pa'i 'bru rnams ma lus las// khro chung gdug pas brab nas 'grub// drag sngags bzlas shing thun rnams brdeg/ bsnun cing gtub pa'i rdzas dang gzugs// mnan
248a6(rgyud 'grel): bsreg bsad dang 'phang pa dang // yang dang yang du dgug pa dang // thugs rje bag chags sbyang ba'o// gzugs can gdul ba'i las rnams bstan// mdze can rab chad thod pa ru// 'khor lo gzhung dang mthun pa la/ dug dang myos pa'i
248b1(rgyud 'grel): chu sbyar te// sbrul nag sbyor ba mdze can khrag gis bya// de la dgug pa sngon 'gro bas// lus nang nang nas lcags sbrang mang // lus nang sbrul nag sbyor byas na// lcags sdig srin bu la sogs pas// ba spu bu gar sbyor byas na// de ni mdze yis 'chi ba yin//
248b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin 'khor lo nag po steng // gang yin dgosu gsal byas na// bsam gyis mi khyab phung las bu// stong gsum sbrul nag dgug cing bstim// sbrul las lcags sbrang gzi ma yis// ba spu bu ga nas zhugs pas// me yis bsregs pa 'byung ba yi//
248b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di yang thabs kyi dam pa yin// byang du bltas pa'i chu mig tu// thod pa dum bu drug yod par// gang yin ming rus spags te gzhug/ sbrul nag sa srin la sogs bstim// yang yang bkug la mnan pa yis// zhag bdun gyis ni 'chi bar
248b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// 'di ni bsad pa'i dam pa'o// yang na ma mo sbyor ba yang // bud med thod po lcang lo nang // dri rgod snying la rab bsams te// bdud rtsi lnga byas ling+ga la// lnga pa la sogs phral byas na// snying nang ma mo sbyor ba yis// khar blug sbyar nA myos
248b5(rgyud 'grel): nas 'chi// thod pa klad pa 'khor lo skor// dug dang myos pa dug khrag dang // lug dang glang gi khrag dag gis// smyo byed sbyor ba rab byas shing // 'khar ba thun yang rab tu brdeg/ ma mo rak+Sha kha thun tA ma hi hr-i ti ru lu ru khu b+hI zhes bod cing rbad
248b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// dgug pa sngon du song ba la// mdun du ma mo khrag 'jib pas// phur bus spyi bor gdab byas na// rkang po khrag 'thung 'jib pa yis// de ltar byas pas skya la slam 'gyur// yang na spyi tshags gyur pa la// mdun du spyi tshags rdo rje
249a1(rgyud 'grel): brdeg/ yang ni kha dog nag po la// mgon po me yi phreng ba bskul// sum skor 'od kyi phreng ba yis// rdo rje spyi bor zhugs gyur na// 'od zer snying nag sreg par byed// thig le dag kyang 'joms pa yin// yang na 'od zer nag

249b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas cho ga la// yid dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// dang po bsnyen pa skyel ba yis// gtso bo 'bum la 'khor rnams khri// yo byad sogs la bskyal ba yin// lha dang bum pa la sogs pa// sta gon lhag par gnas pa byas// sku

250a6(rgyud 'grel): cu gnyis sam drug cu bzhi// sum cu gnyis dang brgyad dang bzhi// mkha' 'gro rtsa grangs bzhin du'o// kun brtags rtog pa'i mtshan nyid do// A li gnyis dang kA li gcig/ brgyad dang 'byung bzhi yang dge lda no// de ltas de las yi
