251b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung // gang nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// rtag tu bde ba ster bar byed// ye shes pogs dang dbang bskur gnyis// gzhan gyi las su ma gsungs te// de nas de spangs dngos grub 'byung // zhes pa'o// sna tshogs thabs kyi sgom pa yis//
251b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa rdo rje bzhin du 'grub// zhing khams gang kha dang gang yang rung // sprul pa byin brlabs phyogs bcur 'a gying // 'di yi sbyor ba dag 'gyur na// zhing khams gtsang mar skye bar 'gyur// ma dgu ngan song 'khor ba'i rgyu// mtshan ma dang bcas
251b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdzogs rim gyi le'u bstan pa ste bco lnga pa'o// / yang na 'khor lo sbyor spangs pas// bcu drug brgyad dang bzhi yi dang // dbus su byang chub thig l-i bsgom// stong nyid yongs chod bral ba la// sgom med goms par
251b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i yul// gnas dang mi g.yo bde ba dang // rtog bral rang bzhin stong pa nyid// tha snyad ma grub bde chen dang // thog le nyams ldan shes pa yis// srid rtsi sna gsum mthar phyin nas// mthong lam byang chub myur du 'byung // de las srid
251b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum bgrod pa yang // skye ba rmi lam bar do ru// thig le mi rtog stong nyid yang // thig le ye shes de dang las// rnal 'byor bde ba chen po yang // ma lus cig shes mtha' dang bral// srid gsum rang bzhin 'pho ba yang // 'bras bu stong nyid
251b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byin pa ste// 'di ni rnam shes 'pho 'jug go// zhes lung las gsungaso// mtshan med kyi man ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / gang zhig 'di la rab brtson pas// zla ba drug gam bcu gnyis na// rnal
252a1(rgyud 'grel): ra 'du b.rab tu / sa rgyas kyang chug mas ma na chags pa/ pa 'byur ma/ khaca chags lapar thams cad kyis// g+hA tu sbyin rlabs pa bster// dud dang gan
252a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyits+tsha mok+Sha tshogs// oM sras gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur// ldog bsngal dang la sogs pa rnams// sa lus sbyar du thal par 'gyur// blon mong dngos grub ma lus 'khrug/ gzhan don ma lus lhun gyis glo// zhes gsungs so// gang yang gas
252a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan dmi 'di// dam tshig sdom pa nyams pa dang // gsang stegs phrag khyer 'ching ba dang // rnam mo gus le lo can// dbyar gyi can dan s+thA dri ste// mkhas po brten pa mi brten byur// rmugs pa mi mthong bas khengs pa s+ya// can dan
252a4(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gyi shun pa 'dra// gsang bya'i don dang phyi lam bsre// la la log pa'i chos ngong bsre// gang zhig ster bar gyur pa de// cha grang ngan song sdug bsngal myong // mkhar 'gro byung ma srin po dang // ro langs la sogs kun gyis gsod // gas
252a5(rgyud 'grel): di yi don rnams dang // rang srogs gces dang nor bu dang // dri mchog ga bur bzhin du btsal// glal te btsal ba ma shes na// seng ge'i ma snod nang du// thugs pa ji bzhin 'bras bu med// gsang ba 'di yis drug par 'gyur// gong gi
252a6(rgyud 'grel): las log pa'i snong dang ldan pa la// gsang ba 'di yi man ngag yang // rang gi rang ngan len pa bzhin// de la ma lus sbyir par bya// nor la bstis te gsang den bcang // gsang ba srid po'i rgyal byin// ma mos bcings pas rings grub ya/
252b1(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i 'o mas snod 'jig bzhin// srid mtshe ngan song gsum du 'khor// 'bras bu tsha glang sdug bsngal myong // des na bu dang 'dra bar sbyin// des ni 'bras bu bde ba 'byung // gzhan gyi shugs 'byung ma lags 'di la dga' ba skyes// khams gsum sems
252b2(rgyud 'grel): can srid mtsho dag las brgal phyir dang // rdo rje be con gsang ba'i don gyi la sogs ma lus pa// rang nyid mos dang gsang ba'i thabs rnams// rdzogs par kun la bstan phyir bris// rnyed pa la sogs grags phyir min// man ngag bla ma dang
252b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra lam 'di bstan// lag na rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal la sogs ma nyams bya ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i don rnams thabs kyi yan lag tu// man ngag rgyas par bstan pa'i tshogs rnams la// las kyi bag chags ngan pas ma grol yod srid cing // tshig
252b4(rgyud 'grel): don la nyes pa yod srid pa// rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa dang // bla ma mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol// sems can lam gnyis ma lus bsgral ba dang // bdag dang sems can thams cad kun// rags dang phra ba'i rtog pa
252b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs zhi nas// sdom gsum lam gyis srid pa yongs brgal nas// tshul khrims gtsang mas gsang ba'i don rnams zhugs// phyag rgya chen po don nyid rab mthong zhing // de ma mthong ba'i ma lus sems can rnams// sdug bsngal skyed
252b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kun 'byung rtsad gcod cing // g.yan pa mdze 'bras nad rnams rab tu zhi ba dang // sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rab tu skams pa dang // gos sngon dngos grub myur thob cing // zhing mchog gtsang mar skye bar shog/ kha de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba'i
253a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan// b+h+ra ma'i man ngag rgyun ma chang ba// de kho na nyid nyi zla snang ba zhes bya ba'i grub thabs chen po dge slong klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta gu ru pad+ma 'byung gnas
253a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / lo ts+tsha ba glang dpal gyi seng ges bsgyur ro// / slad kyis kyang paN+Di ta rgya gar phyag nas sgro ring 'gyur du bsgyur ro// bi las badz+rA las bla ma sman btsun khros pa la gnang // des dngos la gnang
253a3(rgyud 'grel): ba lags so// 'di bris rnam dkar phung po yis// deng nas byang chub snying po'i bar// mi mthun phyogs las rnam rgyal te// gos sngon go 'phang myur thob shog/
254a1(rgyud 'grel): dpasargya can gyi dkyil mos slob dpon nA gA rdzu nas mdzad pa bzhug//
254b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni nI lam pa ra sarba maN+Da la bi d+hi nA mA a ti/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rdzogs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems
254b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal grub pa la phyag 'tsha lo// thams cad stong pa chen po'i mchog/ mnga' brnyes phyag na rdo rje la// kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te// dkyil dkyi 'khor cho ga bdag gis bshad// rkyen thubs non
254b3(rgyud 'grel): yan lag rdzogs// ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs bzang zhing // log pa'i lam spangs mang pos bkur// de sogs yon tan kun ldan pas// yid dang mthun pa'i dben pa 'am// yang na nyams dga' bkra shis gnas// ro zlum dag gi
254b4(rgyud 'grel): chu bo'i 'gram// byin che yon tam lnga gnas// stegs bu sngon po mdzes pa la// me tog sngon po btsal bkram te// steng du gos sngon sku gzugs bzhag/ yan lag ye shes bskyed ldan pas// mchod pa'i cho ga sngon btang nas//
254b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang dgug dang bstim la gnas// sngags kyis bsnyen pa 'bum sogs bya// yang na mtshan mA gsum thob pas// bsgrub pa cho ga brtsam par bya// rab tu brtags pa'i sa bzhi lo// zlum la mdzes pa'i maN+Dal brtsig/ steng du
254b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan dkyil 'khor bskyed// spyan drang byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// phyi nang mchod pa ci 'byor dbul// stong pa dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas phyogs skyong srungs ma dgug/ oM in+d+ra ye hUM dzaH/ ag+na e hUM dzaH/
255a1(rgyud 'grel): ya ma ye hUM dzaM/ nai ri N+ye ye hUM dzAM/ bA ru Na ye hUM traH/ ba ya be ye hUM dzAH/ ku bai ra ya hUM dzaSh+Ta/ e sha na e hUM dzaH/ he ta a d+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaH/ sur+ye tsan+na ye hUM dza/ de skad ces brjod la spyan drang ngo // de nas sangs
255a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad dgug/ phyogs skyong la sogs byin gyis brlabs// gtor ma tshul bzhin byin brlab ste// ci bder phyogs skyong tshogs la dbul// de nas las rnams bcol bar bya// lha dbang me lha gshin rje dang // bden bral mu lha rlung gi
255a3(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin dbang ldan nyi zla dang // bran dang bka' nyan pho nyi'i tshogs// rdo rje sgyum dang snyan mnga' ba// rdzu 'phral chen po'i don ldan pa// mngon shes can gyis mchod pa bzhis// sa phyogs dge ba'i gnas 'di ru// bdag gi dge
255a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i grogs po mdzod// bdag gis bzod pa de yis ni// mi slu dam tshig dgongs mdzad la// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan du gsol// tsas las bcol lo// lag pa sa la reg pa yos// sa yi lha mo dbus su bton// de la byin
255a5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs mchod pa bya// dngos su las bcol tshig 'dri bsgo'o// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par lngas// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// ji ltar
255a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi sde bcom po// de ltar bdag gis bdud las ni// rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri// zhes brjod pas gnang ba byon nas// thim par bsam mo// sa bslang ba'o// / legs par byin pa'i gnas ched du// sa
255b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag legs par blta byas la// zla bzhir dbang du phyogs bzhir blta// de yi lto ba'i dbus nas bru// ro la sogs pa'i skyon rnams bsal// mar gyi mdog dang 'dres par 'gyur// mchog tu gyur pas blang bar bya// sa brtag pa'o// //
255b2(rgyud 'grel): sa bzhi bzang po brko dus su// dag par byed pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// stegs bu khru nI bcu drug gam// bcu lnga 'am lnga ru legs byas te// shin tu mthas par bcag par bya// mthon dman med par gyur pa dang // bdud rtsi lnga 'am ba yi lnga/
255b3(rgyud 'grel): dri dang sman gyis legs byer byug/ dag byed gsang sngags bzlas pa yis// rtsa de'i ye ges grub par bya// sa sbyang ba'o// / de nas sa las 'od byung ste// yaM las rgya gram rlung du gyur// de steng baM las chu dkyil
255b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor// gser gyi sa gzhi lam las bskyed// de steng sum las ri rab bskyed// rin chen sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can// de la lag pa brdeg par bya// de yi gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas// oM me di ni badz+rI b+ha wa ban+d+ha naM hUM phaT// ces bzlas
255b5(rgyud 'grel): sa 'od dang ldan te// 'od kyis stong gusum thams cad gsal// sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'o// / deng nas brtsams te gos sngon can// phyag rgya che dang ldan gyur pas// rgyan rnams thamasand yang dag ldan//
255b6(rgyud 'grel): bad+ma la sogs dbus bting nas// de yi steng du 'dug par bya// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnamasu// mchod pa lnga 'am nyi shu brgyad// bdag gi thugs ki'o 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas spyan spa drangs te// bstim pas bkrag
256a1(rgyud 'grel): dang gzi byin bskyed// mngal nas skyes pa'i tshul can nam// sna bug sngags kyi 'od zer las// yang na nyi zer tshul can gyis// 'khor rnams gsal bar gyur pa las// ye shes bde gshegs spyan drangs bstim//
256a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas gsol ba gdab pa ni// gsong bdag dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyir// bdag ni sna chem gzung bar byed// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol// gsol ba gdab po'o//
256a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang thob gyur nas gsang sngags bzlas// sku yi 'od kyis gsang sngags rgyal// reg pas bdud dong srin po 'bros// bsam gtan de las ma yengs pas// sngags kyi phreng bas bzlas pa bya// zhes pa ni su gzung ba'i cho
256a4(rgyud 'grel): ga'o// de nas phyogs bzhir rnal 'byor bzhi// khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs bsam// shararA nas gtso la pa mchod pa phul// gsol ba 'di yang gdab par bya// rdo rje rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon tsan// dpal
256a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan dkyil 'khor chen po dri ba'i phyir// mnyam pa'i dang las 'byar ba'i skur bzhengs la// zhe sdang rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog/ tu gsol// ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o// lho nas gtso la mchod pa phul// gsol ba
256a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag gdab par bya// oM rin tshon rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon can// dpal ldan rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir// mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i sku bzhengs la// nga rgyal rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog
256b1(rgyud 'grel): tu gsol// ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o// nub nas gtso las mchod pa phul la// gsol ba 'di gdab par bya'o// oM pad+ma rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon can// pad+ma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir// mnyam pa'i ngang las
256b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs la// 'dod chagaso rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog tu gsol// ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o// byung nas gtso la mchod pa dbul// gsol ba 'di dag gdab par bya'o// oM las kyi rigs mchog dpal
256b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan gos sngon can// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir// mnyam pa'i dang las 'bar ba'i sku bzhengs la// phrog dog rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog tu gsol// ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas phyogs bzhi khro bo
256b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhis// dkyil 'khor gats+tsha la gsol ba gdab// mnyes pa'i tshogs kyang ci nus bya// des ni bgegs rnams 'byer bar 'gyur// zhe'o// de ni gtso bo bslang ba'i cho ga'o// de nas brtsams te gos ston can// shin tu khro ba'i gzugs
256b5(rgyud 'grel): su langs// mig gnyis hrI Ta'i dkyil 'khor du// raM dang A gnyis bsam par bya// rkang par ljang gu yi ge hUM los// sna tshogs rdo rje 'od ldan bsam// mig dang rna ba'i nang du yang // khro bo'i tshogs ni bsam pa bya// nga rgyal
256b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po bskyed nas ni// rdo rje dril bu bskor bya zhing // rkang pa rdo rje stabs ldan paso// phyogs mtsham su ni blta bya ste// hUM zhes 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog bsam// ha ha gang mo chen po rgod// nga rgyal bskyed pa'o// g.yon pa dril bu
257a1(rgyud 'grel): kur brten nas// g.yas pa rdo rje bsor byas te// sangs rgyas thams cad mdun bsams te// bkar sgo bden pa brdar bar bya// gang dag sa phyogs 'di na gnas pa yas// sgra tshogs dang / klu tshogs dang // gnod sbyin gyi tshogs
257a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / lto 'phye'i tshogs la sogs pa thams cad dengs shig/ hUM nga ni dbal ldan gos sngon cano// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang ba ste// lha dang klu dang lha ma yin// brjid byed la sogs bgelus kyi tshogs// gnas 'dir ma 'dug gzhan du
257a3(rgyud 'grel): dengengs// g.yo te dam tshig las 'das na// stobs chen khro bo gos sngon gyis// klang ba 'gas pas gdon mi za// phaT na maHman+ta kA ya bAta tsi d+ha badz+rA nan/ natsho nI lAM bo ra hUM/ khA kha khA hi khyA hi/ tiSh+Tha tIn+ta/ bAn+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hU~M na ha na/ dar+b+ha
257a4(rgyud 'grel): daha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya spr-i Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAM bi ne ya ka nan/ ma hA g+ha na dza bin tan ta ka rA ya hUM phaT/ bgegs bskrad ba'o// dpal ldan gos sngon snying po las// yi ge lnga yi sbyor ba yis// mtshon cha khyA yI
257a5(rgyud 'grel): thog phab pas// gdug pa thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur// ni thog 'bab pa'o// de nas rkang pa rdo rje stabs// lag par gar stabs bskor ba yis// dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te// rdo rje bskor ba lan gsum mam// yang na dzaM
257a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar nus pa yis// bsrung ba khro bo khang par bsam// sa bsrung ba'o// deng nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor gyi// lha yi sta gon bya bar gsungs// bdud rtsi lnga yi thig le yis// thig le lha yi gnasu ni// gdan du bsams la dbab par bya/
257b1(rgyud 'grel): de steng hUM las phyag mtshan gyur// de las so sor sku rdzogs te// dbang bskur byin gyis brlab par bya// de la phyi nang mchod pa dbul// bstod pa dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas gsol pa gdab par bya// bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can// rigs
257b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyal lo phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gi snying rje'i dkyil 'khor ni// me gon po bri bar 'dod pa ste// slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang // khyed la mchod pa'i don du yang // de la bcom ldan gus bdag la// byin brlabs gnang bar
257b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad par 'os// dgongs shing bcom ldan gos sngon can// rdo rje 'chang chen sprul pa'o// bgegs rnams ma lus 'dul ba'i bdag/ gsang sngags rigs sngags kun gyis lha// bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol// bdag ni
257b4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rnams kyi phyir// dpal ldan gos sngon dkyil 'khor bri// bdag dang slob mar bcas pa rnams// thugs rjes nye bar gzung du gsol// bdag la bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// 'byung po sha za gnod sbyin dang // gang dag gnod
257b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sems ldan po// thams cad bdag la bsrung du gsol// thun mong dngos grub thams cad dang // de bzhin mchog tu gyur pa dang // thugs rje chen pos dgongs mdzad la// bdag la myur du stsal du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba
257b6(rgyud 'grel): godab par bya'i// dkyil 'khor gyi lha sta gon gyi cho ga'o// de nas bsams te gos sngon gyis// rin chen dngul gyi bum pa 'am// yang na dkar po khams sogs la// nag po dang ni ra re med// de lta bu yi bum pa la// pad+ma 'dab ma
258a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad ldan pa'i// dbus su so so'i snying po 'am// yang na so so'i phyag mtshan dgod// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// dkar po yi ni yi ge pa// de las bum pa'i gzhal yas khang // nang du pad+ma nyi zla'i gad na// lho s+ye mgrin pa
258a2(rgyud 'grel): ring ba dang // mchu ni rkang ka'i dbyibs can la// dbus su so so'i snying po bsam// de nas phyag mtshan sku rdzogs 'gyur// mi dmigs dbyings nas sangs rgyas bskul// gnyis med gyur la mchod pa dbul// gong mi'i gsol ba gdab par
258a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ de nas sman lnga 'bru lta dang // rin chen lnga dang snying po lnga// thun mong bum pa'i rdza su blugs// rnam rgyal bum par lha tshogs bskyod// btung ba snum po dag dang ni// mi mchi lngas kyang dgang bar bya// las kyi la bum pas khams
258a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum rgyal// 'od zhu di yis las kun byed// sngags ni so so'o snying po'o// de nas bum pa thams cad kun// dpag bsam shing dang 'bras bu can// yon tan ldan pas kha brgyan nas// de ni ma nyams ras dag la// kha dog lnga dang
258a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yis// rnam rgyal bum pa bcing bar bya// gzhan ma kha dog re ra'o// shar du 'dab ma brgyad pa yis// maN+Dal byas te de ru bzhag/ bum pa sta gon gyi cho ga'o// de nas slob ma lhag pa'i cho ga bya ste// chags dang grol ba'i gang
258a6(rgyud 'grel): zag ni// lhag par gnas pa gcig tu gyu ro// dang por phyi nang khrus byas te// dri zham byugs la gos bzang brgyan// de nas dkyil 'khor phyi rol dgod// slob dpon la ni gsol bdab gdab// ston pa khyod la bdag dga'o// slob
258b1(rgyud 'grel): dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol// de nyid dam tshig bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// skyabs
258b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol// lan stsal pa/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshig 'di ni// khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// tshul
258b3(rgyud 'grel): chen khyod kyis shes par gyis// zhe'o// de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang // rje su yid rang ba dang // chos kyis 'khor lo bskor ba dang // mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab par dang // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa
258b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / lus dbul ba ni gzhan du shes par bya'o// de'i rjes la sdom pa phog la 'dzin tu gzhug/ bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// deng na sna
258b5(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te gzung bar bya// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po lnga// rdo rje dril tu bu'i phyag rgya yang // yang dgra nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang bkur bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yis// dam tshig yod
258b6(rgyud 'grel): 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dam pa la// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs
259a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gi sdom pa ma lus bzung // zhes sdom pa bzung ngo // de nas slob ma la 'od
259a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phros// phyag rgya che dang ldan 'gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnams su// dri yi thig le re re gang ba// lha rnams kyi ni gadran du bsam// spyi gtsug bdi gshegs gos sngon can// mgrin par pad+ma'i gos sngon can// snying gA
259a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi gos sngon ca no// lte bar rin chen gos sngon can// gsang bar las kyi gos sngon no// dpung ba la sogs rkang lag bzhi// khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs brtag/ de nas spos dang me tog dang // mar me dri dang rnam
259a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga dbul// dri yi chu la bdud rtsi 'am// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bskyed// bcu gcig 'od zhu dag pa'i chus// ngag gi nyes pa sbyang bar bya'o// bdud rtsi chu yang blud par bya// de nas bsrung skud byin brlabs ti// dag pa'i
259a5(rgyud 'grel): chu gtor 'od zhu bas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bskyed// bkug nas 'od du zhu ba las// 'bar ba'i 'di lnga ldan par bya'o// de lo mdud pa drug byas te// mdud pa re la lha ri bstim// rdo rje de nyid sngags
259a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis grub// dpung pa g.yon par gdags par bya// de nas so shing byin brlabs te// u dum bA ra ba sha'i shing // ma yo ma gas 'bus ma zos// sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshang du bya// 'od zhu bskyed pa gong bzhin te// shar du
259b1(rgyud 'grel): kha ltas mi smra bar// bca' dang bru ba'i cho ga bya// bsam pas byang chub sems bskyed de// rtags ni gsum du shes par bya// dang po 'jug pa'i rtags bstan te// bor bas slob dpon la bltas na// de ni 'jug tu rung bar bshad// gal
259b2(rgyud 'grel): te rang la bltas gyur na// de ni phyir yang dor bar bya// gnyis pa bgegs kyi rtags rnams blta// gsum pa dngos grub grub rtags ni// sor mo 'am ni bor ba'i che// steng du lus na mchog 'grub 'gyur// shar du yang ni de bzhin te
259b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams dang byang du kha bltas ni// zhi ba la sogs dngos grub 'gyur// de nas ngag gi nyes pa sbyang // de nas ku sho byin brlabs te// khams gsum rgyal po khro bo dang // las kyi gos sngon phyag rgya sngags// de yi byin brlabs sngags
259b4(rgyud 'grel): dang stan// de stong seng ge'i stabs kyis nyal// spro ba skyed pa'i cho ga bya// sangs rgyas chos dang mthun 'gyur pa'o// u dum bA ra'i me tog ni// 'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung srid// ske ba 'di yis thob pa yis// 'bras bu rdo rje'i thig
259b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos// 'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung srid// gsang sngags don 'di thob pa yis// dga' bo thams cad mthar phyin te// las 'phro dang ni thugs dz+has 'byung // bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che// thogs pa med pa'i sku brnyes pa
259b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis tshul gyis mngon par bsgrub// sems can skal pa ngan pa yi// de yi ming yang thos mi 'gyur// khyang por 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// sang gi nyin mo khyed rnams kun// dkyil 'khor bzang po mthong ba yis// bla med
260a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog la reg par 'gyur// zhes spro ba bskyed pa'i chos gzhan yang bshang bar bya'o// nang par sngar ni blo can langs// rmi lham ci mthong dri bar bya// gus sngon sku gzugs mthong ba dang // ra bar snang du 'dug pa dang /
260a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten skas la 'dzeg pa dang // me tog steng na 'dug pa dang // chos kyi bgro gleng byed pa dang // glegs bam dag la spyod pa dang // gzhan gyi dbang bskur dkyil 'khor mthong // de dang gzhan yang bzang 'gyur dang // yi rang
260a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig brjod bral te rtags// mi gsal bA ru gyur pa na// nyams pa rnams ni bskrad bAr bya// gal te bar chod rtags byung na// drag po'i sbyin sreg bya ba de nga // drag po'i tshogs dang 'khor los bzlog/ gong ma'i rtags dang ldan
260a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas// thig gdab pa ye cho ga bya// thig srung kha dog lnga ldan la// yi ge lngas ni byin brlabs te// de las rigs lnga'i sku ru gyur// ye shes rigros lnga bkug cing bstim// 'od zhu thig skud sna sngar grub// yang na ye shes byang chub
260a5(rgyud 'grel): sems// kha dog lnga dang ldan par dgug/ des ni na mkha'i thig gdab bo// sa yaM thig kyong 'di lta ste// dang po tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab// de bzhin 'khor lo rnam brgyad dang // grub ched khyims deng sgo bzhi dang // rta babs la
260a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs so sor dbye// de nang du phur bu gdab// mtha' bskor dag ni gnyisu bskor// nang gi snam bu'i nang du ni// cha chung gcig la skor gnyis bskor// dbus su bskor po gcig dang ldan// de nas rdul tshon brtsam par bya// dbus
260b1(rgyud 'grel): mthing ga shar du dkar// lho yi pad+ma 'dab ma ser// nub kyi pad+ma 'dab ma dmar// byang gi pad+ma ljang khur bya// mtshams ni mthing ga yang dag ldan// 'khor lo mdog kyang de bzhin no// dbus su rdo rje dgod pa ste// shar du 'khor lo dgod par bya//
260b2(rgyud 'grel): lhor ni rin chen 'bar ba gang god// nub tu pad+ma dmar po ste// byung du sna tshogs rdo rje ste// yum nI so sor 'khril pa'o// mtshams rnams su ni khams gsum rgyal// mgon po 'phags skyes rnam sa sras// so so'i phyag mtshan
260b3(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya// gru chad dang ni lha mo mtshan// kha dog ljang gu tshon gyis bya// khyams kyi shar ni dkar por bya// lho ser nub ni rnam par dmar// byang gi khyams ni ljang gu'o// khyams te dzi bzhin sgo de bzhin// shwar gyi sgor ni lca
260b4(rgyud 'grel): kyu sna// lhor ni zhag pa nub lcags sgrogs// byang ni sgor ni dril bu dgod// skr-i khyud phyi rol la sogasu// khyam sa dang pha khu dra ba dang // dra ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan// rta babos bzhi yang de bzhin te// tA r+ya na bzhi yis kyang brgyan
260b5(rgyud 'grel): ri mo'i cho ga rdzogis gyur nas// dam tshig 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed// e shes 'khor l-i bkug nas bstim// de nas mchod pa'i cho ga brtsam// badz+ra d+hU pa sngags las byung // dkar mo spos kyi shangs lnga dbul//
260b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra puSh+pa'i sngags las byung // mthing ga me tog sku la gtor// badz+ra A lo ke sngags las byung // dmar mo mar mes dkyil 'khor gsal// badz+ra gan+d+hi sngag sgra byung // ljang gu dri chab phyag zhabs bsil// de la
261a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i mchong ba'i tshogs// ci 'byor thams cad dbul bar bya// dang par sems bskyed phyug 'tshal nas// skyabs gsol sdom pa bzung bar bya// dbang bzhi dkyil 'khor lha la thang // yang na namakha'i dbyingasu blang /
261a2(rgyud 'grel): thos dang bsam pas bdag nyid 'jug pa'o// / de nas slob mo gzhug par bya// phyi rol khrus kyi cho ga bya// bum par gyur dang rdzas rnams dgram// ci 'byor yon rnams dbul bar bya// sems bskyed sdom pa la
261a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs sngon bzhin bya// sdom pa legs par 'dzin pa la// bka' bsgo dam tshig bdud rtsi blud// yid 'ong rnal 'byor chen po khyod// las 'phro dang ni thugs rjes 'byung // bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che// thogs pa med pa'i sgo brnyes pa//
261a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di yi tshul gyis mngon par bsgrub// sems can skal pa ngan pa yis// de yis ming yang thos mi srid// spyad par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// sang gi nyin mo khyed rnams kun// dkyil 'khor bzang po mthong ba yis// bla med mchog
261a5(rgyud 'grel): la reg par 'gyur// zhes spro ba bskyed pa'i chos gzhan yang bshad par bya'o// / nang por sngar ni blo can langs// rmi lam ci mthong dri bar bya// gos sngon sku gzugs mthong ba dang // gos sngon sku dkyil 'khor
261a6(rgyud 'grel): chen por chud// nga yis khyod la dngos grub 'byung // sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// ces pa ni spro ba bskyed pa'o// gsang mchog gos sngon dkyil 'khor 'di// sems can dad pa med pa dang // gang yang log chos spyod pa dang
261b1(rgyud 'grel): mnar med ngan song rgyud can dang // rna bar ming yang bsgrags mi bya// zhes pa ni gdams ngag go/ gal te de la smras gyur na// dam can chad pas bcad nas ni// tshe yi 'du byed 'di bskul na// mnar med dmyal bar myur du dengs// gos
261b2(rgyud 'grel): sngon chen pos mod la spong // zhes pa 'di ni skyon bstan pa'o// de nas snying nang sems dpa' bskyed// bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar ba 'am// yang na dri yis chu blud de// 'thung zhig rdo rje 'bar ba'i chu// dam las 'odas na ba sreg par byed//
261b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu yis 'grub// oM badz+ra satwa hUM ma hA pany+tsa oM mr-i ta/ kha kha zhes po ni mna' bsgag pa'o// de ring phan chad bu khyod kyi// gsang chen rdo rje nga yin gyis// nga la brnyas par mo byed
261b4(rgyud 'grel): cig/ gal te brnyas par gyur na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes pa min// tshe yi 'du byed 'di bskul nas// dmyal bar skye bar gdon mi za// zhes pa ni man dog go/ de nas rdo rje slob ma yis// slob dpon la ni gsolo
261b5(rgyud 'grel): gdab// chos dbyings byin brlabs las byung ba'i// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po// de ring bdag la dbab tu gastsol// zho so// de nas slob ma mtha' yas la// raM dang bcas pa'i yi ge bsam// bskyod nas drod skul chu la phog/
261b6(rgyud 'grel): bskol bris yi dkyil 'khor zhu// lus nang me yis bsreg pa kun// yi ge'i gzugasu blang zhing bsreg/ sdig pa tshig par gyur pa dang // bde gshegs byang chub sems phab ste// snying dam lus nang 'khyi la bar bsam//
262a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje chang chen bsgom// me tog dkyil 'khor wA la dbul// b+hU tIn+na ho zhes brjod// de nas phreng ba mgo la bcing // oM sa hA ba la badz+ra/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa sI zhe'o// rlung lung gsang ba'i me tog 'ad// gang la babs
262a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rigs kyi lha// las 'phro thugs rjes 'byung bar 'gyur// gtso bo'i thugs sogs mchog dngos grub// dbus dang nyan dngos grub nye// ring na dngos grub ring bar 'gyur// zhes pa la sogs bzhi dbab pa'i cho ga dang me tog go// dpal ldan
262a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po gos sngon can// khyod kyis mig dbye brtson par mdzod// tsak+Shu pra be sha ya phaT/ bkab pa'i lta bas blta byas te// dkar po mthong na zhi ba 'grub// ser po mthong na rgyas pa 'grub// dmar po mthong na dbang gi las// nag pos drag po'i
262a4(rgyud 'grel): las 'grub 'gyur// khyod kyi mig gis ji ltar mthong // zhes pa ni dri bar bya'o// deng nas brtsams nga te dpal ldan che// khyab nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor bstan// dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i 'og tu ni// yon phul gsol ba gdab par bya//
262a5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas la// rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ltar// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du// byang gshegs bum pa'i dbang mchog stsol// ces pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'o// de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis// bum pa'i chu ni
262a6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus byas te// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo dag/ rol mo sgra dang bcas pa yis// spyi gtsug dag tu dbang bskur// oM gsang ba gsum las legs byung ba'i// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// dri med rdo rje chu dbang gis// mi bskyod dngos grub tho
262b1(rgyud 'grel): bar shog/ oM sarba tA thA gra ta A dAR+Ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ chu'i dbang ngo // oM sangs rgyas byin brlabs las byung ba'i// yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba che// dam pa thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen grub pa'i dbang bskur ro// oM sarba ta
262b2(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta sa ma tA badz+ra A bi Shiny+tsa mi// zhes pa ni dbu rgyan gyi dbang ngo // oM ye shes lnga yi rtags 'chang ba// thugs mchog rdo rje bla na med// dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa yis// snang ba mtha' yas dbang bsku ro// oM sarba ta thA ga
262b3(rgyud 'grel): ta pa t+ya bak+She Na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ zhes pa ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo // oM chos sku sgyu ma'i sgra sgrogs shing // stong pa'i don las sad par byed// bla med dril bu'i dbang bskur bas// don yod grub pa'i dngos grub shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kri t+yA
262b4(rgyud 'grel): nuSh+TA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma~M/ zhes pa ni dril bu'i dbang ngo // kye rdo rje'i ming go dbang bskur bas// ci kyang mi tshugs mi shig pa'i// byang chub chen po thob pa dang // rnam par snang mdzad dngos grub sheg/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shr-i sa ma ya
262b5(rgyud 'grel): ku nyaM ta nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ zhes pa ni ming gi dbang ngo // chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// me long gi ni gzugs brnyan bzhin// rang byung lha ni shes par gyis// zhes pa ni me long ngo // lu de las/
262b6(rgyud 'grel): dang po gsol ba gdab pa ste// gsan nas ye shes 'khor lo gzhu ga/ sdig pa dag par chus bkrus te// so so'i dbang rdzas lag tu sbyin// nyon mongs lnga yi dri ma bkru// dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dgod// ce'o// bcom
263a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am// rdo rje'i dbang gis mngon sangs rgyas// ye shes lnga dang rdo rje 'di// khyod kyis rtag tu bcang bar gyis// zhes pa thugs kyi dam tshig go/ gsung rnams sgra brnyan lta bu ste// rtog pa
263a2(rgyud 'grel): med pas sna tshogs sgra// brjod bral dpag gis mi la ba'i// dril bu 'di ni khyod kyis bzung // zhes pa ni gsung gi dam tshig go/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sgro// mi phyed rdo rje'i ngo bo 'di// 'khyud pi'i phyag rgya'i dam tshig ste//
263a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // zhes pa ni sku'i dam tshig go/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpal ldan rdor 'dzin ldag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu btsong // phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga
263a4(rgyud 'grel): tau badz+ra pA Ni hUM ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye hUM te ye hUM hA ha ha hi/ zhes pa 'di ni rdo rje brtul zhugaso// chags dang grol ba'i gang zag gis// thun mong dkyil 'khor cho ga yin// gang zag rnam pa gnyis po de// dkyil 'khro
263a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ru zhugs tsam gyis// dngos grub gnyis ga dang 'brel bar byed// klu dang 'byung pos zin pa la// dang po cho ga sngon seng nas// sme ba'i rdzas kyis dpral bar bya// de nas phral ba gso ba dang // nad pa chu yis bkru bar bya// de
263a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas nas dkyil 'khor 'dir// zhugs pa tsam gyi myur dau thar// rims dang 'brum bu la sogs pa// gtor ma'i 'khor lo sngon song bas// dkyilo 'khor 'di ru zhugs gyur na// myur du nyan las thar bor 'gyur/
263b1(rgyud 'grel): bud med dag kyang bu 'dod na// dang po cho ga sngon song nas// khrus kyis ngag nas gos bzang bgo/ dkyil 'khor 'di ru bzhugs pa yis// bus pa'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang // bus pa du byung bar gdon mi za// yi dgas bkol ba'i cho
263b2(rgyud 'grel): ga yang // lha la sogs pa bkug gyur nas// sdom pa legos par bzung nas ni// dkyil 'khor 'di ru zhugs gyur nas// bdag gi bcol ba thams cad byed// thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje bzhin// ro yi las rnams byed 'dod pas//
263b3(rgyud 'grel): blang dang bsrung ba sngon song nas// dkyil 'khor 'di ru bcug gyur na// log chos drug dang ldan pa yang // gtsang ba'i gnasu nye bar 'gro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la// dag pa'i cho ga sngon song nas// byin brlabs dkyil
263b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po 'dir// dbang bskur mchod pa phul gyur na// shin tu bkra shis don ldan te// bskur zhing bstim pa'i gnasu 'gyur// yon tan 'byung ba'i 'byung ba'i gnas// chags lam pa dang grol lum pa// mdze dang rims
263b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis zin pa dang // bud med dang ni yi dgas bkrol// ro lang sku gzugs lhag par gnas// brgyad po dkyil 'khor 'di yaus byed// de phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga brgyad// gcig par bsdu ba'i cho ga'o//
263b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// de yang bdud rtsi lnga yis byug/ stegs bu'i steng na slob dpon dang // phyag rgya ma ni snyoms par zhugaso// slob mas de la gsol ba gdab// oM rgyal ba thams cad rol pa yi// sangs rgyas chu
264a1(rgyud 'grel): yi rgyun phab ste// nyon mongs rtog pa sbyangs pa bzhin// bdag la byang chub sems dbang gsol// ji ltar rgyal po'i dbu skabs pa// byang chub sems kyis bskus pa bzhin// bdag la byang chub sems khrus gsol/
264a2(rgyud 'grel): ces pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'o// de nas blo ldan slob dpon dang // slob ma gnyis med sbyor byas pa'i// byang chub semasu grang gsungs pa// yum gyi b+ha gar blang bar bya// dper na bum pa me tog bzhin// yang na gsang ba'i rdo rje sker/
264a3(rgyud 'grel): sbom pos dbang po gnyis mnan te// slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya// dper na ma la bu bzhin no// yang na slob ma gang yin pa// gdugs la sogs dang ldan gyur byas nas// gsang chen bde ba'i rgyu mchog ste// bdud rtsi lnga dang
264a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan byas nas// bkra shIs bstod pas bstod pa dang // slob ma'i lce las sbyin par bya// de nas slob ma chen po des// byang chub bdud rtsi lces blangs nas// snying gar 'dod pa bsten par bya// bde ba de la brten gyur nas// lte ba'i dbus
264a5(rgyud 'grel): su bsam par bya// slob mas kyang ni 'di skad brjod// 'chi bar gyur pa ro ba slong zhing // rtog pa'i dra ba sel mdzad pa// A ma mchog gi bdud rtsi che// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing // bla med byang chub mchog la reg/ bdud rtsi
264a6(rgyud 'grel): mnga' bdag khyod la bstod// gsang chen dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcud ldan bdud rtsi khyod la bstod// ces pa ni gsang ba'i dbango// / de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur te// maN+Dal
264b1(rgyud 'grel): zhim legs byugs te// mchog tu dkar dmar thig le gdab// steng du mtshan ldan bud med bzhag/ gnas rnamasu ni lha tshogs dgod// dbyings nas bstim pa'i cho ga bya// de nas slob mas gsol ba gdab// ji ltar sangs rgyas
264b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun// shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'grub// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du// gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol// tsas pa ni gsol ba gdab bo// bu tshur shog cig rigs kyi bu// gang ltar dga' ba'i dngos
264b3(rgyud 'grel): grub ni// shes rab ma la brten nas 'grub// rtag tu shes rab don 'dod pas// pad+ma'i steng gis lce yis rig/ dri chen dri chu bza' bar bya// tha dad rtog pa gyur mi bya// khu ba dkar dmar rnam pa gnyis// lce yi dbus su
264b4(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bzung // bka' thub med cing brtul zhugs che// 'di dang ldan pa 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pa ni sdom pa dbog pa'o// de nas slob ma tshan po des// rang gi bsam pa'i blo brtags pa// ji snyed sdom pa bzung bar bya//
264b5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa 'dzin po'i slob ma de// dmigs med yum gyi dkyil 'khor lta// rtag tu gnar bu'i tshul can gyis// rdo rje dril bu kha phye la// mthong ba'i slob ma gsol ba gdag/ rmad 'byung btsun mo'i b+ha ga'i mchog/ e shes
264b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bskyed pa'i gnas// ma smin ma grol grol ba'i sar// ye shes dam pa bsnyad du ga sol// zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'o// de nas bde ba'i stan bting la// seng gi'i stabs kyis nyal ba yis// lag pa steng
265a1(rgyud 'grel): 'og bsnol nas ni// mchog dga' ba yis gtam dang ldan// gnas dgu ru ni sen mo gdub// zur gyis smeg dang kha sbrad stsogs// chags pa bskyed pa'i cho ga bya// yum gyi bya rgod rtse mo mchog/ dbang po'i lag pas
265a2(rgyud 'grel): blang bar bya// pad+ma kha byer gyur pa dang // gnyi su med par sbyar gyur te// bskyod pa ngal gyis bskyod par bya// bskyod po'i rlung gis mes bskul te// bde chen byang chub sems phab ste// so so'i gnas su 'ong tshang bzung // rdo rje skye ru phyin pa
265a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // yi yi 'od kyis bur 'gyur te// oM khyod kyis stobs kyis thams cad 'dus// log pa'i man ngag der bsam mo// ma bzlog pa ni lce yis blang // gal te bzlog par gyur pa na// rtog pa thams cad nub par 'gyur// de las
265a4(rgyud 'grel): langs te de bzhin bsam// shes rab ye shes kyis dbang ngo // / de nas lung bstan par bya ste/ khams gsum 'gro rnams thams cad la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni// snying
265a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzeb las sgrol bar 'gyur// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gtan bcad nas// bla med byang chub mchog la reg/ de ring phan chad bu khyod ni// rgyal ba'i sras kyi mthu bo yin// zhes pa ni lung bstan pa dang dbugs dbyung ba'o// ji lta/
265a6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba'i// de ltar chos kyis 'khor lo bskor// khams gsum sems can thams cad la// 'khor lo bskor bas mya ngan 'das// ces pa dang / dung dang ral gri pad+mo dang // rdo rje la sogs pa 'di ni rje su snang ba'o//
265b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob mya dam pa des// rin chen gser dngul b+hu ru dang // dung dang mu tig ku mu ta// ba lang rta dang blung po che// yulta dang bu slad la sogs pa// mdor na rang las gces pa'i rdzas// thams cad bla ma de la dbul// bla mA dam par gyur
265b2(rgyud 'grel): ba la// rang srog gis kyang mnyes byed na// gzhan pa'i rdzas lta smos ci dgos// zhes pa ni yon dbul lo// de nas dam tshig dbog bya ste// gsang dang don dam yang dag la// thob par gyur pa'i slob ma yis// dam tshig yid bzhin nor bu/
